text: Ndi mumanye ne: mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kakuitaba bua nuye, anu meme mumuenzeje ku bukole
Mvidi Mukulu kuinyika muaba mume ne: Mbuloba, mayi avua madisange ne: Mmayi manene

Mu dituku disambombo bana balume ba ngombe muanda mukulu ne bimpanga bibidi ne bana balume ba mikoko dikumi ne banai ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua, ku bana balume ba ngombe ne ku bimpanga ne ku bana ba mikoko bu bungi buai, bu mudi mukenji wamba, ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi, ku mutu kua milambu ya kuosha buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua
Abrame udi ufika mu ditunga dia Kenaane Bobu bamane kufika mu ditunga dia Kenaane, kupitshilabu mu ditunga adi too ne ku mutshi wa tshijila uvua mu Moreya pabuipi ne musoku wa Shekeme
Muntu kena mua kujidila Yehowa muan a bute wa nyama, nansha muana wa ngombe nansha muana wa mukoko etshi ntshintu tshia Yehowa

Hakatangila mukashi ne Yosefe wakashiya tshivualu mu tshianza tshiandi, wakanyema, wakahatuka, mukashi wakela dî kudi balume ba mu nsubu wandi, wakabambila ne, Tangilai, mulume wanyi wakulua ne Muena Ebelu mu nsubu bualu bua kutufiusha bundu, wakabuela mu nsubu bua kulaleye banyi, ne meme nakuela di dianyi dikole
Mena a misoko ei akadi: Besê mu tshihela, mu muaba wa mpata, wa mu Bena Lubena; ne Lamota mu Gilada wa Bena Gada; ne Golana mu Bashana wa Bena Manashe
Mîyama wakashala ku butshika bua tshitudilu matuku muanda mutekete, bantu kabakaya ku luendu to ne hakaluabo ne Mîyama kabidi
Nenubandamune ne: Tuvua ku bupika kua mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu
Bakamuambila ne, Tuakuya mu buloba buwakatutuma, bulelela, buloba abu budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi, â mmamuma a buloba
Moshe kumusengelela ne: Kutulekedi nansha
Ke munudi mua kulomba, munudi mua kunemeka kashidi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Nanku nyama eyi idi ne mikiya: kamelu, nsenji ne damane
Nzambi wakambila Abalahama ne, Wewe ne tunkanunuina tuebe mu bikondo biatu bionso, nenutumikile tshihungidi tshianyi
Yakoba wakimanyika dibue dia ha lukita luandi, dibue edi didi ha lukita lua Lakele to ne ku dituku edi
Bakambilangana ne, Tuyai bietu, tuenzai tushola, tutuoshe mu kalua Bakadi ne tushola bu mabue, ne bitume bu tshimama
Bana ba balume ba Sheme badi: Elame, Ashure, Arpakshade, Lude ne Arame
kubotakaja lwendu lwa bishimikidi bia Mbulamatadi;
Kadi pawabenga neakunyoke, akutumine njiji
Wambile bena Izrayele bonsu malu andi nkuambila aa
Kadi kanuenji Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nunku

Bikala muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Usungula bua kujadihamu dina diandi, udi kule, hashishe nenushale ngombe wa mu ngombe yenu ne mukoko wa mu mikoko biakanuha Yehowa, bu munakanuambila; nudi mua kudia ku mbelu kuenu bintu bionso bidi mitshima yenu misue
Nanku butuku uvua nenu mu tshikutu tshia kapia tshivua tshinutokeshila njila, mu munya uvua nenu mu divuba

Hakatangila bena buloba, Bena Kanana mene, madilu makole a ku tshituilu tshia Atada, bakambilangana ne, Â mmadilu makole a Bena Ejipitu, nunku bakidika muaba au ne, Abele miselayima, udi dishiya dia Yadene
Tshiena ne buimpe bua kudiangatshila tshituha tshia luse ne bulelela biwakalesha muntu webe, nakasabuka musulu eu wa Yadene anu ne tshibangu, katataka nakulua bisumbu bibidi bia bintu
Bualu udi tshitupa tshidi Maweja Nangila mubapeshe tshia ku bintu bionsu bidibu bamulambula
Tshiena ndekela bena Izrayele baye to

Muakuidi nealabe manyi adi ashala mu tshianza tshiandi ku lusongo lua ditshu dia ku tshianza tshia balume dia muntu udiye musue kulengesha ne ku tshiala tshiandi tshia ku tshianza tshia balume ne ku muan a dikasa munene wa ku tshianza tshia balume ha mutu ha mashi a mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, manyi adi ashala mu tshianza tshia muakuidi, nêle ha mutu ha muntu udiye musue kulengesha, muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi buandi ku mpala kua Yehowa
Edi kadiena di dituakukuambila mu Ejipitu ne, Utulekele bua tukuatshile Bena Ejipitu mudimu, anyi
Nusankishe Maweja Nangila, nuenze bidi bimulengelela
Kumukokeshi ne tshianza tshikole, kadi utshine Nzambi webe
Balaka wakamuebesha ne, Yehowa wakuamba tshinyi
Badi batukuma, batuamba bua kuenza madiotu
Abrahame wangambidi ne: Sara mmuanetu wa bakaji
Nzambi wakasangakena ne Belâma, ne Belâma wakamuambila ne, Nakasa bioshelu muanda mutekete, nakosha mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga ha tshioshelu ne ha tshioshelu
Abrahame kuya mu Bersheba, kukunamu mutshi wa kampanga nzevu
Nutumikile, nunvue mei onso anakanuambila: nunku nenukune dikasa dimpe ne bana benu badi banulonda ku nyima tshiendelele, hanuenza malu adi mimpe ne makane ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Benji ba bilengulengu kuenza pabu tshishima atshi ku majimbu abu

Lewitiki Milambu ya Bukula Halua muntu ne mulambu wa bukula kudi Yehowa, neafile bukula bubotesha, newelehu manyi ne musenga wa manananshi, nealue n abu kudi bana balume ba Alona bakuidi, neambulule dianza tente ne bukula ne manyi abu ne manananshi abu onso, ne muakuidi neabuoshile ha tshioshelu, bu tshivilukidi, bu tshintu tshidi tshi tua dihembu kudi Yehowa, ne tshituha tshia bukula tshidi tshishale netshikale tshia Alona ne bana bandi balume ntshintu tshidi tshitambe tshia tshijila tshia mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia
Bana aba ke bavuabu balaba manyi, babajidile bua benze mudimu wa butuangaji
Isaka wakasua Esau bualu bua yeye wakamudisha munyinyi wa ntole, Lebeka wakasua Yakoba
Kubalondelabu bionsu bivuabu bamone mu Kenaane
Papita Maweja Nangila bua kushipa bena Ejipitu, neamone mashi adi kulu kua tshiibi ne ku mabaya adi ku nseke yatshi

Balombodi ba kumpala ba Tubadi twa basalayi; Banzuji ba basalayi ba kulu; Balumbulwishi basomba mu nkwaasa babidi; pa bukookeshi ne bukookeshi bwa kabadi ka kabwendela, basungula kudi balumbulwishi bônso ba mu tshitupa etshi bwa tshipungu tshia bidimu bisatu; Balumbulwishi ba palake babidi, pa bukookeshi ne bukookeshi bwa Kabadi ka kabwendela, basungula kudi balumbulwishi bônso ba mu tshitupa etshi bwa tshipungu tshia bidimu bisatu; Mulumbulwishi musomba mu nkwaasa umwe, pa bukookeshi ne bukookeshi bwa Kabadi ka basalayi; Mulumbulwishi wa palake umwe pa bukookeshi ne bukookeshi bwa Kabadi ka basalayi

Nenuhiane buloba ku meku enu, hanuela nshobo, nenuhe bantu ba bungi buloba bua bungi, ne bantu bakese buloba bukese, biakuata nshobo muntu, buloba abu nebuikale buandi, nenuhiane buloba bu mulongo wa bisamba bia batatu benu
Mose wakafunda mei onso a Yehowa mu mukanda, wakabika ne dinda dionso, wakasa tshioshelu kuinshi kua mukuna, ne mabue manene dikumi ne abidi bu bungi bua bisamba bia Bena Isalele
Batekepu mabulu a munyinyi, mutu ne mafuta a nyama
Kuaka nenutendelele nzambi mikuabo yakasongabo ne mitshi ne mabue, kayena mua kutangila anyi mua kunvua anyi mua kudia anyi mua kununkila
Kadi muntu udi upatula kanyama kafue aku mu mayi, neapie mikiya
Palô wakambila Yosefe ne, Nakalota tshiota ne kakuena muntu udi mua kutshinjinguluila, kadi nakunvua lumu hebe ne, Wewe haunvua tshiota tshia muntu, udi mua kumujinguluilatshi
Kanudi munyinyi wa nyama ei, kanulengi tshianza ham bidi hai, kayena miakane kunudi
Mu ditunga dijima edi kamuena muntu udi mua kutusela, tuetu kubuela mu dibaka mudi bantu bonsu benza
Bena Ejipitu kuangata matempu abu a mvita, tubalu ne bena mvita, kulonda bena Izrayele
Matuku onso a muoyo a Metushela akadi bidimu nkama tshitema ne makumi asambombo ne tshitema, yeye wakafua biandi
Yehowa wakasangakena ne Belâma, wakateka dî mukana muandi, wakamba ne, Uhingane kudi Balaka, umuambile nunku

Yeye neafile mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji kudi Yehowa, tshimpanga tshidi katshiyi ne tshialua tshia mushinga ûdi witabusha kudi muakuidi bu mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kumubuikidila n au bubi kudi Yehowa ne bubi buakenzeye nebuikale bubuikidibue
Balombodi ba mu bukalenga kukonka mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ne: Muntu ewu neanyange ditunga dietu too ne ku diba kayi

Mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji udi bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu, mukenji umue udi wisuika, muakindi udi ufila mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu neangate tshituha tshia munyinyi tshidi tshishale
Muntu udi ukuma tatu andi anyi mamu andi, nebamushihe bulelela
Badi Bashiha Musambuki wa Mukenji wa Dia Lumingu ne Mabue Hakadi Bena Isalele mu tshihela, bakasangana muntu wangula nkunyi dî diku dia Lumingu
Bena Isalele bonso, balume ne bakashi, ba mitshima miololoke bakitabusha kufila bintu ku mudimu wakadi Yehowa Wambila Mose bua kuenjibua, bakabika kudi Yehowa bu kuha kuabo kua disanka
Kuinyikaye mutu panshi
Nanku kuambabu ne: Tudi benze bibi
Hakadi Palô ne bantu bandi tshiji, yeye wakatubuesha ne kahita ka bena bidia mu nsubu wa lukanu, bubidi buetu tuakalota bilota dituku dimue, bu mudi dijingulula dia tshilota tshiandi
Tshijadikilu tshia se dîyi didibo batuma kadieena dinemeka pa butooke mêyi ne mikandu badi ne tshia kutshifila kudi muntu ewu udi ubenga mwa kwenza dîyi edi
Tshiuvua mutupatuile mu Ejipitu ntshinyi
Kanukengeshi bakashi ba mu lufuila anyi bana ba nshiya
Nanku tunyama tuonsu tukese tudi tuenda panshi, kanuena mua kudia munyinyi watu to
Nanku, anu yeye neatume mutumibue wende kumpala kuebe, bua akuleje nsongakaji uudi mua kuselela muananyi Izake
Buludi buatshi nebuikale coudée umue, ne butshiama buatshi nebuikale coudée umue, utshidikishe ne luidi lumue, bule buatshi bua mulu nebuikale coudées ibidi; wenze nsengu yatshi ne mutshi au umue
Kadi nuenu bonsu, pinganayi mu tshipela, nupitshile mu njila wa ku Mayi manene makunze
bishimikidi bia mianda ya manga ne ya dinanga dia bantu; diangata dia batumi ba mêyi ku mudimu wa manga ne wa budimi;
Melekisedeke, mukelenge wa Salema, wakalua ne mampa ne nvinyo
Kanumufikishi munda to, bualu udi mua kunubutula, kunumusha panu
Nunange Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu

Bena Isalele ku Holeba Nuanji kudimuka, nulame mioyo yenu bilengele, bua kanuhu muoyo bua malu anuakatangila ne mesu enu, ne bua mei au kaluhuki mu mitshima yenu matuku onso a muoyo wenu; kadi nuamanyisha bana benu ne bana ba bana benu; dituku dinuakimana ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu Holeba, hakangambila Yehowa ne, Unsangishile bantu, mbunvuishe mei anyi, bua bobo bamanye mua kuntshina matuku abo onso a ha buloba, ne bua bobo bayishe bana babo

Nzambi wakambila Mose kabidi ne, Wewe newambile Bena Isalele ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua benu, Nzambi wa Abalahama, Nzambi wa Isaka ne Nzambi wa Yakoba wakuntuma kunudi edi ndina dianyi tshiendelele, etshi ntshivulukidi tshianyi kudi bantu bonso

Hakatangila kahita ka bena bidia ne, Kujingulula eku kudi kuimpe, yeye wakambila Yosefe ne, Mu tshilota tshianyi, mona, nakadi ne bisaka bisatu bia bidia ha mutu hanyi, mu tshisaka tshiakadi ku mutu mene mene muakadi bidia bia Palô bilamba, ne nyunyu ya mulu yakalua, yakabizokola mu tshisaka tshiakadi ha mutu hanyi
Nempe bantu aba dikasa dimpe kudi Bena Ejipitu, ne hayabo, kabena baye ne bianza bituhu
Muena mudimu wa Abrahame umvua nanku, kutuaye binu panshi, utendelela Maweja Nangila, umuela tuasakidila
Wewe newenze malonga ne nkuta ne mpanza ne bihanza bia or mutambe buimpe
Nunku Mose wakafunda musambu eu dituku adi, wakauyisha Bena Isalele
Mukaji yonsu wa bena Izrayele, nealombe kudi mukaji wa bena Ejipitu udi ku nzubu kuende, nansha kudi muena mutumba nende, bintu bia tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole, nansha bia mpawungi

Mose wakambila Alona ne Eleaza ne Itama, bana bandi balume bakadi bashala, ne, Nuangate mulambu wa bukula udi ushala munkatshi mua milambu idibo boshila Yehowa ha kahia, nûdie ne bintu bidi kabiyi ne luevene hehi ne tshioshelu, bualu bua tshintu etshi ntshintu tshia tshijila, nenudie mu muaba wa tshijila, bualu bua etshi ntshintu tshiebe ne tshia bana bebe balume munkatshi mua milambu idibo boshila Yehowa ha kahia, bualu bua Yehowa wakangambila nunku
Kanungu ka Dineemeka dia mapa a muntu yônso ne dia budikadidi bwa shindameenu budi bushindikibwa mu Dîyi dikulu badi badikanyika bamfumu ba Mbulamatadi ne kabidi muntu yônso
Wakakudika tshilulu ku mbelu kua nsubu

Yeye wakavula bilulu bia mu lufuila, wakaluata bilulu bikuabo, wakadibuikila ne tshilulu tshikudika, wakashikama ku tshibi tshia ku Enayima, hehi ne nshila wa ku Timena, bualu bua yeye wakamona ne, Shela wakamana kudiunda ne kabena banze kumbakisha kudiye
Dîyi didi dileeja bulongolodi , bukookeshi ne lwendu lwa bilumbulwilu bia lukongu lwa mbulamatadi
Mukulu andi, muana wa bakashi, wakambila muana wa bakashi wa Palô ne, Nye kukubikidila muamushi wa muana wa mu bakashi ba Bena Ebelu, alue kukuamushila muana mabele, anyi
Kuambilanganabu kabidi ne: Tuasayi tshimenga tshikale ne kaleya katumbuke mulu bua tupete lumu lunene

Nzambi wakamuambila kabidi ne, Ndi Nzambi wa Bukole Buonso, uvulangane ukumbane ba bungi, bisamba bia bungi nebifume kudi, bakelenge nebaluhuke munda muebe Buloba bunakalaya Abalahama ne Isaka, nenkuhebu ne tunkanunuma tuebe tualonda ku nyima kuebe
Muntu kapatuki to
balongolola tulasa mu Bulongolodi bwa tulasa mu ditunga dijima budi ne bilongelu bia mbulamatadi ne bilongelu bidikadila bianyisha
Tuetu tudi bu benyi ku mesu kua tatu etu nansha

Nomba Tshitudilu ne Balombodi ba Bisamba Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Muntu ne muntu wa munkatshi mua Bena Isalele nenshimike ntenta wandi hehi ne dibendele diandi, didi ne bimanyinu bia nsubu ya batatu abo bifundahu, nebashimike ntenta yabo minyunguluke tshitendelelu mitangile ku tshitendelelu
Dina dia musapa muibidi didi Ngishone; wowu udi munyungulule ditunga dia Kushe
Yehowa wakulua dî dia Bena Isalele, wakafua Bena Kanâna mu bianza biabo, bakabashiha ne misoko yabo yonso, ne dina dia muaba au diakadi Hôma
Neubule tshiseba tshia ngombe, neamukose bituha
Abimeleke wakamuebesha ne, Bualu buwakutuenzela budi tshinyi
Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, wakamufila mu tshianza tshietu; tuakabashiha ne yeye ne bana bandi balume ne bantu bandi bonso
Pikalawu mushale dinda nuwoshe
Tatuende muenu kuitaba ne: Waya bimpe
Kanungu ka Muntu yônso udi ne tshia kusanganyibwa mu mwaba wa kusomba kauyi ufila masama ne mwikala wambulwisha ditantamana diende dipungakana
Nulame mukenji ewu kashidi
Abrahame kumukonka ne: Maweja Nangila, umfuile luse bua pandi ngakula nebe
ndongamu wa polovensa
Meme ne mamu ebe ne bana benu netulue bua kukukukuila hanshi, anyi
Kanudinyangi
Yehowa wakambila tshisumbu tshienu tshionso mei â ku mukuna munkatshi mua kahia, mu difutu dinene, ne mu midima mikole ne dî dikole; kena usangisha mei makuabo ha mutu

Bwalu bônso budi bupangisha disungudibwa tshikondo tshia masungulangana budibo balwa kumanya pashishe kudi beena ku tubadi badi ne bukookeshi budi bufikisha ku dijimija dia ngikadilu wa butshipwita munwamfwanka wa ditunga anyi wa butshipwita mukulumpa
Biwenza nunku, ne Bikala Nzambi numuambile dî diandi nunku, wewe neumanye mua kuikala ne bukole ne bantu nebaye ku miaba yabo talalâ
Tshidi ne mudimu wa kufila ngenyi ne kwambulwisha mwa kupeta ngenyi idi itangila tshidiidi tshia kwenza ne idi itangila mêyi adi ditunga mwa kweela
Nunku muan anyi witabusha di dianyi, bika biebe, unyemene kudi Labana muan etu wa balume, udi mu Halana, ushale n andi matuku makese to ne hashika lukuna lua mukulu ebe ludiye n alu kudi

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Eu udi mulambu wa Alona ne bana bandi balume udibo bafila kudi Yehowa mu dituku didibo bela manyi ha mutu tshia dikumi tshia épha wa bukula bubotesha bu mulambu wa bukula, neafile tshituha dinda ne tshituha tshikuabo dilolo

Dutelonone Hangata mulume mukashi bua kumubaka, ne bikala mukashi kayi muimpe ku mesu kuandi bualu bua yeye wakamusangana ne malu adi kayi mimpe, hashishe yeye neamufundile mukanda wa kushiha dibaka, neamuheu mu bianza, neamûmushe mu nsubu wandi
Munkatshi mua bena Izrayele bakuabu, ndi musungule bana benu bena Levi
Kanushiyi tshintu tshikese tô ne ku dinda, kadi biashala bintu dinda nenubioshe mu kahia
Kenaane ashale mupika wa Sheme
Mulami wa nsubu wa lukanu kakalama bintu biakadi mu bianza bia Yosefe, bualu bua Yehowa wakadi n andi, Yehowa wakamuendesha diakalengele mu malu onso akenzeye
Pikala malu onsu andi mmuambile manuenzekele, nuenu babuele mu dikenga, nenupingane kudi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, bua kumutumikila
Pamonabu tulambula nyama ayi, nebatuase mabue batushipa
Bena Lubena bakasa Heshebona ne Eleale ne Kiyatayima, ne Nebo ne Bâla meona bakidika misoko ei mena mahia mahia ne Sibema; bakidika misoko mikuabo yakasabo mena mahia mahia
Kuasaye tshimenga tshia Ninive, tshia Reyobote Ire, ne tshia Kela
Kanudionenyi mitshima yenu ne malu au Ebi mbilele bia bisamba bindi ngihata ku mesu kuenu, buloba buabo buakoneka, nempingishe bubi ha mutu habu, buloba nkayabu budi buluka bena buloba
Kadi Maweja Nangila mmumfikile meme Moshe munda bualu buenu, muditshipe wamba ne: Kuena mua kusabuka musulu wa Yardene, kufika mu ditunga edi dimpe, dindi mupeshe bena Izrayele to
Hakahongololabo bintu biakadi mu bibombi biabo, bakasangana argent ya muntu ne muntu mu tshibombi tshiandi, hakamonabo, bobo ne tatu wabo argent yabo bakatshina
Bienda muana mukashi wa muakuidi masandi, yeye wakadinyanga wakasangisha tatu andi kabidi, nebamuoshe mu kahia
Ndi ne ngombe ne tubalu ne mikoko ne bahika ba balume ne bahika ba bakashi, nakutuma di kudi mukelenge wanyi binamanya mua kusangana luse ku mesu kuandi
Ngombe muanda mutekete mikuabo, minyane, kayakadi ne manyi yakayilonda, tshakatangila ngombe minyane nunku mu buloba bua Ejipitu diambedi nansha
Tuetu bena Izrayele bonsu tudi bantu ba tshijila
Moshe kuandamuna Maweja Nangila ne: Bu mudi bena Izrayele kabayi bateleja bindi mubambile, mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kabidi kakuitaba to, bualu ndi ngakula ne lutatu
Nuenu bamane kundambula bidi bimpe ku bintu bionsu abi, kanuena nuenza tshilema panudi nuangata bidi bishala
Moshe kuebeja Maweja Nangila ne: Udi unkengesha nenku, kuyi umfuila luse bua tshinyi
Kadi kanuedi meji ne: nudi badipetele diakalenga ku bukole buenu nkayenu to

Muakuidi neangate umue wa bana balume ba mikoko, neamufile bu mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, ne dikoho dia manyi, neabinyukule bu mulambu udibo banyukula ku mpala kua Yehowa; yeye neashihe muana mulume wa mukoko kudibo bashihela milambu ya kubindila n ai bubi ne mulambu ya kuosha ha kahia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, mulambu wa disatu buka dia mikenji udi mulambu wa muakuidi bu mudi mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu, etshi ntshintu tshia tshijila
Nanku kanuena mua kudia bishi bikuabu bionsu bidi ne masala, kabidi ne mapangu anayi
Nusanke bikole, bualu Maweja Nangila neanuvudijile biakudia bia bungi mu madimi enu
Kanungu ka Budikadidi bwa kuleeja tshiji badi babwaanyishe
Nzambi wakatabasha mesu andi, yeye wakamona mushimi wa mai, yeye wakaya, wakasuna mai mulondo tente, wakanuisha nsongalume mai
Bena Izrayele bonsu kuenza bivua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe ne Arone
Nuenu ne ndelanganyi yenu, nukumbaje meyi ne mikenji bia Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, bindi munumanyishe lelu
Amu bobu nkayabu nebenze mudimu munda mua nzubu awu
Abrame kumukonka ne: Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wanyi, nemmanye ne: ditunga edi nedishale dianyi mushindu kaayi
Yehowa Nzambi Wakabikila mulume, wakamukonka ne, Wewe udi kudi kunyi
Bimana bia bimenga mbitumbuke mulu
Bana balume bonso ba bakuidi nebaudie mu muaba wa tshijila, etshi ntshintu tshitambe tshijila
Nzambi wakabanda kulu ku muaba wakadiye uyikila n andi
Nyoka kukonka mukaji ne: Mbulelela menemene Mvidi Mukulu mmunukandike ne: kanudi bimuma bia mitshi yonsu idi mu lupangu anyi
Kuditshipaye, wamba ne: Muntu nansha umue wa ku ndelanganyi eyi mibi, kena mua kufika mu ditunga dimpe, dimvua mulaye bankambua benu to
Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Udi ne tshintu kai mu tshianza tshiebe
Ebe wakalela bana balume babidi dina dia mukuabo diakadi Pelege, mu matuku andi bakabanyangana buloba, dina dia muan abo diakadi Yoketana
Nanku kuakuikala nkayebe ne mudimu wa kulama bantu
Pavua divuba adi dishala dibuikila muaba wa tshijila matuku makese, bena Izrayele bavua bashale muaba awu matuku makese
Kadi bulelela, nakukubisha bua kukulesha bukole buanyi ne bua dina dianyi dimanyishibue ha buloba buonso
Kukumbajabu bivua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe
Dielulula Pashishe tuetu kualuka, kupingana mu tshipela, batangile ku Mayi manene makunze, bu muvua Maweja Nangila mungambile

Padi mukaji umona tshijila tshia bakaji matuku mavule, katshiyi pa diba diatshi, nansha padiye ushala ku tshijila upitshisha matuku ende a tshibidilu, matuku awu onsu udi anu ne mikiya, bu muvuaye nayi mu matuku ende a tshijila tshia bakaji
Kanulombi mukuenu bintu bia kasombela ka bintu biwakamusombesha: kasombela ka argent ne ka bia kudia ne ka bintu bionso biwakamusombesha
Nowa kupatuka mu buatu ne mukajende, ne bana bende ba balume ne bakaji babu
Bavua anu bindila diyi dia Maweja Nangila
Ndondu awu, kavua mutue anu ne bakakuetu to
Au mmeku a Bena Gada, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi anai ne nkama itanu
Badi baya nende kumpala kua ntenta wa kusambakena
Mvidi Mukulu udi uleja bena Izrayele malu Nanku nuenu bena Izrayele, dimukayi
Dutelonone Yoshua Udi Musungula bu Muhinganyi wa Mose Mose wakaya biandi, wakambila Bena Isalele bonso mei â
Bakumuka mu Miteka, bakashikama mu Hashemona, Bakumuka mu Hashemona, bakashikama mu Moselota

Nomba Mulangala wa Alona Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ela dî kudi bana ba Isalele, usungule bantu dikumi ne babidi badi bakelenge ba nsubu ya batatu abo, wewe wangata milangala kudibo, muntu ne mulangala wandi muntu ne mulangala wandi, wewe ufunde dina dia muntu ne muntu ha mulangala wandi
Bobo kabanyangishi bintu bia tshijila Nakafila Bena Isalele kudi Yehowa, bua kabatekedi bantu bujitu bua bubi bua bakuidi hadia bakuidi bintu bia tshijila bia bantu meme ndi Yehowa wakabajidila
Mu Luhangu lua Tshitendelelu Ek
Bikala umue wabo kayi muakane, udi mulema anyi udi mufofo anyi udi muoneka muaba mukuabo, kanumushihedi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Bena Isalele Badi Banyunguluka Buloba bua Moaba Bena Isalele bakaya, bakashikama mu Oboto
Ke pandi nnuambila ne: nuikale ne muoyi muimpe
Lote kubalambila biakudia, kuboshila mikata, kudiabu
Mutumibue wa Mvidi Mukulu kuya kuimana kunyima kua mitanda ya bena Izrayele
Lelu tuakumumvua wakula munkatshi mua kapia
Kusongi mpingu ya mvidie
Bena Levi kudilongolola, kumusha mikiya yabu, kusukula bilamba biabu
Kadi bena Izrayele bonsu too ne bimuna biabu, nansha mbua mene kena mua kubabuikila to
Alona neatuale mena a Bena Isalele ha tshilulu tshia dilumbulula tshidi ha mutshima wandi, hayeye ku muaba wa tshijila, bu tshivulukidi tshia tshiendelele ku mesu kua Yehowa
Bantu kuinyika muaba awu dina ne: Massa mmumue ne: Diteta ne Meriba mmumue ne: Matandu , bualu bena Izrayele bavua batandisha Moshe
Pelabu amu mpungi umue, bamfumu ba bisamba bia bena Izrayele nkayabu nebasemene pabuipi nebe

Eu udi mukenji wa Munazi udi uditshiha, ne mulambu wa tshijila tshiandi kudi Yehowa, ha mutu ha bintu bidiye mumanye mua kufila bu kuditshiha kuakaditshiheye n aku mbudiye n abu mbua kuenza bu mudi mukenji wa tshijila tshiandi

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Halelabo muana kudi ngombe anyi kudi mukoko anyi kudi mbushi, yeye neikale ne mamu andi matuku muanda mutekete, ku dituku dia muanda mukulu ne matuku adi ku mpala badi mua kumufila bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia
Wakatuangana bilulu bitanu ha buabi, bilulu bitanu ha buabi
Numanye ne: Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, neakengeshe bisamba bionsu binudi nutshina ebi anu mushindu awu
Bu mudibio nanku, pa kulonda bimanyinu bia tshikondo tshieetu, Dîyi dikulu dia lelu edi didi dipatula mwanda mupiamupia pa kuleeja dikala dia momumwe dia mulume ne mukaji
Muakuidi neabioshe ha tshioshelu etshi ntshintu tshia kudia tshidibo bafila bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia
Nennunyoke bilondeshile bijanu bienu abi
Mua Kuenzela Bahika Ek
Wewe newenze tshikololo tshia tshiamu tshia or, neufundehu ne, TSHIA TSHIHE A KUDI YEHOWA
Moshe kukumbaja bimpe bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila mumuambile
Ei idi ndelanganyi ya Esau dina diandi dikuabo Edome
Wakundinga nunku bua tshinyi
Pambamona mashi awu, nempite mu njila tshiyi imubutula to
Nudie munyinyi awu mushindu ewu: nusuike mukaba mu tshimonu, dikombu ku bianza, bisabata ku makasa

Bena Ngershone ke bavua ne mudimu wa kulama bintu bia ntenta wa kusambakena ebi: ntenta wa munda, ntenta muibidi, ne ntenta wa kubuikila ku ntenta ibidi ayi, kabidi ne tshilamba tshivua tshilembeleja ku mushiku wa ntenta

Nakulua hanshi bua kubasungila mu bianza bia Bena Ejipitu, ne bua kubaluhula mu buloba abu, ne bua kulua n abo mu buloba buimpe ne bunene, mu buloba budi ne mabele ne buitshi bia bungi, mu muaba wa Bena Kanana ne wa Bena Hiti ne wa Bena Amole ne wa Bena Pelese ne wa Bena Hiwi ne wa Bena Yebuse
Ubele mikaba ku bimono, Alona ne bana bandi balume, teka bifulu ha mitu habo, bobo nebikale ne mudimu wa buakuidi tshiendelele, wewe neujidile Alona ne bana bandi balume
Kabidi bivua bisheme bu mikata mienza ne buitshi
Badi bumbulamu tshiamu tshifike mu mbuebue, tshiamu tshia kabanda mu mikuna

Mikenji ya Kusombangana Talalâ Kanuhingashi muhika wakunyemena kunudi munyeme mu bianza bia mukelenge wandi; yeye ashikame n enu mu muaba udiye usungula mu umue wa misoko yenu udi utamba kumusankisha; kanumuenzedi bibi
Pikala Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu munufikishe mu ditunga dinuakuata, nenujingile bantu diakalenga ku lusongu lua mukuna wa Ngarizime

bilongelu bikulu ne bilongelu bikwabo bia mianda ya mamanya, mamanya mapiluke anyi a midimu bidibu bâsa anyi bambulwisha kudi Bukalenge bunene anyi kudi makalenga a polovensa ne bidi mêyi a ditunga mâmba ne bidi ne diambulwisha bwa ditunga dijima;
Metushayele kulela Lemeke
Nanku meme nemfuile mu ditunga ditudi edi
Kuenji mudimu dituku adi, nansha wewe, nansha bana bebe ba balume nansha ba bakaji, too ne bapika ne benyi badi basombe mu ditunga dienu

Mu nseka yônso, Bukalenga bunene budi bushindika diditangalaja diaadi mu mfwalansa ne mu mwakulu ne mwakulu wa ku inayi ya ditunga, mu tshipungu tshia matuku makumi asambombo kutwadijila ku dipatuka diaadio
Kanudi mashi; bua nukume dikasa dimpe ne bana benu badi banulonda ku nyima, hanuenza malu adi mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa
Kanualakanyi tshintu tshia mukuenu: nansha mukajende, nzubu wende, ngombe wende, madimi ende, mupika wende mulume nansha mukaji, mpunde wende, nansha tshintu tshionsu tshia mu lubanza luende
Ele amu mbila ne: Ndi mupie mikiya
Kanukukuidi mpingu ya nanku, kanuyitendeledi
Agare ufika mu tshipela, pabuipi ne mpokolu wa mayi uvua mu njila wa ku Shure, kusambakenaye ne mutumibue wa Maweja Nangila
Bukula bua mulambu budi bushale babuangate anu kudi Arone ne bana bende ba balume, bualu ntshitupa tshia tshijila menemene, tshia ku mulambu uvuabu balambula Maweja Nangila
Bana babo bakaya ku Shekeme bua kudishabo bimuna bia tatu abo Isalele wakebesha Yosefe ne, Bana benu kabena badisha bimuna ku Shekeme, anyi
Ku dikombu dionsu neufundeku dina dia tshisamba tshiabu

Kanudi ku mbelu kuenu tshintu tshia dikumi tshia manvua enu, anyi tshia nvinyo yenu mihia mihia, anyi tshia manyi enu, anyi tshia ban a bute ba ngombe yenu ne ba mikoko yenu: nansha milambu yenu mudi nuditshiha n ai, nansha bintu bidi mitshima yenu misue kufila, nansha milambu idibo bakuha: kadi nubidie ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, musungule, ne wewe ne muana webe mulume ne muana webe mukashi ne muhika webe mulume ne muhika webe mukashi, ne Muena Lewi udi ku mbelu kuenu: nuikale ne disanka ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu malu onso anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu
Bukalenga bunene budi bwaakaja diumvwangana ne matunga makwabo didi kadiyi dijadika panyima pa ditangilula dia Tshipangu tshia baministila
Bavua bashiya bena mudimu babu ne bimuna biabu mu mpata
Tshituha tshia buhianyi bua Yehowa mbantu bandi; Yakoba udi buhianyi buandi
Musangu wa ndekelu neajikije bionsu bidi bikengela bua muntu ashale kayi ne mikiya

Bakadi ku mutu kua binunu bia bena nvita ne tuhita tua binunu ne binunu ne tuhita tua nkama ne nkama, bakalua kudi Mose, bakambila Mose ne, Bantu bebe bakabala bungi bua bena nvita badi ku nyima kuetu, nansha umue wetu udi mushale
Miakulu mikwabo ya ditunga ke idi yenza bubanji bwa bunkanbwa bwa Kongu budi Mbulamatadi ne tshia kukuba
Ke muvua ndelanganyi ya bana ba Kame nanku
Pashishe, mutuangaji neatshikenkete kabidi

Yehowa wakamufila buloba buonso bua Gilada tô ne ku Dana, ne buloba buonso bua Nafatale, ne bua Efelayima ne Manashe ne buloba buonso bua Yuda tô ne ku mai manene a ku nyima, ne buloba bua ku Sude, ne mpata wa mu tshibanda tshia Yeleko, musoko wa mabue, tô ne ku Soâ
Abrame kuitaba bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila mumuambile
Or yonso ya tuhita tua binunu ne binunu yakanyukulabo kudi Yehowa yakadi nshekele binunu dikumi ne bisambombo ne nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi atanu
Panuikala bumvue ne: muena Izrayele udi utendelela mvidie nanku, nukebulule bua kujadika ne: mmuenze nanku bulelela anyi
Meme nkayanyi tshiena mua kujikija makenga a bena Izrayele bonsu aba to
Nanku muntu yonsu aboye anu litre inayi ku muntu ku muntu, bilondeshile bungi bua bena diende

Muakuidi nealabe mashi ku nsengu ya ku tshioshelu tshia musenga wa manananshi tshidi mu ntenta wa kusangakena ku mesu kua Yehowa, neahongolole mashi onso a muana wa ngombe ku tshitaka tshia tshioshelu tshia kahia tshidi ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena
Netupite anu ne njila, katuyi tuapuka nansha ku dia balume nansha ku dia bakaji
Umanye ne: bayende mmuambi
Biamatshila bilumi tshilulu anyi tshiseba nebatshiuvuwe ne mai, netshikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Nenukute mafu tente, nenusakidile Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bualu bua buloba buimpe buakalayeye
Pashishe nenkuambuluishe bua ulele bana ba bungi, benze tshisamba tshinene, tshidi tshipita bena Izrayele ku bukole ne ku bungi
Bena Iti kujadikilabu bantu bonsu bavua ku tshibuelelu tshia tshimenga ne: muaba udi Abrahame musumbe washadi mu dina diende

Hakafikabo, bakalua kudi Mose ne kudi Alona ne kudi tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele mu tshihela tshia Palana ku Kadesha, bakalua kudibo ne kudi tshisumbu tshionso ne dî diabo, bakabalesha mamuma a buloba abu

Kadi balambule Maweja Nangila munyinyi onsu wa mafuta: mukila, mafuta onsu adi malamate ku bia munda, tuonyi tubidi ne mafuta onsu adi malamateku, mafuta adi malamate ku lutandatanda ludi ku mutshima, ludibu balamuna pamue ne tuonyi
Kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu nkama ibidi
Kubambilaye ne: Lambulayi Mvidi Mukulu wenu milambu anu mu ditunga emu
Wakenza mabaya abidi a kuteka ku matumba a nsubu a ku nyima
Au adi mai a Meliba, bualu bua Bena Isalele bakatanda ne Yehowa, ne yeye wakajidibua ku mesu kuabo
Wewe neulue n abo, neubateke mu mukuna wa buhianyi buebe, muaba uwakusungula, Yehowa, ne, Nenshikamemu, muaba wa tshijila, uwakajadika ne bianza biebe
Ekesode Tshioshelu tshia Milambu ya Kuosha Ek
Balaka wakambila Belâma ne, Wakungenzela tshinyi
Bantu bakuabu badi babikila bena Emi ne: mbena Refayime, bu mudibu babikila kabidi bena Anake
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji

Kanungu ka Bulongolodi bwa dîyi ne makajilula menza kudi beena mu Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshia batshipwita bakulumpe kabeena babiangata ne mushinga padi dianyisha diabio difwana kulela dipweekesha dia biûma bia mbulamatadi anyi diaasa anyi dikolesha dia bujitu bia mbulamatadi, pa kumbusha pikalabio bileeja bulongolodi budi buleeja lupetu anyi mabanji adi abikumbana
Mvula mukole wa mabue ne makubakuba wa nanku katshia kavua muanji kuloka mu ditunga dia Ejipitu

Yakoba wakambila Shimeona ne Lewi ne, Nuenu nuakuntatshisha, nuakunvuisha bu tshintu tshibi munkatshi mua bena buloba munkatshi mua Bena Kanana ne Bena Pelese, tuetu tudi bakehe ne bobo nebunguile kundi, nebanshihe, nebahaule nsubu wanyi ne meme nenjimishibue
Bobu kuandamuna ne: Nanku tubikile nsongakaji, atuambile tshidi ku muoyi wende
Nanku nuikale nuela luepu mu milambu yonsu
Bana ba balume ba Zebuluna, Selede ne Elona ne Yalele

Mikanda miludiki idiye utwa biâla mu mianda idi ku bukookeshi bwa Bukalenga bunene anyi idibo batangila kudi ministêla, idi kabidi yangata tshiâla tshindonda tshia Minisitila wa kumpala ne , padibio bienzeka, biâla bia baminisitila badi ne tshia kwenzeja midimu ayi ne bikale kabidi bambula bujitu ebu ku mêsu a Tshimamwende wa bukalenga

Mukalu wenu wa ku luseke lua ku nôde newikale ku mai manene tô ne ku mukuna wa Hô, ku mukuna wa Hô nenufunde tô ne ku mukalu wa Hamata ku Sedada; mukalu newikale kabidi ku Zifelona tô ne ku mukalu wa Hasâ enana, eu newikale mukalu wenu wa ku nôde
Biangata mulume mukashi wa muan abo mulume, ebu mbualu bubi, yeye wakavula muan abo mulume bilulu, bobo kabena balela bana tshiendelele
Nenfunde ha mabue au mei akadi mafunda ha mabue awakashiha, wewe wabueshe mu mushete
Pa nanku, mwenji wa Dîyi ewu udi mubwêja mapa ne madikadidi aa mu Dîyi dikulu
Mutuangaji udi ukenketa miaba idi mputa
Ke Maweja Nangila kutuambila ne: Mpindiewu bangayi luendu

Bikaleye mukuambile ne, Tshiena musue kumuka kûdi, bualu bua yeye udi ukunanga ne ba mu nsubu webe, wakabela disanka kûdi, hashishe wewe newangate nkulonda, neumutuhite ditshu ku tshibi ne yeye neikale muhika webe tshiendelele
Badi mwa kukanyika bantu bwa kwenzabo busalayi mu mushindu udi mêyi a ditunga mafunda
Bena Kenaane mbase ku muelelu wa Mayi manene a pankatshi pa matunga, ne wa musulu wa Yardene
Bakashikama bua kudiabo bidia, bakabanduluka, bakamona Bena Yishemaele bafume ku Gilada, ne tumelo tuabo tutuala manananshi ne bintu bia muhuya muimpe ne mula, bakadi bahueka mu Ejipitu
Abrahame kupesha Abimeleke mikoku, mbuji ne ngomba
Kora kubikila bena Izrayele bonsu muaba uvua Moshe ne Arone bimane, pabuipi ne mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena
Mu bunene bua buakane buebe, wewe utu wahita bantu bukole badi badilesha ku mesu kuebe, wewe udi ubatumina tshiji tshiebe, tshidi tshibosha bu bilu
Nuenu nutumikile mei anyi ne mikenji yanyi, nubienze, buloba bundi musue kunuha bua kushikamamu kabunuluki
Nebikale bintu biebe wewe, ne bia bana bebe ba balume ne ba bakaji, bilondeshile ndondu utuvua batue nebe, kabidi ne ndelanganyi yebe yonsu
Bua bualu ebu mulume neashiye tatu andi ne mamu andi, nealamate mukashi wandi, bubidi buabo nebikale mubidi umue
Mukashi mene wakamba ne, Yeye udi muan etu mulume Nakuenza bualu ebu mu buakane bua mu mutshima ne kutoka kua bianza bianyi

Diambedi tshiyi muanze kushikisha kuamba mei au mu mutshima wanyi, Lebeka wakaluhuka ne mulondo wa mai ha diaha diandi, wakaya ku mushimi wa mai, wakasuna mai, meme nakamuambila ne, Umpeku mai a kunua
Wewe newikale bu Mvidi Mukulu, udi umumanyisha tshidiye mua kuamba, yeye neikale muambi webe
Wewe wakasasula bintu bianyi bionso, wakasanganamu tshintu tshiebe tshimue, anyi
Pashishe nealambule bukula ne mvinyo
Kadi tshivuadi tshia dima tshidibo baulambila nebatshishihe, biaulambilabo mu tshivuadi tshia tshiamu tshia mitaku, nebatshisukule bimpe ne mai
Nsongalume kakahidia bualu ebu bualu bua mutshima wandi wakadi muele kudi muana wa bakashi wa Yakoba, butumbi buandi buakatamba bua bantu bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu andi
Bualu bua bahele nebikale mu buloba buenu matuku onso, nunku nakanuambila ne, Nubulule tshianza tshienu kudi muan enu, kudi mukengi ne kudi muhele mu buloba buenu
Kusombabu mu tshimenga tshia Arane
Bena Peleshete kukuatshika bowa
Lemeke wakabaka bakashi babidi, dina dia muadi diakadi Ada, ne dina dia tshilondi ne, Sila
Mutuangaji neangate kabidi mafuta, aele mu tshianza tshiende tshia luseke lua dia bakaji

Kanungu ka Mweena Kongu yônso udi ne tshia kuneemeka ne kwangata bakwende beena mwabo kakuyi kansungansunga nansha kakese ne kusheemesha nabo malela adi ambulwisha mwa kusungila, kulubulula ne kukolesha bumwe bwa ditunga, kaneemu ne dilengulula dia mibi ya bakwende
Nuenze muenu muonsu bua kulumbuluisha bantu bimpe
Muntu yonsu udi ne disama difuanangane ne dia nsudi, nebamufile kudi mutuangaji
Muntu kamulengi tshianza nansha, kadi nebamushihe ne mabue anyi nebamutahe ne difuma, bikaleye nyama anyi muntu, yeye kena wikala ne muoyo Helabo mpungi musangu mule, bantu nebalue ku mukuna
Moshe ne Arone kuenza muvua Maweja Nangila muambe
Bualu tuyaya kuenza tshibilu bua Maweja Nangila
Yeye wakambila Yakoba ne, Undekele butuku bukadi ha kutshia
Kubinaminyi, kubitendeledi, bua meme Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ndi bianyi Nzambi wa mukau, ntu ngatumina bana ba tshihungu tshisatu anyi tshinai badi hanyi lukuna mibi ya batatu abo
Pashishe, mutuangaji amuteke pa nkayende matuku makuabu muanda mutekete
Nenujadike ne: ki mbimpe kuntombokela meme Maweja Nangila to

Kadi mafuta makuabu adi mashale mu tshianza, mutuangaji aele mu mutu wa muntu udi udikobolola, bua ajikije mikiya yonsu, amuenzele bionsu bidi bikengela bua muntu ashale kayi ne mikiya kumpala kua Maweja Nangila
Ikale anu muena Izrayele
Uluemu ne mesa, ulongolole bintu bidihu, uluemu ne bitekelu bia minda, utekemu minda
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kuebeja mukaji ne: Tshiwenzedi nanku ntshinyi
Bena tshisamba tshia Isakare kulonda, babalombola kudi Netaneyele, muana wa Shuware
Enza mahu asambombo ha tshitekelu, mahu asatu ku luseke lumue, mahu asatu ku luseke lukuabo

Yuda Udi Wakuila Benyamina Hashishe Yuda wakalua ha buihi n andi, wakamba ne, Mukelenge wanyi, witabushe, ndi nkutendekena, bua muntu webe ambile di ku matshu a mukelenge wanyi kunakadi ne tshiji kudi muntu webe, bualu bua wewe udi bu Palo mene
Moshe kubikila Arone ne bana bende ba balume, kubowesha mayi bu muvua Maweja Nangila mumuambile
Bualu ke muaba uvuabu bajiike bena Izrayele bavua ne lukuka lua munyinyi
Kadi nyama yonsu idi ne mikonu mipanduluke, kayiyi ipingaja bintu mukana, ibidia kabidi, nansha idi ipingaja bintu mu mukana ibidia kabidi, kadi kayiyi ne mikonu mipanduluke, kanuena mua kuyidia to
Bualu kai nuakushiya mulume ku nyima

Nenufunde mukalu wenu wa ku esete ku Hasâ enana tô ne ku Shefama, mukalu neuhueke ku Shefama to ne ku Libela ku esete kua Ayina, mukalu neuhueke tô ne ku muelelu wa dishiha dia Kinelete ku esete, mukalu neuhueke tô ne ku Yadene uhueka tô ne ku Dishiba dia Luehu Ai mmikalu idi înyunguluka buloba buenu
Kadi neikale mupie mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Yehowa wakateka dî mukana mua Belâma, wakamba ne, Hingana kudi Balaka, umuambile nunku
Padi muntu ubuelela mukaji awu mu nzubu, mu matuku atshidiye ku tshijila tshia bakaji, muntu awu udi upia mikiya ivua nayi mukaji awu
Bonsu babidi kutua ndondu
Yeye wakadia bikole, Bena Ejipitu ne bantu ba mu nsubu wa Palô bakunvua muadi wandi
Pikalaku difwilakana dia bukookeshi pankatshi pa bukalenga bwa kumutu ne polovensa, anu Kabadi kimikila mianda ya Dîyi dikulu kôku nkayaku ke kadi ne bukole bwa kukosa nsambu
Nebanubadile mulambu udibo banyukula bu bintu biakushihulabo ku tshishihuidi ne bu bintu biakukamabo ha tshikaminu
Mêyi ne mikandu adi apeesha mishindu mikwabo yônso ya tshinyangu tshia bâna ba mabeela pa ludimi manyooka makole
Ke meme kunuambila ne: Koleshayi muoyi, kanubatshinyi, kanupampakanyi
Maweja Nangila anuleje mpala wa mimuemue, anufuile luse
Badi mwa kukwata bintu bia muntu anu mu dilonda dia dipangadika diangata kudi bamfumu bakoshi ba nsambu badi ne bukookeshi abu
Moshe kuambila Arone ne: Angata litre ya mana inayi, wela mu dibungu
Dituku dia muanda mukulu neaye ne tumandankutshi tubidi nansha ne nkudimba ibidi kudi mutuangaji, mu mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena
Anu mêyi ne mikandu ke idi ileeja mishindu ne makanyika a kulonda bwa kuya kutangila anyi kukalula mu nzubu mwa muntu
Ndimba neyipatuke mu nzubu muebe, mua balombodi ba mu bukalenga buebe ne mua bantu bebe bonsu
Basatu aba bakadi bana balume ba Noa ne tunkanuniuna tuabo tuakamuangalaka ha buloba buonso
Kadi misangu yonsu, kanudi mashi a tshimuna to
Bena Isalele bakenza mudimu wonso wakambila Yehowa Mose
Bantu ba lungenyi lule bakadi benza midimu ya mishindu yonso mu tshitendelelu bakaha kudi Mose, bakamuambila ne, Bantu badi balue ne bintu bitamba bungi bia kuenza n abi mudimu wakuamba Yehowa
Kalebe, muana wa Yefune, wa mu tshisamba tshia Yuda

Hawabutangila, wewe neusangakene ne bankambua bebe bu muakenza Alona mukulu ebe, bualu bua nuenu nuakahidia dî dianyi mu tshihela tshia Sina, hakatontolola bantu bualu bua mai, kanuakanjidila ku mesu kuabo

Umue wabo neoshe muana wa ngombe ku mesu kuandi, ne tshiseba tshiandi ne munyinyi wandi ne mashi andi ne tunvi tuandi: ne muakuidi neangate mitshi ya cèdre, ne mabeshi a hysope, ne bintu bikunzubile, neabiele munkatshi mua kahia kadi kosha muana wa ngombe
Nenudie munyinyi wa bana benu balume ne wa bana benu bakashi
Bakavudishila Lebeka disanka, bakamuambila ne, Wewe muan etu mukashi, wikale nkambua mukashi wa binunu bia mbombo ya bantu, ne tunkanunuina tuebe tuhiane buloba bua bantu badi n atu lukuna
Yeye wakamba ne, Makelela Mose wakamba ne, Bualu buikale bu mu dî diebe, bua kukumanyisha ne, Kakuena nzambi mukuabo bu Yehowa Nzambi wetu
Bule bua dibaya dimue buakadi coudées dikumi, ne butshiama buadi buakadi coudée umue ne tshituha

Bobo nebabange ku tshidimu tshiakudihaneye nebabale bungi bua bidimu tô ne halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, mushinga wa kudihikula n au newikale bu bungi bua bidimu biakashaleye handi bu muena mudimu
Kusombaye mu tshipela tshia Parane
Bualu Maweja Nangila neanumuenekele lelu
Kadi meme tshiena mua kufika ku mukuna, diakabi adi kadiyi dianji kunkuata, bualu kuaka nkupite bule

Kadi bikala dikenga dikuabo dilonda ku nyima, wewe neufue muoyo ku muoyo, disu ku disu, dinu ku dinu, tshianza ku tshianza, dikasa ku dikasa, udi muoshe mukuabo kahia nebamuoshe kabidi, udi utaha mukuabo mputa nebamutahe biandi, udi ukuma mukuabo mibundabunda nebamukume biandi
Nebabuikile kabidi mushete ne tshiseba tshia nyama wa nkonga
Mayi a tshipupu Musangu uvua mayi a tshipupu uwuja buloba, Nowa uvua ne bidimu nkama isambombu
Kalongu kisâtu : Bidi bitangila bulongolodi bwa momumwe pankatshi pa Mulombodi wa Ditunga ne Bukalenga bunene
Badi banyoka Kora ne bantu bende Moshe kuambila Kora ne: Wewe Kora ne bonsu baudi nabu, nufike kudi Maweja Nangila malaba
LUENDU LUA BENA IZRAYELE MU TSHIPELA Mayi a bululu Moshe kumuka ne bena Izrayele ku Mayi manene makunze, kuya mu tshipela tshia Shure
Kumulambulaye kabidi milambu ya ditua ndondu

Bena Izrayele bavuluke Mvidi Mukulu wabu Panuafika mu ditunga, didi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu unupesha, nuwuaye mulaye bankambua benu, Abrahame, Izake ne Yakobe, nenusangane bimenga bimpe, binene, binuvua kanuyi bibake to
Bena Izrayele bavuabashale mu Ejipitu bidimu nkama inayi ne makumi asatu
Abrame kuambila Lote ne: Katuena mua kutandangana nebe to
Bualu mbukula bua mulambu wa Maweja Nangila budiye mupeshe ndelanganyi ya Arone kashidi
Badi Basangula Balumbuluishi Ek
Yeye udi Dibue; mudimu wandi wonso udi muakane, bualu bua nshila yandi yonso idi milulame: Nzambi wa kalolo udi kayi ne bubi, udi ne malu makane a bushuwa
Buloba budi bupeta tshitalela ku mayi a mvula
Nyunyi ya tulumbu Maweja Nangila kujula lupepela lufumina ku mayi manene
Nudikebele bisosa nkayenu kuonsu kunudi basue
Kadi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, kuambila bantu bende bonsu ne: Muana wa balume yonsu udi bena Izrayele balele, numuele mu musulu wa Nile
Mose wakambila Nzambi ne, Hanaya bianyi kudi Bena Isalele, hanabambila ne, Nzambi wa batatu enu wakantuma kunudi, nebankonke ne, Dina diandi nganyi, nembambile tshinyi

Nententekashe malu mabi ha mitu habo, nembase mikete yanyi; nzala neyibanyange, makala a kahia ne makenga makole neabashihe, nentume nyama ya menu makole munkatshi muabo, ne lulengu lua nyoka idi idikoka hanshi
Abalama Udi Uya mu Ejipitu Tshiole tshiakadi mu buloba abu, ne Abalama wakaya mu Ejipitu bua kushikamamu bualu bua tshiole tshiakadi tshikole mu buloba abu
Pavua Maweja Nangila musue kunubutula, meme kudiela panshi kumpala kuende, kushala nanku matuku makumi anayi a munya ne a butuku
Moshe kuandamuna Maweja Nangila ne: Bena Ejipitu mbamanye muudi mupatule bena Izrayele mu ditunga diabu ku bukole buebe
Kanuibi
Nanku Maweja Nangila udi wamba ne: Mpindiewu neujadike bukole buanyi
Nenudie bidia bia disanka dia mbingu ku mesu kua Yehowa hanuahuola bintu, ne hanuasangisha bintu kunshikidilu kua tshidimu
Bena Ejipitu nebamanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, hanakuangata butumbi buanyi bualu bua Palô ne makalu andi ne masalayi andi adi enda ha tubalu
Bualu bobu bavua ne bua kulama bimpe bintu bia tshijila, kubiambula pa makaya
Bavua bimane ku tshibuelelu tshia lupangu luseke ludi diba dipatukila, bakandika bua muntu kafiki muaba uvua njila wa ku mutshi wa muoyi
Nanku bu mudibu bamane kundambula meme Maweja Nangila mbabula ayi, nuyifule nuenze nayi bitata bia kubuikila ku tshilambuilu
Abimeleke wakamuambila ne, Mona, buloba buanyi budi ku mpala kuebe, ushikame kudi musue
Kadi bena Sodome bavua bena buenzayi, babenga meyi a Maweja Nangila
Yeye ne balume bakadi n andi bakadia, bakanua, bakalala butuku abu, bakabika ne dinda, yeye wakabambila ne, Nuntume kudi mukelenge wanyi
Bena Izrayele kunungana, bakonka Moshe ne: Netunue tshinyi
Nenushishe kuya nende
Ebu kambualu bua hatuhu kunudi; kadi budi muoyo wenu, budi buvudisha matuku enu mu buloba bunuyaya kuhiana dishiya dia Yadene
Muntu yonso udi ushikama ha tshintu tshiashikameye neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe ne mai, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Nutshisungule ku bintu bimpe binudi nupeta, bua kundambula
Yeye wakababuesha buonso buabo mu nsubu wa lukanu to matuku asatu
Nebavungulule tshilulu ku mesu kua bakulu ba mu musoko
Kakuena tshidi mua kukolela Maweja Nangila to
Dielulula Mvidi Mukulu udi ubafuila luse Pashishe Maweja Nangila kungambila ne: Usonge mabue abidi, mafuanangane ne a kumpala
Mpunda wakatangila muanjelo wa Yehowa muimane mu nshila, ne muele wa nvita mu tshianza tshiandi, mpunda wakasesuka mu nshila, wakaya mu budimi, Belâma wakakuma mpunda bua kumuhingisha mu nshila
Ngunwua nanku, meme kumupesha bikanu bia ku maboku, kumuela ne kakanu ku diulu
Padi dituku dia muanda mutekete dikumbana, mutuangaji udi ukenketa dikeji tshiakabidi
Awu pende kuitaba, kubanda pa mukuna
Pashishe tuetu kukuata bimenga biende bionsu

Padibo bitabuja ndongamu ewu kudi tshitupa tshipita bunene tshia bantu badi bakumbajija Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa, tshiôtshi Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga etshi tshidi tshiteeka baminisitila mu nkwaasa

Lupetu Bafidi ba bulongama Midimu ya Mbulamatadi a kabujima Dibutula dia tshisamba Bukalenga bunene Dijadikila , dishiindikila Dipangila dia ditunga Kasaala, musanzu Tshilema Lumu, mwanda mupiamupia, dimanyisha Bululame Tshilumbulwilu Bukalenga bwa bandumbulula,bukalenga bwa bakoshi ba nsambu,lukoongu lwa Tubadi tukoshi twa nsambu twa beena mwabo
Kanungu kisâtu Polovensa ne bitupa bia teletwale bidikadile bia Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata bidi ne bwikadi bwa pa mêyi ne mikandu ne badi babiludika kudi biâpu bia munda mwabi
Nujimishe bantu bonso badi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ufila mu bianza bienu; kanubafuidi luse, kanutendeledi nzambi yabo; bualu ebu nebuikale bu buteyi kunudi
Bana benu nebikale bu bena tshiendenda mu tshihela etshi tô bidimu makumi anai, bobo nebatuale bujitu bua masandi enu, tô ne hajimina mibidi yenu mifue mu tshihela etshi
Kadi wewe Arone ne ndelanganyi yebe, nuenze mudimu wa butuangaji ku tshilambuilu, ne muaba wa tshijila menemene, udi kunyima kua tshilamba tshidi tshilembelela
Kadi bena ditunga kukanyina Lote, bamba ne: Umuke apa
Ku mukuna wa Sinayi nangananga, Maweja Nangila uvua musue kunubutula bonsu, bualu nuvua bamufikishe munda bikole
Batanu benu nebihate bantu lukama, ne bantu benu lukama nebihate binunu dikumi bia bantu, badi n enu lukuna nebafue ku muele wa nvita
Pashishe neatume diyi bua bakone ku bimana bionsu bia munda mua nzubu, baye kuimansha bionsu bidibu bakone abi ku mpenga kua tshimenga, muaba wa bintu bibi
Nunku hambila ba ha mutu habo bantu mei au, nebasungile tuhita tua kutoka ku mutu kua bantu
Au mmeku a Bena Zebuluna, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi asambombo ne nkama itanu
Tshisamba tshia Zebuluna, Eliaba muana mulume wa Helona neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Zebuluna
Abrame kuandamuna Sarayi ne: Angata mupika webe, wenze nende muudi musue
Udi kabidi mwa kuya ku Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu mu kulonda kwa tshilumbu tshiadibenga kumvwangana ne dîyi dikulu tshijula mu tshilumbu tshidi tshimutangila kumpala kwa tshilumbulwilu kampanda
Kushipaye kabidi ne bamuanabute ba bimuna
Bionsu ebi, anu bua kunulongesha ne: muntu kena ne muoyi anu bua biakudia nkayabi to, kadi bua meyi onsu adi apatuka mukana mua Mvidi Mukulu
Bawoshe mu kapia

Kadi wewe ne bana bebe bonsu ba balume, nuangate tshiadi ne tshibelu bia nyama ya milambu ya bobumue, binuvua bela mulu, banyukula kumpala kua Maweja Nangila, nubidile muaba musunguluke, bualu ntshitupa tshia mulambu tshidi tshiebe ne tshia bana bebe ba balume
Tshisamba tshia Gada, Eleyasafa muana mulume wa Luele neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Gada
Kanungu ka Muntu nansha umwe kêna mwa kwasa, nansha bishi, tshisumbu tshia kabumwe pa tshipapu tshijima tshia buloba bwa ditunga anyi pa tshitupa tshiadi
Muntu yonso udi ukuma mukuabo mu musokoko udi ne mulau
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Hueka mu tshibanda, bualu bua bantu bebe bawakaluhula mu buloba bua Ejipitu bakudiona
Mutuangaji apande nyunyi awu mu tshiadi amutanyinyike
Bantu bonsu bumvue makubakuba ne miadi ya mpungi, bamone kabidi miela ya mvula ne muinshi ufuima ku mukuna, kutshinabu, kuzakalabu, kuimanyinabu pa bule
Kuyipeshaye Arone ne bana bende ba balume, bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambe
Nahore mumane kukumbaja bidimu makumi abidi ne tshitema, kulelaye Tera
Bantu bakuabu, kushisha kumuambuluisha bua kumushipa
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu umona ne ndimba yajiki, tshitunu kumuenzatshi
Kadi amu wewe ne ndelanganyi yebe nenubuele muaba udi mushete wa ndondu

Alona muakuidi wakabanda ku mukuna wa Hô bu muakamuambila Yehowa, wakafua biandi mu tshidimu tshia makumi anai ku nyima kua kuhatuka kua Bena Isalele mu buloba bua Ejipitu, mu dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo muitanu
Kanuena mua kuyidia to
Mikenji eyi, ke ivuaye munumanyishe munkatshi mua kapia, dituku dinuvua basangile kuinshi kua mukuna
Mutshima wandi wakalamata Dina, muana mukashi wa Yakoba, yeye wakananga nsongakashi eu, wakamuambila mei a kalolo
Eu udi mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, yeye udi ne dihila dilelela ku mesu kua Yehowa
Bakulu ba Bena Moaba ne bakulu ba Midiyana bakaya ne bintu bia kumubila n abi mu bianza biabo, bakatua kudi Belâma, bakamuambila mei onso a Balaka
Bakumuka mu Elima bakashikama hehi ne Dishiba Dikunze
Nansha nanku, bu biôbi bienzeka pa dîyi dilongolodi, Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga netshikala mwa kwaasa bikwabo bishimikidi bia ditwa nabi mungalata mpanda
Utshilembeleshe ha makunshi a acacia anai adi ne or ku nseke yonso, teka nkanu ya or ku tshilulu, ku bitubuidi binai bia argent bia ha makunshi
Eyi ke ndelanganyi ya Ismayele, muana wa Abrahame, uvuaye mulele ne Agare, muena Ejipitu, uvua ukuatshila Sara mudimu

Bidi momumue padi muntu kayi muele meji bimpe, uditshipa bua kujadika bualu, nansha bua kuambuluisha muntu kampande, nansha bua kumukengesha, muntu udi uditshipa awu, padiye umanya bubi buende, udi muena tshibawu
Monai, bobo bakenzesha Bena Isalele bua kuenzabo malu mabi kudi Yehowa bualu bua dî dia Belâma mu bualu bua Peô, nunku dikenga dikole diakadi munkatshi mua bantu ba Yehowa
Mose wakateka milangala ku mpala kua Yehowa mu ntenta wa kusambakena

Kanuenzedi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nunku bualu bua bobo badi benzela nzambi yabo malu onso mabi adi atonda Yehowa; bualu bua bobo badi boshila nzambi yabo bana babo balume ne bana babo bakashi mene mene ha kahia
Nsongakaji uya lubilu kumbelu kuabu, kulondelaye mamuende malu awu onsu

Muntu webe, tatu wetu wakabambila ne, Nudi bamanye ne mukashi wanyi wakundelela bana balume babidi, umue wabo wakumuka kundi, nakamba ne, Nyama mubi wakamuhandulula, ne ku dituku adi tshiakamutangila kabidi, binumusha muana eu mukuabo kundi, ne biakuatshishibueye bualu bubi, nennubueshe nsuki yanyi mitoke to mu Muaba wa Bafue ne kanyinganyinga kakole Nunku hanaya kudi muntu webe, tatu wanyi, ne nsongalume eu kayi n etu, bualu bua muoyo wandi udi musuikakana ne muoyo wa nsongalume eu, hashishe, hatangileye ne nsongalume kena n etu, yeye neafue, ne tuetu, bantu bebe, netubueshe nsuki ya muntu webe, tatu wetu, mu Muaba wa Bafue ne kanyinganyinga kakole
Hashikisheye kulengesha muaba wa tshijila ne ntenta wa kusambakena ne tshioshelu, nealue ne mbushi udi ne muoyo
Mweena mwabo mulume, mukaji Mfumu wa Ditunga Kapangu , Tshipangu Dikolesha dia lungenyi, kabukulu, bunkambwa

Mulambu wa benu Izrayele bonsu Padi bena Izrayele bonsu benza bualu bubi mu mpukapuka, budi bubengangana ne mikenji ya Maweja Nangila, badi amu bena tshibawu, nansha bobu kabayi bamanye tshilema tshidibu benza

Panuafika mu ditunga dia bena Kenaane, bena Iti, bena Amore, bena Ivi ne bena Yebusa, divua Maweja Nangila mulaye bankambua benu, ditunga didi ne biakudia bipite bungi, nuikale nuenza tshibilu etshi, ku tshidimu ku tshidimu, mu ngondu wa Abibe
Abrame ne Lote badi babulukangana Abrame uvua mubanji

Nebateke tshilulu tshia bleu ha mutu ha mesa a mampa, nebâteke ha mutu hatshi malonga ne nkutu ne mpanza ne makoho adibo balongolola n au, ne mampa neikalehu, nebatekehu tshilulu tshikunze, nebâteke tshibuikidi tshia biseba bia nkonge ha mutu hatshi, nebabueshemu mitshi ya mesa
Bualu bua Yehowa wakasungula Bena Lewi munkatshi mua bisamba bienu bionso, bua kunuenzela mudimu mu dina dia Yehowa, ne yeye ne bana bandi balume tshiendelele
Â mei audi mua kuambila Bena Isalele
Bua bualu ebu nakanuambila ne, Nuditahuluile misoko isatu
Yakoba wakambila Lebeka mamu andi ne, Tangila, Esau, mukulu anyi udi ne miosa ya bungi ham bidi bandi kadi meme ndi ne mubidi mutuhu

Yeye wakamba ne, Bingikala muhete dianyisha ku mesu kuebe, Yehowa, witabushe bua Yehowa aye biandi munkatshi muetu; nansha bantu aba bikale ne buhidia bukole; utubuikidile kuhanga kuetu ne mibi yetu, utuitabushe bu buhianyi buebe
Nebashihele mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji kudibo bashihela mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, muakuidi neamiamine mashi ku nseke yonso ya tshioshelu
Nuenu kanuikadi ne luse kudi muntu eu, kadi nenumushe mashi a muntu udi kayi ne tshilumbu munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, bua nuenu nuikale ne diakalengele
bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa midimu ya mbulamatadi, nzubu ne midimu ya mbulamatadi ya mu polovensa mu dineemeka dia bulongolodi bwa ditunga;
Nanku, Maweja Nangila, ndi nkusengelela ne: leja bukole buebe
Yehowa wakadi ne Alona tshiji tshikole bua kumushiha; nakalombela Alona musangu eu kabidi
Wewe newambe mei onso andi nkuambila, ne Alona mukulu ebe neambile Palo ne, Ulekele Bena Isalele mu buloba buebe
Nanku nenulale matuku a bungi mu ditunga adi, didi ne biakudia bia bungi, divua Maweja Nangila mumane kuditshipa bua kupesha bankambua benu, ne ndelanganyi yabu yonsu
Padi mate a muena disama amatshila muntu udi kayi ne mikiya, muntu awu asukule bilamba biende, wowe mayi
Mose wakatshina, wakamba ne, Bulelela, bualu ebu buakumanyibua
Nansha nanku bwa mapangadika adi atangila bantu, badi beela tukanda muntu ne muntu pa nkayenda

Muakuidi neangate diboko dia tshimpanga diakalambabo, ne mutanda wa mampa adi kâyi ne luevene mu tshisaka, ne mukata udi kauyi ne luevene, neabiteke mu bianza bia Munazi hashikisheye kubeya mutu wandi, muakuidi neabinyukule bu mulambu udibo banyukula ku mpala kua Yehowa, ebi mbintu bia tshijila kudi muakuidi bidi bisangisha ne tshiadi ne tshibelu bidibo banyukula ku mpala kua Yehowa, hashika bualu ebu, Munazi udi mumanye mua kunua nvinyo
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kubikidisha Moshe ne Arone, kubambila ne: Maweja Nangila mmuenze amu bimpe, kena ne bualu to
Udi wela meji ne: tudi bampofu anyi
Nanku, nenundambule mukata wa kumpala unudi nulamba
Bualu Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kavua muanji kulokesha mvula, kabidi muntu kavuapu bua kudima buloba
Mutshi udi hankatshi ha mabaya neuhite ku ditumba dimue tô ne ku ditumba dikuabo
Hakunvia Balaka lumu ne, Belâma wakalua, wakaya kusangakena n andi ku tshimenga tshia Moaba, tshidi ku muelelu wa mai a Amona, ku butshika bua buloba buandi mene
Nsongakaji ufika, kumukonkabu ne: Udi musue kuya ne udi mukuvuile ewu anyi

Kanungu ka Muntu yônso udi pende ne tshia kwindila se baneemeka bumuntu bwende yêye nkayende, bamulamina maalu ende masokoma a mu mikanda, a mu dimanyishangana mianda ya kulekule anyi a mu mushindu mukwabo ônso wa dimanyishangana mianda
Kuenzedi muenyi bualu bubi, kumukengeshi, bualu bua nuenu nuakadi benyi mu buloba bua Ejipitu

Tuakanyenga buloba mu bianza bia bakelenge babidi bakadi dishiya dia Yadene, ku tshibanda tshia Ânona tô ne ku mukuna wa Hêmona; Bena Sidona badi babikila Hêmona ne, Sileona, ne Bena Amole badi babikila Hêmona ne, Senî; misoko yonso ya mu mpata, ne misoko yonso ya mu Gilada, ne ya mu Bashana tô ne ku Saleka ne Edelei, misoko ya bukelenge bua Oga mu Bashana
Belâma wakambila muanjelo wa Yehowa ne, Nakuenza bibi, bualu bua tshiakamanya ne wewe wakadi muimane bua kunkanda mu nshila
Bu mudi bungi bua bidimu ku nyima kua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene wewe neusumbe bintu kudi mukuenu, ne yeye neakusumbishe bu mudi bungi bua bidimu biakamaneye kuhuola bintu
Genese Yakoba Udi Udilongoluela bua Kusambakena ne Esau Yakoba wakaya mu nshila wandi ne banjelo ba Nzambi bakasambakena n andi
Bakalua kudi Yakoba, tatu abo, mu buloba bua Kanana, bakamuambila malu onso akabakuata ne, Muntu au mukelenge wa mu buloba, wakatua mbila mei makole, wakatuenzela bu batentekedi ba buloba
Udi kabidi ne tshia kukuba ne kukolesha dikwatangana mu mikaba dia beena ditunga, nangananga dîba dididio mu njiwu
Kadi muaba awu kauvua mayi a kunua to
Nendiundishe mashinde mu madimi enu bua nuenu kudisha bimuna bienu; nenudie, nenukute

Mu dituku diakamutekeye mulami wa nsubu wandi ne wa bintu biandi bionso biaka diye n abi, Yehowa wakavudishila bonso bakadi mu nsubu wa Muena Ejipitu masanka, bualu bua Yosefe Disanka dia Yehowa diakadi ku bintu bionso biakadiye n abi mu nsubu muandi ne bia mu madimi andi kabidi
Kadi mesu enu akatangila malu manene onso akenza Yehowa
Dielulula Maweja Nangila mmulongeshe bena Izrayele mu tshipela Nuenu batumikile mikenji indi nnuambila lelu eyi, neyinuambuluishe bua kusomba bimpe
Kuvuadikaye Arone muntumpu, kumusuika mukaba, kumuvuadika muntumpu mulamika tshilamba tshia efode kutshisuikila panyima ne tukaba tuatshi
Mulambu ewu mbua kukobolola nawu bena Izrayele, bua Mvidi Mukulu abafuile luse
Malu makole a mushindu ewu akavua menzeke anyi
Nanku, netshinuvuluije munudi ne bua kumanyisha bantu mikenji ya Maweja Nangila, uvua munupatule mu ditunga dia Ejipitu
Ateke tshianza pa mutu pa ngombe awu, bua Maweja Nangila anyishe mulambu, afuile muntu awu luse
Mvidi Mukulu udi ulombola bantu bende Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu mumane kulekela bena Izrayele, Mvidi Mukulu kena mubaleje njila wa tshikosu wa mu ditunga dia Peleshete to
Bilobu binayi bivua bitshimuna, kupawulabi bintu bionsu bia bena Sodome ne bena Ngomore, too ne biakudia biabu, kunyemabu nabi
Moshe ne Arone kudiela mpala panshi
Yeye wakadidika ne, Shiba, nunku badi babikila dina dia musoko au ne, Be sheba to ne ku dituku edi
Noa wakashala ne muoyo bidimu nkama isatu ne makumi atanu ku nyima kua nvula munene
Bana ba balume ba Lubena, Hanoka ne Palu ne Heselona ne Kâmi
Ubakandike bua kababandi ku mukuna, kabaulengi nansha
Kadi kuena mua kudia bimuma bia mutshi wa kujingulula malu mempe ne malu mabi
Yeye neatenteke tshianza tshiandi ha mutu ha ngombe wa mulambu ne Yehowa neawitabushe bua kubuikidila n au bubi buandi
Mikenji eyi idi ijadika mudibu mua kusunguluja bantu nansha bintu bidi ne mikiya, ne bidi kabiyi nayi
Kuvudi mukashi bilulu hatshidiye ne tshijila tshia kulela kuandi
Bikaleye kayi muhikudibue nunku, yeye neumuke halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, yeye ne bana bandi

Kabena mua kuhana anyi kuhikula tshintu tshia tshijila tshiakajidilabo kudi Yehowa, nansha tshintu tshia muntu anyi tshia nyama anyi tshia budimi bua buhianyi buandi bintu ebi bidi bitambe tshijila kudi Yehowa
Mose wakamuambila ne, Wewe udi ne mukau ku bualu buanyi, anyi

Mose wakabatuma bua kutentekela buloba bua Kanâna, wakabambila ne, Yilai ku nshila wa luseke lua Sude, yai bienu mu buloba bua mikuna nutangile buloba ne budi munyi, bantu badimu badi bakole anyi badi batekete, badi banya banya anyi badi ba bungi: buloba budi munyi budibo bashikama, budi buimpe anyi budi bubi, misoko idibo bashikamamu idi ya hatuhu anyi idi ya mpangu ya mabue, nutangile buloba ne budi ne bufunfule anyi budi busenguluke, mitangile ne mudi metu, anyi kaenamu

MUTU WA MUKANDA V: Bidi bitangila Tshipangu tshia mianda ya bubanji ne ya nsombelu wa bweena ditunga Kanungu ka Mbâsa mu ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata Tshipangu tshia mianda ya bubanji ne ya nsombelu wa bweena ditunga
Diakamue kapia kufuma kudi Maweja Nangila, kutema, kuosha milambu ya kuosha yonsu, ne mafuta a ku milambu mikuabu bivua pa tshilambuilu
Bantu ba mu tshisamba tshia Shimeona nebashikame hehi n andi Shelumiele muana mulume wa Sulishadai neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Shimeona
Muntu ne muntu udibo babala wakabita bidimu makumi abidi neafile kuha kua Yehowa
Abimanshe muaba udibu bimansha butu luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua tshilambuilu

Kanungu ka Muntu nansha umwe keena mwa kufila mpala ku masungula a beena Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga padiye kêna ukumbaja mikenji idi ilonda eyi: kwikala mweena Kongu; kwikala ne mvula ya tshileledi kayiyi mishadila ku , kwikala ne bujima bwa makookeshi a bumuntu ne a tshidiidi; kubeenga kubwelakana mu maalu adibo babeenga kudi dîyi dia masungulangana
Nakatangila ne monai, nuakenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bubi; nuakadienzela kana ka ngombe ne biamu biakatulabo; nuakadi nusesuka lubilu mu nshila wakanulesha Yehowa
Nanku Maweja Nangila udi unutumina diyi nuenu bena Izrayele, bua nupeshe Arone ne bana bende bintu ebi dituku didibu babajidila
Bena Midiyana bakahana Yosefe mu Ejipitu kudi Potifâ, kamanda ka masalayi a Palô

Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakela di diandi kudi Abalahama difume mu diulu tshiakabidi, wakamba ne, Nakaditshiha ku dina dianyi, muakuamba Yehowa, bualu bua wewe wakuenza bualu ebu, kuakumpidisha muan ebe, muana umue hele mene, ne hanasankisha bakuabo nenkuyudíshile disanka, ne hanakumbasha bakuabo nenkumbashe tunkanunuma tuebe bu mitoto ya mu diulu ne bu nsenga ya kukala kua mai manene tunkanunuma tuebe netuhiane bibi bia bantu badi n atu lukuna, bisamba bionso bia ha buloba nebisanke bualu bua tunkanunuma tuebe, bualu bua wewe wakatumikila di dianyi
Kanuikadi ne luse kudi batumpidianganyi aba: nebafile muoyo ku muoyo, disu ku disu, dinu ku dinu, tshianza ku tshianza, dikasa ku dikasa
Mose wakamushiha, wakangata mashi, wakitaba ku nsengu ya ku tshioshelu ne munu wandi, wakajidila tshioshelu, wakela mashi ku tshitaku tshia tshioshelu bua kutshijidila, bua kubuikila bubi bua bantu
Kale Maweja Nangila uvua umvuangana amu ne bankambua benu, mubanange anu bobu
Nzambi wakamba ne, Buloba bumeneshe bimenyi bionso, midioko idi yela ntete ne mitshi idi ikuama mamuma adi ne ntete yai, bu mudi mushindu wai
Maweja Nangila kulokesha mvula mukole wa makubakuba ne wa mabue
Badi ne tshia kumwambila diakamwe mapa ende
Yeye wakamba ne, Tshiena mumanye, ndi mulami wa muakuny anyi, anyi
Wakatuangasha bilulu bitanu ha buabi, ne bilulu bisambombo ha buabi
Kanuitabushi tshintu tshia mbueshilu, bualu bua tshintu tshia mbueshilu tshidi tshifofomesha muntu udi ne mesu matabale, tshidi tshikudimuna mei a muntu muakane
Bualu bua bilulu, ne bintu bionso biakenzabo ne biseba, ne bintu bionso biakenzabo ne miosa ya mbushi, ne bintu bionso biakenzabo ne mabaya, nenudilengeshe bua bintu ebi
Muntu yonsu udi undambula nyama, neasakidile kabidi ne mulambu wa bintu bia pa madimi: kilo isatu ya bukula, budibu basambakaje ne litre umue ne tshitupa wa mafuta
Tunkanuniuna tua Yishemaele Kul
Ikale mupika wa bana babu
Kadi mine ayi idi mua kutuenzela wewe ne meme tshinyi
Ndelanganyi yebe inyenge bimenga bia bena lukuna bayi

Milambu yonsu inudi nulambula Maweja Nangila: ya ntete ya kuenza bukula, ya maluvu, ya mafuta, ya bamuanabute ba bimuna bienu, ngombe, mikoku, mbuji, milambu ya budisuile ne ya mapiku, kanuena mua kudila bintu bia ku milambu ayi mu nzubu yenu to

Tshintu etshi netshikale tshituha tshia Alona ne tshia bana bandi balume kudi Bena Isalele tshiendelele, bualu bua tshidi tshituha tshia bakuidi tshia mu mulambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala ya Bena Isalele, tshidi mulambu udibo babisha mulu kudi Yehowa
Yosefe wakabuela kudibo ne dinda, wakamona ne bakadi babungame
Bintu ebi bidi bibi munkatshi mua bintu bidi bidikoka hanshi ha buloba bibulebule ne mpuka ne dibemba ne musodi ne tshiula ne lungonyonyi
Tshisamba tshia Menashe, muana wa Yozefe:
Esau wakamuambila ne, Tuyai bietu, meme nenye ku mpala kuebe

Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Mpingu Hashiha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bisamba bidi ku mpala kuenu, hanuabihata, hanuahiana buloba buabo, nudimuke, kanukuatshibu kudi mateyi abo bua kubalonda, habajimishabo ku mesu kuenu; kanukonkanganyi bua nzambi yabo ne
Yehowa wakakengesha bantu bualu bua bobo bakenza kana ka ngombe kakadi Alona muenze
Udi musue kunshipa bu muuvua mushipe muena Ejipitu anyi

Muntu udi utela dina dia Yehowa tshitelatela nebamushihe bulelela, bantu bonso nebamukume ne mabue, bikaleye muenyi anyi muntu muledibue mu nsubu yenuhateleye dina dia Yehowa tshitelatela, nebamushihe
Tshiyi muanji kujikija ditendelela dianyi, Rebeka kufika muambuile mulondu wa mayi pa makaya, uya ku mpokolu
Biasanganabo mulume mulale ne mukashi wa muntu mukuabo, nebashihe bubidi buabo, ne mulume wakadi ulala ne mukashi eu ne mukashi kabidi: nunku nenumushe malu mabi munkatshi mua Isalele
Bujitu buabu budi bumpite
Kadi kabavua bamuitaba to, bualu bavua ne kanyinganyinga bua dikenga divuabu nadi mu bupika
Kanumutombokedi kabidi to
Yehowa neanuihate ku mesu kua bena lukuna benu; nuenu nenuye kudibo mu nshila umue, kadi nenunyeme ku mesu kuabo mu nshila muanda mutekete; nebanuendakashe munkatshi mua bisamba bionso bia ha buloba
Bakashikama hehi ne Yadene, ku Bete yishimota tô ne ku Abele shitima, mu mpata ya Moaba
Wakabangata, wakabasabula ne bintu biandi bionso
Pashishe bena Levi nebumuke, bambule ntenta wa kusambakena
Bena Isalele bakenza nunku, bakuabo bakasangisha bia bungi, bakuabo bakasangisha bikese
Bakambila Lebeka mei a Esau, muan andi muan a bute yeye Wakabikila Yakoba muan andi muan a mukala, wakamuambila ne Esau mukulu ebe udi welangana meji a kukushiha bua kutokesheye munda muandi
Nanku mudimu wa bena Kekate mu ntenta wa kusambakena ngwa kuambula bintu bia tshijila
Nulongeshe bana benu mikenji eyi, nuyitele diba dionsu, panudi nusomba ku nzubu yenu, nansha panudi nuendakana mu njila, panudi nulala nansha panudi nubika
Tuetu kubashipa, katuyi bashiye muntu nansha umue ne muoyi
Pashishe, Arone kubajidila bua bikale bantu ba Maweja Nangila
Kadi ujadike, umanye ne: kuena usabuka musulu wa Yardene to
Dituku dia muanda mutekete, nudisangishe bua kutendelela Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Mukalenga awu kuipata Moshe wamba ne: Umuka
Divuba didi dibuikila muaba wa tshijila Dituku divuabu base nzubu wa tshijila, divuba divua dibuikila ntenta uvua ne mushete wa ndondu
Mulambu udi muntu yonsu ulambula Kadi padi muena musoku muenze bualu bubi mu mpukapuka, budi bubengangana ne mikenji ya Maweja Nangila, udi amu muena tshibawu
Bakateka nkanu ku nseke ya mesa bua kutuala n ai mesa
Mose wakabuela munkatshi mua difutu, wakabanda mu mukuna Mose wakashala mu mukuna munya ne butuku mafuku makumi anai
Neanunyoke, bualu tuetu katuena kabidi ne mushinga kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ne kudi bantu bende
Maweja Nangila kubamuangalaja pa buloba bujima
Matuku malondangane muanda mutekete mu didia dia tshibilu, kanuena mua kudia mampa mela buanga
Yosefe wakamuambila ne, Eku nkujingulula kua tshilota tshiebe, matamba asatu adi bu matuku asatu
Pavua Agare mujadike ne: ndi ne difu, kutekelaye Sarayi kapeja
Nutumikile mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne mei akanuambileye ne malu andi akanumanyisheye
Bakaji betu ne bana nebashale bapika
Bafika, kutululabu bintu bionsu bivua tumelu tuambule
Abalahama wakakukuila ku mpala kua bena buloba
Kaleba wakakolesha bantu ku mesu kua Mose ne, Tuyai katataka, tunyenge buloba abu, tudi bamanye mua kuhita bena buloba abu bukole
Bavua balambula mvidie yabu too ne bana babu ba balume ne ba bakaji
Bakashi betu ne bana betu bakese nebashihibue, bualu budi butamba buimpe bua tuetu tuhingane mu Ejipitu nansha

Bualu bua Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Kubadi tshisamba tshia Lewi nansha, kubadi bungi buabo munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, kadi usungule Bena Lewi bua kuenzabo mudimu mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ne wa bintu bionso bidimu bobo nebatuale nsubu ne bintu bionso bidimu, bobo nebabibale, nebashikame ha buihi ne nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Bidi mulambu wa kudikobolola
Bantu bakadi binunu dikumi ne bisambombo, ne mulambu wa Yehowa wakadi bantu makumi asatu ne babidi

Nomba Yehowa Udi Ubatumina Nkuadi Bantu bakadi batontolodi, bualu ebu buakadi bubi ku matshu a Yehowa ne hakabunvua Yehowa, tshiji tshiakamukuata, kahia ka Yehowa kakabosha tô ne ku matshika a tshitudilu
Mukaji awu kulela Pinhase
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji
Wewe neubilengeshe, neubijidile, muntu yonso udi ubilenga tshianza neikale wa tshijila
Kadi biakudia abi kubola bionsu, kunyanguka ne bikusu
Tangilai, Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakateka buloba ku mpala kuenu: yai bienu, nubuhiane, bu muakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu enu; kanutshinyi, kanuikadi ne buowa
Muntu yonso udi ulenga bulalu buandi tshianza neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe ne mai, neikale mukoya tô ne dilolo
Pikala nsongakaji awu ubenga mua kumuka mu ditunga diabu, diditshipa diebe kadiena dikuenzela bualu to
Mukelenge wa Ejipitu wakabambila ne, Bualu kai, nuenu Mose ne Alona, nudi nulekesha bantu midimu yabo, yai bienu ku midimu yenu
Kadi Bena Isalele bakenda mu buloba bûme munkatshi mua mai, mai akadi bu tshimanu kudibo ku tshianza tshia balume ne ku tshianza tshia bakashi
Bakamukonka ne, Sala, mukashi webe, wehi
Ke milambu ivua bamfumu ba bena Izrayele bafile bua kujidila tshilambuilu, batuangaji bamane kutshilaba manyi

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi, ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mûle tente ne musenga wa manananshi, ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Ahiezê, muana mulume wa Amishadai
Bakulu abu, bavua balumbuluisha bilumbu bikese matuku onsu
Nebenze mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Nzambi wakamba ne, Buloba buvuishe bifukibua bidi ne muoyo bu mudi mishindu yabi, ya bimuna ne bintu bidi bidikoka hanshi, ne nyama yonso ya ha buloba bu mudi mishindu yai, bualu buakenjibua

Kanungu ka Dipitshishila mu ditunga, dibweeja, diteeka, dijika, ditshikija mu mâyi a munkatshi mwa ditunga ne mu bitupa bia mbuwa bidi ku bukookeshi bwa ditunga, dimwangalaja mu lupepela dia bishakata bia lulengu, biboleshi, biladioaktif anyi dia tshintu tshikwabo tshiônso tshia njiwu, tshifumina anyi katshiyi tshifumina ku matunga meenyi, didi tshibawu tshinene tshidi mêyi ne mikandu anyooka

Tshitupa tshisatu : Bidi bitangila mapa a mu tshibûngi Kanungu ka Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kukuba mapa ne majinga mamanya kudi mêyi a ditunga a beena Kongu badi basanganyibwa munda ne pambelu pa ditunga
Alona ne bia bana bandi balume bua kuenza n abi mudimu wa buakuidi

kujadika dikombolangana mu mungalaata Ke bwaalu kayi, badi mwa kwambulula butumibwa bwa Mulombodi wa Ditunga anu musangu umwe; ne kabidi yêye mwine udi weenza midimu yeende ya mukubi wa dîyi dikulu, wa budikadidi bwa Ditunga, wa bujima bwa ditunga, wa budikookeshi bwa ditunga, wa diumvwangana ne ndondo ne matunga makwabo; udi weenza midimu yeende ya muludiki ne musonsolodi wa lwendu lwîmpe lwa Bishimikidi bia Ditunga mwikale mubwêjamu Bukalenga bunene ku dîsu dikole dia tshimamwende wa bukalenga

Abrame kuandamuna ne: Ndi nditshipa kumpala kua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu muena kulu, mufuki wa diulu ne buloba ne: Tshiena mua kulenga kantu ka ku bianza biebe, nansha buanda, nansha nshinga wa bisabata, bualu udi mua kuamba ne: Meme ke udi munemeshe Abrame
Numunemeke, numutendelele amu yeye nkayende
Batukebele bisosa bobu nkayabu
Kubisuikabu kaba kamue
Kumupukilaye
Ku luseke lua ku nôde wakenza bilulu tô ne ku coudées lukama, ne makunshi makumi abidi, ne nkanu makumi abidi, kadi bitubuidi biakadi bia argent
Nabi, muana wa Wofsi, wa mu tshisamba tshia Naftali
Nudi mua kuela luepu mu milambu yonsu ya bintu bia pa madimi
Hakamona Alona ne Bena Isalele bonso Mose, monai, musunyi wa ha mpala handi wakakonka, bobo bakatshina bua kulua n andi ha buihi
Kuitabushi bua muena milongo mukashi ashale ne muoyo
Kabidi bantu bonsu badimu mbantu bale
Genese Tshibumba tshia Babela Bantu bonso ba ha buloba bakadi ne muaku umue ne mei amue
Sala wakafua mu Kiyata aba eu udi Hebelone mu buloba bua Kanana, Abalahama wakaya bua kuaula muadi wa Sala ne bua kumujinga
Maweja Nangila kuambuluisha bena Izrayele
Kuvudishila Bantu Disanka kudi Bakuidi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Alona ne bana bandi balume ne, Nenuvudishile Bena Isalele disanka nunku, nenubambile ne, Yehowa anusankishe, anulame
Ku nyima muakuny andi wakahatuka ne tshianza tshiandi tshikuata ku tshikankanyi tshia Esau Bakamuidika dina ne, Yakoba Isaka wakadi ne bidimu makumi asambombo hakamuleleleye bana

Melekisedeke Udi Uvudishila Abalama Disanka Mukelenge wa Sodoma wakaluhuka bua kumuakidila hakahinganeye ku dishiha dia Kedolaome ne bakelenge bakadi n andi, mu tshibanda tshia Shawe etshi ntshibanda tshia Bakelenge
Hakunvua bantu lumu alu lubi, bakadila nansha mundi umue wa kaluata bintu bia kudilengesha n abi
Ku dituku adi mene bahika ba Isaka bakalua kudiye, bakamuambila bua dina dia mai diakimbabo ne, Tuakusangana mai
Bijanu bidi bena Izrayele bakujana nabi nebijike
Matuku muanda mutekete awu, nudie anu mampa adi kaayi mela buanga
Abrahame udi wipata Agare ne Ismayele Muana awu kukola, kulekela diamua mabele
Kana ka ngombe ka mpawungi Nuvuluke ne: mu tshipela nuvua bafikishe Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu munda
Nunku nuakashikama mu Kadesha matuku a bungi, nudi bamanye bungi bua matuku anuakashalamu

Mose wakambila Yehowa ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa mioyo ya bantu asunguile bantu bandi muntu udi mumanye mua kuya ku mpala kuabo, udi mumanye mua kulua kudibo, udi mumanye mua kubalombola, udi mumanye mua kulua n abo mu buloba, bantu ba Yehowa kabikadi bu mikoko idi kayiyi ne mulami
Mulombodi udibo basungula udi ubanga mudimu mu tshipungu tshipiatshipia
Muntu wakanuisha ne kahia neuvuwe bilulu biandi ne mubidi wandi ne mai, ne yeye neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane tô ne ku dilolo
Esawu uvua tshilembi wa kalanda musenga, musue kukeba nyama mu tshisuku

Yehowa Udi Witabusha bua Mose Atangile Buloba bua Kanâna Yehowa wakambila Mose dituku adi mene ne, Banda biebe mukuna eu wa Abalima, ku mutu kua mukuna wa Nebo, udi buludiludi ne Yeleko mu buloba bua Moaba, utangile buloba bua Kanâna bundi mpa Bena Isalele bu buhianyi buabo; afue biebe ku mukuna ûdi ubanda, usangishibue kudi bankambua bebe, bu muakafua Alona, mukulu webe, ku mukuna wa Hô, wakasangishibua kudi bankambua bandi: bualu bua wewe wakahidia dî dianyi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele ku mai a Meliba a mu Kadesha mu tshihela tshia Sina; bualu bua wewe kuakanjidila munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kubwabanyilula kakuyi kansungansunga ne kujadika mapa a muntu yônso a kutantamana

Bobo nebikale bu buhianyi bua bana benu badi banulonda ku nyima bua kubahiana tshiendelele, nudi mua kuangata bahika benu munkatshi muabo, kadi kabakokeshi bana benu ba Bena Isalele ne tshianza tshikole
Tshiena mbutula kasoku aka to

Bena Lewi neitabe, nebambile bantu bonso ba mu Isalele ne dî dikole ne: Muntu yonso udi usonga luhingu anyi udi wenza luhingu ne tshiamu tshiakatulabo kudi muntu udi ne lungenyi lule, udi kujadika mu musokoko, ntshintu tshibi ku mesu kua Yehowa, udi ne mulau
Numushihe anu ku mei a bamonyi babidi anyi basatu; kanumushihi anu ku dî dia mumonyi umue
Kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu nkama ibidi ne tshitema
Yeye nkayende mmusue kuikala Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji
Nuntendelele anu meme, kanutendeledi mvidie mikuabu to
Bikala mulambu webe wa bukula budibo balamba mu dilonga, neusangishe bukula bubotesha ne manyi
Kadi wewe wimane biebe hehi n anyi, nenkuambile mei onso, ne mikenji ne malu bindi musue wewe kubamanyisha, bua bobo babienze mu buloba bundi nnuha
Meme kuenza mushete wa mabaya a ndunga, kusonga mabue abidi mafuanangane ne a kumpala
Alona nêle mbushi ei ibidi nshobo, biakuata nshobo umue, ngua Yehowa, ne biakuata nshobo mukuabo, ngua Azazele
Meme nempueke muaba awu bua kuyukila nebe
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Bualu bua nuenu kanuakungitabusha bua kunjidila ku mesu kua Bena Isalele, nunku kabuena nulua ne bantu aba mu buloba bunakubaha
Kadi tshiena mbingisha muntu udi mupile
Hakunvua Yoshua diyoyo dia bantu hakadibo bela mbila, yeye wakambila Mose ne, Au mmutoyi wa bantu badi baluangana nvita mu tshitudilu
Wakimita difu dikuabo, wakalela muana wa balume, wakamba ne, Katataka bayanyi neandamate bualu bua nakumulelela bana ba balume basatu, nunku wakadika dina diandi ne, Lewi
Labane ne Betuyele kumuandamuna ne: Bualu ebu mbulongolola kudi Maweja Nangila nkayende
Nenuenzele nyama wandi wa mpunda nunku kabidi, ne bilulu biandi; nenuenzele bintu bionso bia mukuenu biakajimisheye ne wewe wakabiangula, kanubisokoki

Bialuangana balume ne badi bakulua mukashi udi ne difu, ne yeye udi utula difu, kadi dikenga dikuabo kadiena dilonda ku nyima, yeye wakamukuma neafutie mulume wandi bintu bidiye musue, yeye neamufute bintu bidi balumbuluishi bamba
Pakuatshikaye, umanyangane pebe nende bua tumulelele bana
Anu mana kututonda diba dionsu
Pashishe kufuaye
Wewe neufunde dina dia Alona ha mulangala wa tshisamba tshia Lewi, bualu bua wewe neusungule mulangala umue kudi muntu ne muntu udi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo
Mêyi ne mikandu adi mwa kwaasa bilumbulwidi bipiluke mu mianda kampanda

Kadi nudi mua kudia munyinyi wa nyama eyi: ngombe, mukoku, mbuji, ngulungu, kabuluku, ntole, mukoku wa mu tshisuku, nyama mikuabu yonsu idi ne mikonu mipanduluke, mikale ipingaja bintu mukana, ibidia kabidi
Kanungu ka Mianda mikwabo idi kayiyi mu luseka lwa dîyi idi mu luseka lwa tuludiki
Ku dilolu, nyunyi kupingana ne katamba ka mutshi wa olive kabishi kasuma ku muinu
Nufunde mena a bantu balume bonsu ku muntu ku muntu, bilondeshile meku abu ne bisamba biabu
Edi ndituku dia lumingu dia dikisha dienu, nujinge mu mitshima yenu, eu mmukenji kunudi tshiendelele

Bukookeshi ebu budi bukoonga bukookeshi bwa kupatulayi ngelelu wende wa meji anyi bidiye mujadika, bu mudi mu ngakwilu, mu mfundilu ne mu bimfwanyi, kadi mwikala uneemeka mêyi a ditunga, bulongama bwa bantu bônso ne bibidilu bia mulowu
Kadi Wambile Yoshua dî, ushindike mutshima wandi, umukoleshe; bualu bua yeye neasabuke ku mpala kua bantu aba, neabahianyishe buloba budi utangila

Bintu bionso biakangatabo kudi bena nvita biakadi mikoko binunu nkama isambombo ne makumi muanda mutekete ne bitanu, ne ngombe binunu makumi muanda mutekete ne bibidi, ne nyama ya mpunda binunu makumi asambombo ne tshinunu tshimue, ne bakashi binunu makumi asatu ne bibidi badi kabayi banze kumanyibua kudi balume

Eu mmukenji kudi muntu udi tufina tuhatuka mu mubidi wandi ne wa bintu bidi bilumi bimatshila bua kumuvuisha mukoya, ne kudi mukashi hamoneye katshetshi, ne kudi muntu udi tufina tuhatuka mu mubidi wandi, ne kudi muntu udi ulala ne mukashi hatshidiye ha katshetshi
Angata dikombu diebe divua diandamuka nyoka adi, uye nadi dinda dionsu ku muelelu wa musulu wa Nile, diba didi mukalenga upuekelamu

Bikala muntu mukusuke tshituha tshibi hehi n andi, ne bikala mutu wa tshijila tshiandi muonyibue, nunku yeye neabeye nsuki ya ha mutu n andi mu dituku didiye mudilengeshe, neadibeye nsuki dituku dia muanda mutekete
Nansha umue wabo wakashala anu Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune ne Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna
Bana ba Lotana bakadi Holi ne Hemana; Timena wakadi muan abo wa bakashi ne Lotana
