Enza buatu nunku buludi buabu nebuikale coudées nkama isatu ne butshiama bua buatu nebuikale coudées makumi atanu ne bule buabu bua mulu nebikale coudées makumi asatu
Ubateke ku bumfumu bua mutuangaji Arone, bamuambuluishe
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji
Yehowa wakamba ne, Nenkudimune mesu anyi kudibo, neutangile muikala nshikidilu wabo, bualu bua badi bena tshikondo tshia tshitshu, bu bana badi kabayi mua kueyemenyibua
Dielulula Tshidimu tshia kulekelangana mabanza Padi bidimu muanda mutekete bikumbana, nuikale nulekelangane mabanza onsu anudi nawu
Mushete wa ndondu uvua mubadianjidile bua kubaleja muaba uvuabu mua kuasa mitanda yabu bimpe
Ndelanganyi yende mikuabu Abrahame kusela mukaji mukuabu, dina diende Ketura
Yetro kuebeja bana bende ba bakaji ne: Kadi muntu awu wepi
Mmuanetu wa tatu

Neangate mashi a muana mulume wa ngombe, neamiamine mashi ne munu wandi ku tshibuikilu tshia mushete ku luseke lua ku esete, neamiamine mashi ku mpala kua tshibuikilu tshia mushete ne munu wandi kabidi misangu muanda mutekete

Bakalua bafika luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua musulu wa Yardene, mu tshibandabanda tshidi tshitangilangana ne tshimenga tshia Bete Peyore, mu ditunga dia mukalenga Sihone wa bena Amore, wa mu Eshebone, uvuabu batshimune kudi Moshe ne bena Izrayele
Kuinyikaye butoke ne: Mmunya, midima ne: Mbutuku
Nowa udi upatuka mu buatu Mayi kushala matengabela pa buloba matuku lukama ne makumi atanu
Bia munda ne bikonu babisukule mu mayi
Kuyaye kusomba pa nkayende mutantshi muipi udibu mua kuela muketa ufika
Akosele muana wa mukoku awu muminu anu muaba wa tshijila, udibu bakosela nyama miminu ya milambu ya kuosha ne ya kukobolola nayi bantu
Bualu mu Ejipitu, panuvua nukuna ntete, nuvua numbula mikidi bua kufikishisha mayi mu budimi amu, bu mudibu benza mu lupangu lua biseki
Kadi ubambile ne: Dilolu edi, nenudie munyinyi: dinda nenudie mampa nuukute, bua nujadike ne: meme ndi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Nanku kanuena mua kudia munyinyi wa nyama eyi

Tshitupa tshibîdi: Bidi bitangila Tshipangu tshia ku mutu kwa mianda ya dimwangalaja dia ngumu ne dileeja dia bimfwanyi Kanungu ka Mbâsa tshipangu tshia ku mutu kwa mianda ya dimwangalaja dia ngumu ne dileeja dia bimfwanyi tshidi tshimanyika mu mêyi a ditunga
Netanele muana mulume wa Sua neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Yisakâ

Kanungu ka Ndondu ne diumvwangana ne matunga makwabo bidibo benza mu njila mululama idi, padibo bayipatula, ne bumfumu bupita bwa mêyi ne mikandu, pa kumbusha diswa dia ndondu ne ndondu anyi diumvwangana kudi tshitupa tshikwabo
Nuenu benze nanku, nenuikale bena diakalenga, nuenu pamue ne ndelanganyi yenu, bualu binudi nuenza nebilengelele Maweja Nangila

Nuenu nutumikile mei andi ne mikenji yandi, bu munakunuambila lelu, bua nuenu nuikale ne disanka ne bana benu badi banulonda ku nyima, ne bua nuenu nuvudishangane matuku enu ha buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha tshiendelele

Yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa mukelenge wanyi Abalahama, atumbishibue, yeye kakumushila mukelenge wanyi luse luandi ne bulelela buandi, hanakadi mu nshila Yehowa wakandombola ku nsubu wa bana babo ne mukelenge wanyi
Belâma wakabika, wakahingana kuandi, Balaka wakaya kuandi kabidi
Paudi uya ku mutu kua ditunga, meme nenye kuinshi kuadi
Bualu bua Yehowa wakakumbamisha bantu bonso ba mu nsubu wa Abimeleke, bualu bua Sala, mukashi wa Abalahama

Kanushihi milambu ya kuhita kua Yehowa munda mua misoko idi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe; anu mu muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Usungula bua kujadikamu dina diandi, nenushihe milambu ya kuhita kua Yehowa dilolo habuela diba, ha diba mene dinuakahatuka mu Ejipitu
Atue munu mu mashi awu, aamiamine misangu muanda mutekete ku luseke ludi lumueneka lua tshilamba tshidi tshilembeleja muaba wa tshijila udi Maweja Nangila

Mose wakambila Bena Isalele bonso ne, Ebu mbualu buakamba Yehowa ne, Usangishe kuha kua Yehowa munkatshi muenu; muntu yonso udi witabusha mu mutshima wandi, alue biandi ne kuha kua Yehowa: ne or ne argent ne tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzû ne bia lin ne miosa ya mbushi ne biseba bia bimpanga bitua mu mai makunze kunzû, ne biseba bia nkonge wa mu mai, ne mitshi ya acacia, ne manyi a mu muinda ne manananshi a kulengesha n au manyi adibo bela ha mutu, ne manananshu adi atua dihembu dimpe, ne mabue a onyx, ne mabue makuabo adibo bateka mu efoda ne mu tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi

Lubena wakabambila ne, Kanumatshishi mashi andi hanshi, tumuele mu mukela eu udi mu tshihela, kadi kanumulengi tshianza nansha, yeye wakamba nunku bua kumusungileye mu bianza biabo ne bua kumuhingasheye kudi tatu wandi
Dina dia diboko dibidi didi Gihona, didi dinyunguluka buloba buonso bua Atiopa
Uyaya kuepi
Yeye wakasangisha bimuna biandi bionso ne bintu bionso biakangateye mu Padana alama bua kuyeye kudi tatu andi Isaka mu buloba bua Kanana

Muntu yonso wa munkatshi mua bana ba Alona udi muena nsudi anyi udi tufina tuhatuka mu mubidi wandi kena mua kudia bintu bia tshijila tô ne hashika disama diandi Muntu yonso udi ulenga mukuabo udi munyanguke bualu bua wakadi mulenge tshitalu anyi wakadi muele bilunu, anyi udi ulenga tshianza tshiandi ha tshintu tshidi tshidikoka hanshi tshidi mua kumunyanga, anyi ham bidi ha mundi udi munyanguke mu mushindu wonso, muntu udi ulenga bianza ham bidi ha bintu ebi neikale munyanguke tô ne dilolo, kena mua kudia bintu bia tshijila diambedi yeye kayi muanze kuowa mai ha mubidi
Kadi bana ba bakashi badi kabayi banze kumanyibua kudi balume nubashiye ne muoyo bualu buenu
Pashishe muntu yonsu wa kunudi neapingane kuende mu ditunga dindi mumupeshe
Bialua muntu ne luonji lua kushiha mukuandi mu budimu, wewe neumumushe ku tshioshelu tshianyi, bua kumushiha
Bualu kai nebajimishe dina dia tatu wetu munkatshi mua diku diandi bualu bua yeye kakadi ne muana wa balume
Bualu bua yeye nealue tshisamba tshinene, ne bisamba bionso bia ha buloba nebisanke bua bualu buandi

Balumbuluishi nebalondolole tshilumbu tô; ne bikala mumonyi eu muena mashimi mutumpile mukuabo tshianana, hashishe bamuenzele yeye bu muakasueye kuenzela muan abo: nunku nenumushe malu mabi munkatshi muenu
Ke mudi mutuangaji mua kukobolola muena tshibawu amu mushindu ewu

Halua dituku dia muanda mutekete, yeye neabeye nsuki yandi yonso idi ku mutu wandi ne muedi wandi ne makiki andi ne miosa yandi yonso, neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neoweshe mubidi wandi ne mai, neikale muakane

Bwa kujikija tshiyola katshiyi ndekelu etshi tshia bukalenga ne bwa kupeesha beena mwaabo ngânda wa kwibakilabo ditunga, batumibwe ba beena tshidiidi ne ba Bisumbu bidi kabiyi bia tshidiidi, bônso bikale diboko dia bukole dia Ditunga, badisangishe mu Muyuki wa beena Kongu, bavwa bapûnga mu Diumvwangana dia mu kabujima ne dia Tshikongu ditwa biâla ku Prétoria mu Afrika wa ku Butshiika wa ku sîda mu dia dia tshiswa munene , mwa kufuka bulongolodi bwa tshidiidi bupiabupia, bushindameena pa Dîyi dikulu dipiadipia dia mungalata mudi mweena Kongu ne tshia kwimanyina bwa kudipeesha baludiki beende, mu didikookesha, panyima pa masungulangana madikadile, a mu tshibûngi, a patooke ne manyishibwe
Nuye kuluangana ne bena Amaleke

Nzubu mukuate butu Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne Arone ne: Panuikala bafike mu ditunga dia Kenaane dindi munupeshe, pandi mmuenesha butu mu nzubu wa muntu mu ditunga adi dipiadipia, muena nzubu awu aye kuambila mutuangaji ne: ndi mumone ditoba dia butu mu nzubu muanyi
Neulele muana wa balume
Diakamue muana wa bakaji wa mukalenga kumona tshisaka mu malenga, kubikila nsongakaji muena mudimu wende, bua kumuambuilaye tshisaka atshi mu mayi
Aba mbana ba balume ba Oholibama, mukashi Wa Esau mukelenge Yeusha ne mukelenge Yalama ne mukelenge Kola, aba mbakelenge bakaluhuka kudi Oholibama, muana wa Ana, mukashi wa Esau
Neikale wa tshijila, nsuki ne miedi bilepa naka
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Mona, ndi mulue kudi mu ditutu difike, bua bantu bunvue hanayikila n ebe, bobo bitabushe di diebe tshiendelele
Mose wakambila bantu ne, Kanutshinyi, imanai, numone luhandu lua Yehowa lualueye kunuha lelu, bua Bena Ejipitu banuakumona lelu kanuena nubamona kabidi tshiendelele
Abrahame uvua musombe mu mushiku wa mbelu wa kazubu kende ka ntenta diba dia munda munya
Habaka mulume mukashi muhia muhia, kayi mu bisumbu bia bena nvita, kabamutekedi bujitu bukuabo; ashale mu nsubu wandi tô tshidimu tshijima, bua kusambeye mukashi wakuangateye

Lota wakabambila ne, Mukelenge wanyi, kuenji nunku, tangila, muntu webe wakamana kusangana luse ku mesu kuebe, ne wewe wakavudisha luse luebe kundi hawakasungila muoyo wanyi, tshiena mua kunyemena ku mikuna, bua bualu bubi nebunkuate, nenfue bianyi
Yeye neanulame bimpe

Muhika wandi wakangata nyama ya tumelo dikumi mu tshisumbu tshia tumelo bia mukelenge wandi, wakaya ne biuma bia mukelenge wandi bia mishindu yonso mu tshianza tshiandi, wakabika, wakaya ku buloba bua Mesopotamia, ku musoko wa Naho
ndongamu wa bulongolodi bwa polovensa;
Bena Amaleke ne bena Kenaane ke badi basomba mpindiewu mu bibandabanda bia ditunga adi
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi atanu ne bisatu ne nkama mai

Bualu bua binuatumikila mikenji yonso Nakanuambila bua kuyenza bua kusua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne bua kuenda mu nshila yandi yonso, ne bua kulamata kudiye, hashishe Yehowa neanuihatshile bisamba ebi bionso ku mpala kuenu, nenuhiane buloba bua bisamba bidi binuhita bunene ne bukole
Ka dina dia musoko diakadi Babela, bualu bua Yehowa wakatompakashaku muaku wa ba ha buloba bonso, ne Yehowa wakabamuangalashaku ha buloba buonso

Netuitabushe anu bua bualu ebu, bua buonso buenu nulue bu tuetu, ne balume bonso ba munkatshi muenu batengudibue, hashishe, netufile bana betu ba bakashi kunudi, ne tuetu netuangate bana benu ba bakashi, netuikale n enu netuikale bu bantu bamue
Badi Bafila Bintu Biabo Hashishe, tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele tshionso tshiakumuka ku mesu kua Mose
Muntu nansha umue kakukandamana to
Bualu bavua batupakane mu mpukapuka, bafila kabidi mulambu wa kuosha ne wa kubakobolola nawu
Enza biebe makunshi atanu a acacia adi ne or ku nseke yonso enza bitubuidi biau ne or, ne enza nkanu ya tshiamu tshia mitaku itanu ya kuelaku
Nebalonde amu mikenji ya tshibilu tshia Dipita dia Maweja Nangila
Di didi Nzambi uteka mukana muanyi, nenkuambiledi
Bintu bionso bia tshijila bia Bena Isalele bidibo banyukula, bidibo bafila kudi muakuidi, nebikale biandi
Bena tshisamba tshia Shimeyone kulonda, babalombola kudi Shelumiyele, muana wa Surishadayi
Uluhuke n abo, bua tuetu tubamanye
Ei ngendu ya Bena Isalele ku bisumbu biabo, bakaya ku mpala
Kanungu ka Muntu yônso udi pende ne budikadidi bwa kweela meji, bwa kusungula bwîmpe ne bubi ne budikadidi bwa ditabuuja
Kusanganabu Lote musombe ku tshibuelelu tshia tshimenga
Yeye neafile bakelenge babo mu bianza bienu, nuenu nenjimishe mena abo hanshi ha buloba; kakuena muntu umue udi mua kuimana ku mpala kuenu tô ne hanuabashiha bonso
Wewe newenze tshibuikilu ne tshiamu tshia or mutambe buimpe, buludi buatshi nebuikale coudées ibidi ne tshituha ne butshiama buatshi nebuikale coudée umue ne tshituha

Mose wakenza bu muakamuambila Yehowa, wakangata Yoshua, wakamushikika ku mpala kua Eleazâ ne kua tshisumbu tshionso, wakatentekasha bianza biandi ha mutu n andi, wakamuambila dî, muakambila Yehowa Mose

Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe tshivwa tshilomba; Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka tshivwa tshianyisha; Beena Ditunga dia Kongu, mu tshikondo tshia dieebeja dia dianyisha diabo dilongolola bitwadijila ku
Diba adi, Maweja Nangila kungambila ne: Ubakandike, kabayi ku mvita, bualu tshiena munkatshi muabu to
Tshiena nnulama kabidi to
Diba adi, mwuluke bua kukumbaja meyi ne mikenji yende, bindi nnumanyisha lelu ebi
Bakumuka mu tshihela tshia Sina, bakashikama mu Dofaka
Yeye wakamba ne, Tshiena nkulekela biwikala kuyi munsankishe
Dina dia muana muibidi divua Yoktana
Tuhita tua Palô tuakakuma bantu bakadi ku mutu kua Bena Isalele, tuakamba ne, Bualu kai kanuena nushikisha mudimu wenu ne makelela ne lelu bu munuakenza diambedi

Nomba Hakatangila Belâma ne bualu ebu buakusankisha Yehowa bua kuvudishila Bena Isalele disanka, yeye kakaya kabidi kutempa mbuku bu muakenzeye misangu mikuabo, kadi wakatangisha mpala wandi ku tshihela
Ebere mumane kukumbaja bidimu makumi asatu ne binayi, kulelaye Pelega
Bua bualu ebu Bena Lewi kabena ne buhianyi munkatshi mua bana babo; Yehowa udi buhianyi buabo bu muakabambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Yeye wakalua ne Shimeona kudibo
Ke muvua Abrame uya mu ditunga dia Ejipitu, bua kuanji kusombamu
Difutu diakadi hankatshi ha Bena Ejipitu ne Bena Isalele, difutu ne midima biakadiku kadi diakadi ne dinkenke butuku Kabikadianganyi ha buihi to butuku buonso
Bangindile, bualu dituku disatu meme nempueke ku mukuna wa Sinayi, bena Izrayele bonsu batangile

Bantu ba Tshijila ba Yehowa Bualu bua nuenu nudi bantu ba tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanusungula munkatshi mua bisamba bionso bidi hanshi ha buloba, bua nuenu nuikale bantu ba buhianyi buandi
Kadi padi mutuangaji umona ne: mu tshibangu kamuena boya butokoloke, kabidi katshiena tshiondoke, tshidi anu tshimpe, neateke muntu ewu pa nkayende matuku muanda mutekete
Bakidika dina dia muaba au ne, Masa ne Meliba, bualu bua kutontolola kua Bena Isalele ne bualu bua bakatela Yehowa ne, Yehowa udi munkatshi muetu, anyi
Bualu pavua Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wa diulu, mumpatule mu ditunga dietu ne mu diku dia baledi banyi, uvua mundaye bua kupesha ndelanganyi yanyi ditunga edi
Bu mudi butu kabuyi mua kumusha, boshe tshintu atshi
Mulambu wonso wa bukula budi busangisha ne manyi, anyi mulambu wa bukula nkayabu, newikale wa bana balume ba Alona, muntu tshituha tshiandi muntu tshituha tshiandi
Dutelonone Badi Kabayi Mua Kubuela mu Masangisha Muntu udi mutaha mputa ku mihesa yandi anyi udi ne mihesa mikosoke kabuedi mu disangisha dia bantu ba Yehowa
Muele wa nvita neubashihe ha bula, ne buowa nebubuele mu nsubu yabo; nebashihe bansongalume ne bansongakashi batshidi tumama, ne bana batshidi bamua mabele ne bakulumpe badi ne nvi ku mitu kuabo

Mikata ne Kuabanyangana bia Buloba bua Kanâna Yehowa wakambila Mose mu mpata ya Moaba hehi ne Yadene mitangilangane ne Yeleko ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Hanuasabuka Yadene mu buloba bua Kanâna, nenuihate bena buloba ebu bonso ku mpala kuenu, nushihe mpingu yabo ya mabue, ne mpingu yakatulabo ne tshiamu, ne miaba yabo ya kutendelela, nenunyenge buloba, nenushikamemu, bualu bua nakanuhabu bu buhianyi buenu
Neakuleje nsongakaji wa mu tshisamba tshietu, mu diku dia tatu wanyi, uudi mua kuselela muananyi
Bantu abu kujuka batangile ku Sodome
Milambu ya kujidila nayi tshilambuilu Dituku dia kujidila tshilambuilu, kutshilaba manyi, bamfumu ba bena Izrayele kufika kabidi ne milambu, kuya nayi kumpala kua tshilambuilu
Kupangabu mua kutungunuka ne luendu
Nenuhe Bena Lewi misoko ei isambombo ya kunyemena, biashala muntu muntu mukuabo, yeye neanyemenemu; ha mutu ha misoko ei nenubahe misoko mikuabo makumi anai ne ibidi
Bakumukamu, bakashikama dishiya dia mai a Ânona, mu tshihela tshidi ku butshika bua buloba bua Bena Amole, mai a Ânona adi ku butshika bua Moaba, hankatshi ha Moaba ne Bena Amole
Mu dituku adi mene Palo wakela di kudi tuhita tua bantu ne tupitene tuabo ne, Kanulu bantu bisonsa bia kuenza n abi tushola bu munuakenza diambedi, bobo badikebele bisonsa
Wakakonka bana bandi ba bakashi ne, Yeye udi kudi kunyi
Nenufunde ha mabue au mei onso a mikenji ne kufunda kuakane
Mukelenge wa Yosefe wakamukuata, wakamubuesha mu nsubu wa lukanu muakadi bena buloko ba mukelenge basuikila, yeye wakadi mu nsubu wa lukanu nunku
Mpasu neyuwule mu nzubu muebe tente, mu nzubu ya balombodi ba mu bukalenga buebe too ne mu nzubu ya bena Ejipitu bakuabu bonsu
Wakamumanyisha dina dia Yehowa

Bana ba Gada ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo, ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita; bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Gada binunu makumi anai ne bitanu ne nkama isambombo ne makumi atanu
Genese Abalahama Udi Usumba Buloba bua Kujikamu Sala Sala wakadi ne bidimu lukama ne makumi abidi ne muanda mutekete, ebi mbidimu bionso bia muoyo wa Sala
Dituku dia matuku dikumi ne atanu a ngondo eu mene ndituku dia kudila Yehowa bidia bidi kabiyi ne luevene, nenudie bidia bidi kabiyi ne Iuevene matuku muanda mutekete
Abrahame ukenzakana, kumona bantu balume basatu bimane pabuipi nende
Sheta wakalela muana mulume kabidi, wakamuidika dina ne, Enosha Etshi ntshibangidilu tshiakabikilabo dina dia Yehowa
Genese Diulu ne buloba ne bintu bionso biakashikishibua, buonso buabi
Ke mutuvua bakuate bimenga bionsu bivua pa mikuna, buloba bua Ngilaade ne bua Bashane, too ne ku Salka ne Edreyi, bimenga bia mu bukalenga bua Oge, mu ditunga dia Bashane

Hakunvua Labana lumu lua Yakoba muana wa muan abo mukashi, yeye wakaya lubilu bua kumuakidila, wakamuhukila, wakatuangana n andi mishiku, wakalua n andi ku nsubu wandi Yeye wakambila Labana malu onso Labana wakamuambila ne Bulelela, wewe udi mufuba wanyi ne musunyi wanyi Yeye wakashala n andi to ngondo mujima
Wakalua ne mulume wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi; ne Alona ne bana bandi balume bakatentekasha bianza biabo ha mutu ha ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi
Ku bukole bua tshiji tshiebe, mayi kudisanga muaba umue
Diakamue kumonaye muena Ejipitu utuuta muanabu wa bena Ebrewu
Halua dituku dinudi nusabuka musulu wa Yadene bua kubuela mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, hashishe nenjadike mabue manene, nenuashinguile ne nshimete
Samala wakafua, ne Shaula wa ku Lehobota, hehi ne musulu wa Pelata, wakadia bukelenge buandi

Muakuidi nealue handi ku tshioshelu, neanyengabashe nshingu wandi, neamuoshile ha tshioshelu, mashi andi neamate hanshi ku luseke lua tshioshelu, yeye neumushe dibodi ne masala, nealele ku luseke lua tshioshelu ludi ku esete, mu muaba wa butue
Mikenji ya bena Levi Mushindu udi batuangaji mua kulambula milambu a
Biwakengesha bana banyi ba bakashi, anyi biwabaka bakashi bakuabo, kakuena mumanyi mukuabo hankatshi hetu, anu Nzambi udi mumanyi wa bualu buetu, meme ne wewe
Nakumana kunuambila dî dianyi, enzai nunku, nuangate makalu a tubalu tua mu buloba buetu bua kutuadilamu bana benu bakese ne bakashi benu, nuangate tatu wenu, nuhingane
Bena Izrayele bakuabu kabena mua kufika kabidi muaba wa tshijila to

Milambu bua ntupakanyi Nuenu bena Izrayele ne ndelanganyi yenu, panuikala batupakane, batupe ku umue wa ku mikenji yanyi imvua munumanyishe mukana mua Moshe ku kale too ne ku mpindiewu, pikala bantu batupakane nanku mu mpukapuka kabayi bamanye, nebangoshile bonsu pamue ngombe mulume bua mulambu wa kuosha
Kadi, bua muntu wanyi Moshe kabiena nanku to

Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Nuangate mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, nusungulule kana ka ngombe ne kana ka mukoko bia tshidimu tshimue, bidi kabiyi ne tshitema, bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, angata kabidi mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala bua kubishiha ku mesu kua Yehowa ne mulambu wa bukula busangisha ne manyi, bualu bua Yehowa neamueneke kunudi lelu

Bienza mukokeshi wa bantu bualu bubi ku mpukahuka budi Yehowa uhidia ne biahilabo, ne hamanyeye bualu bubi buakenzeye, neafue mpumbu wa mbushi udi kayi ne tshilema bu mulambu wandi, neatenteke tshianza tshiandi ha mutu ha mbushi, neamushihe kudibo bashihela mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ku mesu kua Yehowa, eu udi mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi
Yeye wakamba ne, Nansha
Bu mudi muntu kayi mua kubala lusenga ludi pa buloba, ke mudibu kabayi mua kubala ndelanganyi yebe
Mudimu wa Tshipwita mukulumpa udi utwadija padibo bitabuuja makookeshi enda kudi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpa ne udi ufika ku ndekeelu padibo bateeka Tshibambalu tshipiatshipia
Nunku Mose, muinu wa Yehowa, wakafua mu buloba bua Moaba muakamba Yehowa
Muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kumubuikidila n au bubi buakenzeye ku mpala kua Yehowa, ne bubi buandi buakenzeye nebuikale bubuikidibue
Mose wakolola tshianza tshiandi ha mai, ne hakatshia butuku mai akahingana kabidi ne bukole buau, Bena Ejipitu bakanyema ne Yehowa wakahita Bena Ejipitu bukole mu bunene bua mai
Nanku nubanjije mu bukalenga amu muntu udi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu nkayende musungule

Kadi bantu bahele kabena bikala munkatshi muenu; bualu bua Yehowa neanusankishe mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe bu buhianyi buenu; binunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kutumikila mikenji yonso inakunuambila lelu
Hakashikisha tumelo kunua mai, mulume eu wakahatula kakanu ka or ka bujitu bua tshituha tshia nshekele, ne nkanu ibidi ya ku maboko ya bujitu bua nshekele dikumi kabidi
Wewe neusumbe bahika balume ne bahika bakashi kudi bisamba bia bantu badi hehi n ebe
Amuteke tshianza pa mutu, amukosele muminu muaba awu kumpala kua Maweja Nangila
Ndi mua kuya kudi tatu wanyi bikala nsongalume kayi n anyi munyi
Ke muvua bankambua ba bena Levi ne ndelanganyi yabu nanku
Genese Kuledibua kua Isaka Yehowa wakahingana kudi Sala bu muakambeye, ne wakenzela Sala bu muakambeye
Mbua numunemeke, numutumikile, mununange, numuenzele mudimu ne muoyi wenu mujima, kabidi ne bukole buenu buonsu
Pikala Maweja Nangila mututabalele, neatubueje mu ditunga adi bua tuetu kudikuata
Nzambi wakamba ne, Monai, nakanuha midioko yonso ya ha buloba idi yela ntete, ne mitshi yonso idi ikuama mamuma adi ne ntete munda, bua kuikalabi bia kudia bienu
Dituku dia kumpala dia ngondu muisatu kunyima kua dipatuka mu Ejipitu, kufikabu mu tshipela tshia Sinayi

Yeye wakahuka kudiye hakadiye mu nshila, wakamuambila ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Lua biebe, ndi musue kulala n ebe, yeye kakamanya ne yeye udi ma muen andi Mukashi wakamukonka ne, Neumpe tshinyi hawalua kundi
Muena mudimu kunua
Numuke ne nuenu nuakadi bahika mu Ejipitu: nutumikile mikenji ei yonso
Kuinaminyi nzambi yabo, kuyitendeledi, kuenji mudibo benza, kadi ubiele hanshi, ushihe bibumba biabo
Wewe neusunsulule mukata eu, neuwelehu manyi tshintu etshi ntshintu tshia mulambu wa bukula

Kadi dia mbedi bobo kabayi banze kulala bena musoko wa Sodoma, ne banso ngalume ne bantu banunu ba nseke yonso bakanyunguluka nsubu, ba kabikila Lota, bakamukonka ne Balume aba bakulua kudi butuku ebu badi hanyi
Meme ndi mulami wa muanetu anyi
Yeye wakamba ne, Kanuena mua kuhita
Ya biebe, ubambile ne, Hinganai bienu ku ntenta yenu
Neambe ne: muntu ewu udi ne mikiya
Too ne bena mudimu benu, balume ne bakaji, badi ne bua kuikisha, bu munudi nuikisha nuenu
Uteke bintu ebi bionso mu bianza bia Alona ne mu bianza bia bana bandi balume, bobo nebabinyukule bu mulambu udibo banyukula ku mpala kua Yehowa
Bintu ebi bidi tshituha tshia bakuidi kudi bantu badi bafila milambu ya kuosha, nansha ngombe nansha mukoko: bobo nebahe bakuidi diboko ne matama abidi ne tshiadi
Yuda wakambila bana babo ne, Hatuashiha muan etu, ne hatuasokoka mashi andi, netushale ne tshintu kai
Mvua muenze bionsu abi, anu bua bubi bu nuvua benze
Kanudionyi ne bintu bidi bidikoka hanshi ha buloba, kanudienzedi bibi ne bintu bidi ne bukoya, kanudinyangi ne bintu ebi
Pashishe netusabuke musulu wa Yardene, bua tufike mu ditunga, didibu batupe kudi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu
Bena Isalele kabalu ha buihi ne ntenta wa kusambakena bua kabadituadidi bubi buabo, kabafu
Tuvua bamonemu ne bantu ba mpolondu, ndelanganyi ya Anake
Bungi bua balume ba mu ngondo umue tô ne ha mutu buakadi binunu bisambombo ne nkama ibidi
Bualu bantu aba mbamane kumona butumbi buanyi, ne malu a dikema andi mubenzele mu Ejipitu ne mu tshipela
Ekesode Badi Basa Tshitendelelu Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Halua dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo wa kumudilu, ushimike ntenta wa kusambakena
Padidi ditampakane ku tshintu tshijima, udi ujadika ne: tshintu atshi ntshipie mikiya, bualu utshikuate butu budi kabuyi mua kumusha

Kusombesha Bahele Bintu Bikalaku muntu muhele, umue wa bana benu, ku mbelu kua muntu yonso mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe, kanukoleshi mitshima yenu, kanubuikidi tshianza tshienu kudi muan enu udi muhele; kadi nubulule tshianza tshienu kudiye, numusombeshe bintu bidiye musue bua kushikisheye n abi malu andi
Bule bua tshilulu ne tshilulu nebuikale coudées makumi abidi ne muanda mukulu, ne butshiama buatshi coudées mai, bilulu bionso nebikale ne luidi lumue
Maweja Nangila kuebeja ne: Udi muenze nanku bua tshinyi
Yeye wakamukudimuna di ne, Ndi muana wa Betuele, muana mulume wa Mileka, wakaleleleye Naho
Nudiundishe mudimu wabo, bawenze, nunku kabitabushi mei a mashimi
Muntu yonso udi usangisha bintu ebi bua kudienzela manananshi, nebamumushe munkatshi mua bana babo
Nudi mua kubidia pamue ne bana bebe ba bakaji
Yeye waka tuma nyunyu wa tshikololo, tshiakalembelela tô ne hakûma mai ha buloba

Kanungu ka Ditangilula dia dîyi nansha dimwe kadieena mwa kwenzeka tshikondo tshia Bukalenga bwa tshimpitshimpi anyi tshia Bukalenga bwa bilwilu, nansha tshikondu tshia bumfumu bwa ditunga bwa tshitupa tshiipi anyi padi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpa bipanga mwa kubweeja bisangilu mu budikadidi
Yehowa wakamukonka ne, Mufuki wa mukana mua bantu nganyi
Pashishe wowe mayi
Abrahame kumukonka kabidi ne: Misangu mikuabu udi mua kusangana bantu bakane anu makumi anayi, newenze tshinyi
Batuale kabidi ngombe mulume wa kubakobolola nende, mikoku ibidi ya bimpanga, ne tshisaka tshia mampa kaayi mela buanga
Bena Izrayele kupatuka mu Ejipitu, balondangane mu bisamba biabu

Biamba muhika ne, Ndi musue mukelenge wanyi ne mukashi wanyi ne bana banyi, tshiena musue kuheta budishikaminyi, nunku mukelenge wandi nealue handi kudi balumbuluishi, nealue handi ku tshibi anyi ku tshibanda tshia tshibi ne mukelenge wandi neatubuishe ditshu diandi ne tshiamu ne yeye neamukuatshile mudimu tshiendelele
Mvidi Mukulu kuamba ne: Bikunyibua bitoloke pa buloba, bisosa bidi biela nzeba ne mitshi idi ikuama bimuma bia mishindu yonsu
Diasa dia tshisumbu tshia kabumwe didi tshibawu katshiyi kukupula tshia dipangila dia ditunga tshinyokibwa kudi mêyi ne mikandu
Yeye wakela di diandi nunku kudi muntu muibidi ne muisatu ne kudi bonso bakadi balonda ne bisumbu bia bintu ne, Nuambile Esau nunku hanuasangakena n andi
Bakimba dina dia mai dikuabo, bakaditandila kabidi

Muakuidi neafile umue bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mukuabo bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia Muakuidi neafile milambu ei bua kumubuikidila n ai bubi ku mpala kua Yehowa bualu bua bukoya bua katshetshi kandi
Bakumuka mu Lefidima bakashikama mu tshihela tshia Sinai
Bidimu bia tshiole muanda mutekete biakabanga kulua bu muakamba Yosefe, biole biakadi mu maloba onso, kadi mu Ejipitu muakadi mushale bintu bia kudia
Nuenu nuenze mei anyi ne mikenji yanyi, nubilonde meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Mose Udi Ubavuluisha Mikenji ya Isalele Â mmei akela Mose Bena Isalele: â mmalu ne â mmei ne ei mmikenji wakambila Mose Bena Isalele, hakaluhukabo mu Ejipitu, dishiya dia Yadene, mu tshibanda tshidi tshitangilangane ne Bete peô, mu buloba bua Sihona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole, wakadi ushikama mu Heshebona, wakashihabo kudi Mose ne Bena Isalele hakaluhukabo mu Ejipitu
Mayi onsu andamuke mashi
Mutuangaji oshe bintu bionsu abi pa tshilambuilu, bualu mmulambu wa dipembu dimpe moshila Maweja Nangila
Nanku tuyayi kubondakaja muakulu wabu, bua bapange mua kumyuangana munkatshi muabu
Muena mudimu wa Abrahame kubandamuna ne: Maweja Nangila mmumane kungendesha diakalenga
Kadi, ubaleje muaba udibu mua kuimanyina kuinshi kua mukuna
Meme kulomba Maweja Nangila ne: Mvidi Mukulu Maweja Nangila, kubutudi bantu badi bebe, baudi mupikule, mupatule mu Ejipitu ku bukole ne ku bumfumu buebe
Ke nuwuaye mumuke ne bana bende ba bakaji babidi bua kuya kusokoma nabu mu lubuebue pa mikuna

Biatshidiabo dituku disatu, bualu ebu budi bubi, tshiena ngitabusha mulambu, muntu yonso udi ûdia neadituadile bubi buandi, bualu bua yeye wakuona tshintu tshijila tshia Yehowa, nebumushe muntu au munkatshi mua bana babo
Udi mua kutubutula anu patupu nanku anyi

Ekesode Mose ne Alona Badi ku Mpala kua Palo Ku nyima kua malu â Mose ne Alona bakalua kudi Palô, bakamuambila ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi Wamba ne, Ulekele bantu banyi, baye mu tshihela bua kudia bidia ku mesu kuanyi
Hanakabanda ku mukuna bua kuangata mabue akadi ne mei a tshihungidi tshia Yehowa mafundahu, nakashala ku mukuna matuku makumi anai munya ne butuku; tshiakadia bidia, tshiakanua mai

Dibadika Tshibilu tshia Dipita dia Maweja Nangila Mu ngondu wa kumpala wa tshidimu tshivua tshilonda tshidimu tshivua bena Izrayele bapatuka mu Ejipitu Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe mu tshipela tshia Sinayi ne: Bena Izrayele nebenze tshibilu tshia Dipita dia Maweja Nangila amu matuku mabafundile
Bena Ejipitu nebajadike ne: meme ndi Maweja Nangila
Wakenza bilulu bia miosa ya mbushi dikumi ne tshilulu tshimue bua kuteka ha mutu ha nsubu
Tshiena mua kuenza bualu, wewe kuyi muanji kufikamu
Yokshane ke tatuende wa Saba ne wa Dedane
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Olola diboku, mpasu ipatuke mu ditunga dijima dia Ejipitu, idie bintu bionsu bidi mu madimi, bivua mabue a mvula kaayi manyange
Kanuenji mudimu dituku adi, edi ndituku dia kubuikila bubi buenu ku mesu kua Yehowa
Kuvudi muan abo ne tatu ebe mulume bilulu, kuyi ha buihi ne mukashi wandi, yeye udi mukashi wa tatu ebe mukuabo
Bena bilengulengu bakambila Palo ne, Bualu ebu budi bu munu wa Yehowa, kadi mutshima wa Palô wakakoleshibua, yeye kakabunvuila, bu muakamba Yehowa
Uvua musangishe kudi bamuanabute ba bena Izrayele nkanu
Njiji ayi kunyanga ditunga dijima dia Ejipitu
Nuenze mudimu wenu matuku asambombo, kadi nuikishe dituku dia muanda mutekete: nuikishe mu tshidimu tshia kukuna bintu ne mu tshidimu tshia kuhuola bintu
Awu kuimita difu, kulelaye Kayine
Nebatshine, padibu bumvue bionsu bidi bienzeka ebi
Bakumuka mu Oboto, bakashikama mu Iye habalima, mu tshihela tshidi ku mpala kua Moaba, kudi diba dihatuka
Bena lukuna betu kuamba ne: Netubalonde, tubapete

Labana wakambila Yakoba ne, Bana aba bakashi mbana banyi, bana bakalelabo mbana banyi, ne bimuna mbianyi, ne bintu bionso biudi n abi mbianyi, ne lelu ndi mua kuenzela bana banyi ba bakashi ne bana bakalelabo tshinyi
Mose wakamba ne, Yehowa, nda nkusengelela ne, Utume muntu ûdi musue kutuma
Nzambi wakambila Noa ne, Kunshikidilu kua bantu bonso kuakufika ku mpala kuanyi bualu bua buloba budi bûle tente ne mayoyo bualu buabo, mona, nembajimishe ne buloba hamue
Matuku awu kanuenji midimu mikuabu to, anu ya kulamba biakudia
Bana ba balume ba Shimeona, Yemuele ne Yamina ne Ohada ne Yakina ne Sofa ne Shaula, muana wa mukashi wa Bena Kanana
Nomba Mpungi ya Tshiamu tshia Argent Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Enza biebe mpungi ibidi ya tshiamu tshia argent tshiakafulabo, wewe neubikile n ai bantu bua kutendelela ne bua kubisha luendu
Uvua nenu, munulame bimpe mu luendu mu tshipela tshinene atshi, bidimu makumi anayi, kanuyi nukengela tshintu
Wakenza tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi kudi bantu ba lungenyi lule, bu muakenzabo efoda ne bintu bia or ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzu ne bia lin muimpe
Mose ne Alona bakenza bu muakamba Yehowa, bakenza nunku
Kadi nenubenzele nunku: nushihe bishihelu biabo, nuele mabue abo hanshi adibo batendelela, nutahe Bashela babo, nuoshe mpingu yabo ne kahia
Awu kumuangata bu muanende, kumuinyika dina ne: Diende mMoshe, bualu ndi mumupatule mu mayi
Kuvudi muana mukashi wa mukashi wa tatu ebe bilulu, yeye udi muan enu mukashi
Matuku onsu adiye mudijidile, kena mua kusemena pabuipi ne tshitalu, nansha tshia tatuende, tshia mamuende, tshia muanabu wa balume nansha wa bakaji, bualu udi mua kupeta mikiya

Malu a Mukelenge Wabo Hanuabuela mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, hanuabuhiana, bakashikamamu, hanuamba ne, Tudisunguile mukelenge bua kuteka ku mutu kuetu bu bisamba bikuabo bidi bituela munkatshi; nenutekele mukelenge ku mutu kuenu anu yeye udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Usungula; nutekele anu wa munkatshi mua bana benu bu mukelenge wenu; kanuteki muenyi udi kayi muan enu ku mutu kuenu
Bena Ejipitu mbamane kulondela bena Kenaane malu aa

Bikala muntu ne tshima mu dikoba, ne bikala tshima tshiondahibue, ne bikala muaba watshi mutoke tô, anyi ditoba ditoke, nunku yeye neadileshe kudi muakuidi, muakuidi neatangile, ne bielanganeye meji ne disama diakabuela mu munyinyi wa mubidi, ne miosa idi miandamuke mitoke tô, nunku muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane edi ndisama dia nsudi diakamueneka mu tshima

Bintu bia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu bidi bana balume ba Gêshona balama nebikale ntenta, ne tshilulu tshidibo bateka ha mutu, ne bilulu bia ku bibi bia ntenta wa kusambakena, ne bilulu bia luhangu ne bilulu bidibo bateka ku mbelu kua luhangu, hehi ne nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ne hehi ne tshioshelu, ne nshinga ya ku luhangu bua mudimu wa tshitendelelu
Mpindiewu udi ne difu
Mutuangaji atue munu mu mashi a mbuji awu, aalabe ku matumba matalame adi ku tshilambuilu tshia milambu ya kuosha
Genese Yosefe wakadiela ha mpala wa tatu wandi, wakadila, wakatuangana n andi mishiku

Tangila, meme nakulua bu muhumbishi webe, bualu bua nshila webe kena muakane ku mesu kuanyi, mpunda wakuntangila, wakusesuka kundi nusangu ei isatu bu mpunda muhidie kusesuka kundi, nakadi kukushiha wewe, ne nakadi kusungila mpunda
Kanungu ka Mukulakaja ne mulema badi ne tshia kubakuba mu mushindu wa sungansunga pa kutangila majinga abo a mubidi, a lungenyi ne a bibidilu bia mulowu
Bualu mmulambu wa kuosha, udi ne dipembu dimpe didi disankisha Maweja Nangila
Kadi munyinyi wa ngombe awu uvua mushale, tshiseba, bia munda ne bunyawu, Moshe kumuka nabi mu mitanda, kuya kubiosha amu muvua Maweja Nangila mumuambile
Muana muibidi ke Eliyezere, mmumue ne: Mvidi Mukulu wa bankambua banyi mmuntabalele lelu, mumpandishe ku lufu lua kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu
Bana ba balume ba Shimeona Yemuele ne Yamina ne Obada ne Yakina ne Soha ne Shaula, muana wa balume wa mukashi wa Bena Kanana, â mmeku a Shimeona

Bana balume ba Alona bakuidi nebateke kahia ha tshioshelu, balonge nkunyi mu kahia, ne bana balume ba Alona bakuidi nebalonge bituha ne mutu ne dianyi ha nkunyi mu kahia kadi ha tshioshelu, kadi nebuvuwe bintu bia munda ne bioku ne mai; ne muakuidi neoshile bintu bionso ha tshioshelu, bu mulambu udibo bosha ha kahia bu tshintu tshidi tshi tua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Nganyi udi bu wewe, udi ne butumbi bua tshijila, udi utshinyisha bantu ne bienzedi bia butumbi, udi wenza malu a kukema
Hashala buloba, tshidimu tshia kukuna bintu ne tshidimu tshia kunowa bintu ne tshidimu tshia mashika ne tshidimu tshia luya ne munya ne mîdima kabiena bihanga tshiendelele nansha
Muanende Elazare kumupingana ku mudimu wa butuangaji
Bavua babikoleshe ne bimana bile
Bualu ebu buakusankisha bimpe, nakasungula balume dikumi ne babidi, muntu ku tshisamba muntu ku tshisamba

Nansha nanku, pa kupanga diumvwangana munkatshi mwa bibambalu biônso bibidi ebi, badi mwa kwanyisha dîyi kudi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwanfwanka panyima pa dikonkonona dia ndekeelu anu pikala tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka tshianyisha; c mêyi malongolodi badi mwa kuapatula anu pikala Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu, pa dilomba dia Mulombodi wa Ditunga, kajadika diumvwangana diawu ne Dîyi dikulu, mu tshipungu tshia matuku dikumi ne ataanu

Mikenji ya bena Levi Arone ne bana bende ba balume badi batuadija mudimu Dituku divua dilonda matuku muanda mutekete avuabu bajidile Arone ne bana bende ba balume, Moshe kubabikila pamue ne bakulu ba bena Izrayele
Numpeshe muaba, muenu munu, wa kujika muena kuanyi
Maweja Nangila kuandamuna ne: Nanku, umushe bantu bonsu muaba udi Kora, Datane ne Abirame basombe

Lewitiki Bienza muntu bualu bubi, yeye mumane kuditshiha ne muikale mumanyi wa bualu, mubumone ne mesu andi, mubumanye mu mutshima wandi kadi yeye muhidie kumanyisha bantu, yeye neadituadile dihila dia bubi buandi
Yehowa wakamuambila kabidi ne, Teka tshianza mu tshiadi tshiebe
Ahiezê, muana mulume wa Amishadai, mukelenge wa bana ba Dana, wakafua bintu dituku dia dikumi
Uvuluke dituku dia Lumingu, udijidile
Au mmeku a Bena Lubena, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi anai ne bisatu ne nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi asatu
Bualu bua bobo badi bu tshisamba tshia bantu badi kabayi ne lungenyi, kabena ne dijingulula dia malu munda muabo

Yeye wakabambila ne, Unvuai, ndi nnusengelela, tshiota tshinakulota, bualu bua monai, biakadi basuika bisumbu bia blé mu budimi, ne monai, tshisumbu tshianyi tshiakabika, tshiakimana, ne bisumbu bienu biakela tshianza munkatshi, biakatshikukuila
Kakuena mukuabu udi mua kuenza malu a kukema
Dutelonone Mose Udi Uvudishila Bisamba bia Bena Isalele Masanka Â mmasanka akavudishila Mose, muntu wa Nzambi, Bena Isalele, diambedi yeye kayi muanze kufua
Meme nkayanyi ndi mua kutuala malu enu ne bujitu buenu ne kutanda kuenu munyi

Hakatangila Yosefe ne tatu wandi wakatentekasha tshianza tshiandi tshia balume ha mutu ha Efelayima, bualu ebu kabuakamusankisha, ne yeye wakabisha tshianza tshia tatu wandi, wakamba kutshiumusha ku mutu wa Efelayima, wakamba kutshiteka ku mutu wa Manashe
Padiku tshipumbishi, udi ufila bukookeshi kudi Minisistila kavulambedi

Muntu udi ulenga bianza ha mubidi wa muntu mufue neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane tô matuku muanda mutekete, yeye neadilengeshe ne mai au dituku disatu, ne halua dituku dia muanda mutekete yeye neikale muakane, kadi biahidieye kudilengesha dituku disatu, halua dituku dia muanda mutekete yeye kena wikala muakane
Mose wakamuambila ne, Hanaluhuka mu musoko eu, nengolole bianza bianyi kudi Yehowa, makubakuba neashike, mabue a nvula neashike kabidi, bualu bua kukumanyisha ne buloba budi bua Yehowa

Mêyi ne mikandu adi aleeja ngikadilu wa beena mudimu ne adi akajilula maalu a sungasunga adi atangila bulongolodi bwa mêyi ni mikandu bwa bisumbu bia beena mudimu ne dienza dia midimu didi dikeba kwikala ne dibeji dia kalasa kapwekela ne dia kalasa kakulumpe
Nsongakaji kuya kubikila mamuende mene wa muana

Tshibilu tshia tuzubu tua Bisasa Nuenu bamane kushipula ntete ya kuenza bukula, bamane kukama kabidi tumuma tua mvinyo, bajikije, nuenze tshibilu tshia tuzubu tua Bisasa matuku muanda mutekete malondangane
Abalama wakamba ne, Mukelenge Yehowa, wewe neumpe tshintu kai, bualu bua meme tshiena ne muana, ne muhianyi wa bintu bianyi udi Elieze, muena Damaseke

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Utatshishe Bena Midiyana, ubashihe, bualu bua bobo badi banutatshisha ne budimu, bakanushima mu bualu bua Peô ne mu bualu bua Kozebi, muana mukashi wa mukelenge wa mu Midiyana, muan abo mukashi, wakamushihabo mu dituku diakalua disama bualu bua Peô

Nzambi wakamba ne, Mai avudishe bifukibua bia bungi bidi ne muoyo, ne nyunyu myunge mulu Nzambi wakafuka bintu binene bia mu mai ne bintu bionso bidi ne muoyo bia mu mai bu mudi mishindu yabi, ne nyunyu yonso bu mudi mushindu wai Nzambi wakabimona ne, Mbimpe Nzambi wakabisankisha ne, Nulelangane, nulue bia bungi, nûshe mai manene tente, nyunyu ikumbane ha buloba Dilolo ne dinda biakadi dituku ditanu
Maweja Nangila kuambila kabidi Moshe ne: Padi bena Levi bakumbaja bidimu makumi abidi ne bitanu, ubateke bua bangenzele mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena

Nyunyu ei idi mibi kunudi, kanudi nyunyu ei nyunyu wa mukanku ne nyunyu wa gypaête ne nyunyu wa orfraie, ne nyunyu wa milan mufike ne wa milan mukunze ne mushindu wonso wa tshikololo ne nyunyu wa autriche ne nyunyu wa chat huant ne nyunyu wa mouette ne wa nkumbikumbi ne nyunyu wa tshihungulu ne nyunyu wa choutte ne nyunyu wa ibis, ne nyunyu wa pélican ne nyunyu mutoke utu wadia bintu bibole ne nyunyu wa cormoran ne nyunyu wa cigogne ne nyunyu wa ya héron ne nyunyu wa huppe ne nyunyu wa mudima

Yeye wakabavudishila disanka dituku adi, wamba ne, Isalele neavudishile bakuabo disanka bualu buenu, neambe ne, Nzambi anuvuishe disanka dia Efelayima ne dia Manashe, yeye wakateka Efelayima ku mpala kua Manashe
Bonsu babidi nebamueneke anu bu bena tshibawu
Muntu yonso udi ulala ne muku wandi udi ne mulau
Nsongakashi wakaya lubilu, wakambila ba mu nsubu wa mamu andi malu au
Nunku nushale bana ba balume bakese bonso badi munkatshi muabo ne mukashi yonso ukadi mumanyibue kudi mulume
Ndi nnupeshadi
Padi dituku dia muanda mukulu dikumbana, udi wangata nkudimba ibidi, nansha tumanda nkutshi tubidi, ubipeshila mutuangaji mu mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena, kumpala kua Maweja Nangila

Yehowa wakangambila kabidi ne, Nakatangila bantu aba ne mona, badi bantu ba tshitshu; undekele, bua meme neashihe, nenjimishe dina diabo muinshi mua diulu; meme nenkuvuishe wewe tshisamba tshidi tshibahita bunene ne bukole

Dîyi ditudi nadio edi didi dijadikulula budikadidi bwa bukalenga bwa bandumbulula budi bulombola kudi Kapangu ka ku mutu komekela mianda ya bandumbulula kadi, mpindiewu, kenza amu ne bamajisitila bôbo nkayabu
Mutumibue wa Maweja Nangila kumubela wamba ne: Pingana anu kudi Sarayi, mfumuebe wa mudimu
Mulambu wa dinua tshibalu Mulambu wa dinua tshibalu badi baulambula mushindu ewu: Ke mulambu wa tshijila menemene
diaasa dia tulasa tupwekele, tubandila, twa ku mutu ne tukulumpa;
Bana ba balume ba Kohata: Amalama ne Yisehâ ne Hebelone ne Uziele, bidimu bia Kohata biakadi lukama ne makumi asatu ne bisatu
Nuyidie muaba wa tshijila
Wewe nkayebe neudimuene amu mpindiewu mundi mbikumbaja
Mose wakaluhuka kudi Palô, wakalomba Yehowa
Katataka bikai bienu, nusabuke kasulu ka Zelede; tuakasabuka kasulu ka Zelede
Kanungu ka Mweena Kongu yônso udi ne tshia kukumbaja mudibi bikengela makanyika ende kumpala kwa Mbulamatadi
Diba adi mayi aa a kutshipa nawu muntu, akutue munda, akuwuje difu, ushale nkumba

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula; ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mule tente ne musenga wa manananshi, ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia; ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuyifila n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Abidana, muana mulume wa Gideoni

Muena mudimu kuela Maweja Nangila tuasakidila, mutue binu panshi, wamba ne: Ndi ngela Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wa mfumuanyi Abrahame, tuasakidila, bualu wakumbaji bionsu bivuaye mulaye mfumuanyi Abrahame

Olodonase udi uteeka Mbulamatadi wa tshimpitshimpi anyi mbulamatadi wa bilwilu udi ujika bwenzeji, kakuyi ditontolola, panyima pa dijika dia tshipungu tshidibu bateeka mu kalongu kisâtu ka kanungu aka, pa kumbusha pikala Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bukulumpe, pa dilomba dia Mulombodi wa ditunga ne dipangadika dia Tshipangu tshia baminisitila, bifila dianyisha dia kulunguluja bwa mpoolu milondangana ya matuku dikumi ne ataanu
Mvidi Mukulu kumuela lupemba mu malu onsu
Kanumupadi tshintu tshidiye ulomba
Ke budimi buvua Abrahame musumbe kudi bena Iti

Pashishe nuye mu nzubu wa Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, muaba wikalaye musungule bua nuenu kumonangana nende, ne bua kulambulamu tshia dikumi tshia bintu ebi: ntete ya kuenza bukula, maluvu a mvinyo, mafuta, bamuanabute ba ngombe, ba mikoku ne ba mbuji
Ka dî binuahidia kuenza nunku, monai, nuakuenzela Yehowa bualu bubi, numanye bienu ne, Bualu bubi buenu nebunukuate bulelela
Bikaleye kayi ne muana wa bakashi, yeye neaheshe bana babo buhianyi buandi
Mamuende wa Betuyele uvua Milka
Bualu mputa udi upatuka tufina mushindu ewu, udi ne mikiya, uleja disama dia nsudi
Nenudie nukute
Tuetu bashipe mikoku, mbuji ne ngombe yonsu itudi nayi, nansha tuetu baloba mishipa yonsu ya mu mayi manene, kabiena mua kukumbana bantu aba to
Pashishe kuitshikijaye mashi avua mashale kuinshi kua tshilambuilu
Kadi, wewe olola dikombu diebe pa mayi, apanduluke
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Nenkutumine muan a mbushi wa mu tshisumbu tshinyi
Muanjelo wa Nzambi wakungambila mu tshiota tshianyi ne, Yakoba, nakuitaba ne, Ndiku
Bakatekahu muonshi wa bleu muhindakana, bakatshisuika ha tshilulu, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Butuku abu, meme Maweja Nangila nempitshile mu ditunga dia Ejipitu
Dina dia muanabu ne Yabale divua Yubale
Lea wakimita difu kabidi, wakalelela Yakoba muana muisambombo
Kabidi ndi mumone mudibu babakengesha kudi bena Ejipitu
Maweja Nangila kuenza tshishima atshi, kutuma njiji mipite bungi

Yakoba wakafua mulambu wa kuosha ba kalua ku mukuna, Wakabikila bantu bandi bua kudiabo bidia, bakadia bidia, bakalala ku mukuna butuku abu Labana wakabika hatshiatshia, wakatuangana mishiku ne bana bandi ba balume ne bana bandi ba bakashi, wakabavudishila disanka Labana wakahingana ku muaba wandi
Muanjelo wa Nzambi, wakadi wenda ku mpala kua Bena Isalele, wakumukaku, wakaya ku nyima kuabo, ne difutu diakumuka ku mpala kuabo kabidi, diakimana ku nyima kuabo
Bena Izrayele bonsu kukeba mua kubasa mabue, kubashipa

Mu ditu ku adi diodimue Noa ne bana bandi, Sheme ne Hama ne Yafete, bana ba Noa, ne mukashi wa Noa, ne bakashi basatu ba bana bandi bakabuela mu buatu, bobo ne nyama yonso ya mushindu ne mushindu ne bimuna bionso bia mushindu ne mushindu, ne bintu bionso budi bidikoka hanshi bia mushindu ne mushindu, ne nyunyu yonso ya mushindu ne mushindu, tshionso tshidi ne mahuahua

Kadi biajidileye budimi buandi ku nyima kua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, muakuidi neamubadile mushinga bu bungi bua bidimu bidi bishala tô ne halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, nebamuhuekeshile mushinga wakasanganabo
Bantu bonso batu benza malu mabi au nebumushibue munkatshi mua bana babo
Nuvuluke dituku dia Lumingu, didi dituku dia tshijila kunudi, mundi yonso udi wona dituku adi nebamushihe, mundi yonso udi wenza mudimu dituku adi, nebamumushe munkatshi mua bana babo

Mose wakambila Alona ne bana bandi balume ne, Nulambe munyinyi mu mai a kahia ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena, nûdie ne mampa adi mu tshisaka tshidi ne bintu bia tshijila bu munakamba ne, Alona ne bana bandi balume nebaudie

Biamu bia mu Tshitendelelu Bakasangisha or wa kuenza n ai mudimu wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu ntalanta makumi abidi ne tshitema, ne nshekele nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi asatu, bu muakadi nshekele wa mu nsubu wa Nzambi
Sala wakimita difu, wakalelela Abalahama muana mulume mu bununu buandi mu tshikondo tshiakamuambila Nzambi
; Dut
Pikalabi nanku, nudi mua kusumbisha tshia dikumi tshia biakudia ebi, kuya kulambula makuta muaba wa tshijila wa Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Bantu badi ne Buowa Ek

Pashishe bintu bionsu bia ngombe bidi bishale, bu tshiseba, munyinyi, mutu, bikonu, bia munda ne bunyawu bonsu budimu, mutuangaji umuke nabi ku mitanda, aye kubioshila pa nkunyi ya kapia, muaba musunguluke udibu bimansha butu bua ku tshilambuilu
Bamfumu ba bena Izrayele kuya kumanyisha Moshe bualu abu

Dituku dia dikumi dia ngondo eu wa muanda mutekete nenuikale ne disangisha dia tshijila, nenunyingalashe mioyo yenu, kanuenji mudimu, ka dî nenufile mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia udi utua dihembu kudi Yehowa muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne bana balume ba mikoko muanda mutekete ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi, bintu bisatu bia dikumi ku muana wa ngombe, ne bintu bibidi bia dikumi ku tshimpanga, ne tshintu tshia dikumi ku muana wa mukoko tô ne ku bana ba mikoko muanda mutekete, ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi, nenufile bintu ebi ku mutu kua mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne milambu ya kuosha ha kahia ya buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bukula ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua
Wakamona ngombe muanda mutekete yakadi ne manyi a bungi, yakabanda mu mai, yakadi idia mashinde malehe
Tshisamba tshia Dane:
Wewe neumuvuishe butumbi buebe, bua Bena Isalele bonso batumikile dî diandi
Kushalabi muaba wa kujika bena diende bonsu
Balami ba bimuna bia Bena Gelâ bakatandangana ne balami ba bimuna bia Isaka, bakamba ne, Dina dia mai edi ndietu
Mikenji ya bena Levi Mikenji idi itangila madilu Nadabe ne Abiku bavua bana ba balume ba Arone
Kulalaye mu nzubu muende butaka
Isaka wakalua n andi mu ntenta wa mamu wandi, Sala, yeye wakangata Lebeka, wakalua mukashi wandi Isaka wakamunanga, ne mutshima wandi wakasambibua bua lufu lua mamu wandi
Wewe neulue ne bana bandi balume, ubaluatshishe bikowelu
Yehowa neanuihatshile bena lukuna badi bahika ku mesu kuenu; nebalue kunudi mu nshila umue, nebanyeme ku mesu kuenu mu nshila muanda mutekete
Yakoba wakashala ku nyima nkayandi muntu wakaluangana n andi bibula to ne hakatshia butuku
Sheme mumane kulela Arpakshade, kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu nkama itanu

Yeye neamushe dianyi dionso dia muana wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne dianyi didi ha mutu ha bintu bia munda, tumuma tubidi ne dianyi didi ha mutu hatu hehi ne bituntuku bia bibelu ne lukutu lua mutshima ne lua tumuma neanumushe, bu mudibo bumusha dianyi dia muana wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kuikisha n au ditalala, muakuidi neabioshe ha tshioshelu tshia kahia
Kukonkaye uvua muenze bibi ne: Udi utuuta mukuebe nanku bua tshinyi
Kutendeledi mvidie mikuabu to, anu meme

Dibadika dia bena Levi badi benza mudimu Nanku, Moshe ne Arone ne balombodi ba bena Izrayele, kubadika bantu ba bisamba bisatu bia bena Levi: tshisamba tshia Ngershone, tshia Kekate ne tshia Merari, bilondeshile meku abu ne bisamba biabu
Ke muvua Moshe mujidile tshilambuilu bua tshikale muaba wa kulambuila milambu ya kukobolola nayi bantu
Abalahama wakamuambila ne, Bualu bua nakuelangana meji ne, Bushuwa, ditshina dia Nzambi kadiena mu muaba eu, ne bobo nebanshihe bualu bua mukashi wanyi
Kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu nkama muanda mukulu
Mbulamatadi udi mwa kupeesha bisumbu bia tshidiidi lupetu lwa mbulamatadi bwa biôbi kwenza nalu didiswisha diabi bwa kusungudibwa anyi kwenza midimu yabi, mu bulongolodi bufila kudi mêyi ne mikandu
Netuambe tshinyi
Ahiezê muana mulume wa Amishadai neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Dana
Nunku wewe mubambile ne, Hanuanyukula bintu bidi bitamba buimpe, bintu ebi nebikale bibadibue kudi Bena Lewi bu bintu biakuvulangana ku tshishihuidi ne ha tshikaminu
Nebatekemu bintu bionsu bivuabu benza nabi mudimu bua kulambula milambu: mbabula, nsomu wa kuambula nende munyinyi, bikasu ne mabungu a kuela mayi a kumiamina
Bana balume ba Isalele bakalua mu tshisumbu tshia bantu bua kusumbabo bia kudia, bualu bua tshiole tshiakadi mu buloba bua Kanana
Au mmena a bana ba balume ba Alona Nadaba muan a bute ne Abihu ne Eleazâ ne Itamâ

Balume ne bakashi bakalua bungi buabo bakadi bitabusha mu mitshima yabo, bakalua ne tukanu tua ku matshu ne tukanu tua ku minu ne nkanu ya ku maboko ne bintu bionso bia or, muntu ne muntu wakalua ne kuha kua or kudi Yehowa
Nakuikala n ebe to bidimu ebi makumi abidi, mashina a mikoko ne mashina a mbushi kakatula mafu nansha, ne meme tshiakudia mbushi yebe ya bimpanga
Yeye wakamba ne, Bakuetu, ndi nnusengelela ne kanuenji bualu bubi nunku
kupangisha dijinga diônso dia kufikisha ku bukalenga bwa nkaya;
Ditunga dijima ndienu
Yeye wakamuela lusumuinu luandi ne, Balaka, bika biebe, unvua, ungunvuile, muana mulume wa Sipô: Nzambi kena bu muntu udi wamba mei a mashimi, kena bu muana wa muntu, bua kukudimuneye mutshima

Dituku dia kumudilu nenuikale ne disangisha dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu, kadi nenufile mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia kudi Yehowa bana babidi ba ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne bana balume ba mikoko muanda mutekete ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bintu bisatu bia dikumi ku ngombe ne bintu bibidi bia dikumi ku tshimpanga, ne tshintu tshia dikumi ku muana wa mukoko to ne ku bana bonso ba mikoko muanda mutekete, ne mulume wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi
Kumupeshabu munyinyi wa mafuta a ngombe, kabidi ne mukila, mafuta onsu adi malamate ku bia munda, tuonyi ne lutandatanda lua ku mutshima bia mukoku wa tshimpanga
Esawu kuandamuna ne: Bumuanabute kabuena bungambuluisha kabidi to
Shure udi pabuipi ne Ejipitu, mu njila wa ku Ashure

Bakaluangana ne Kedolaomê, mukelenge wa Elama, ne Tidala, mukelenge wa Goyima, ne Amalafele, mukelenge wa Shinâ, ne Aliyoka, mukelenge wa Elasa, ku luseke lukuabo bakelenge banai, ku luseke lukuabo batanu
Bakamuambila ne, Yosefe utshidi ne muoyo, ne yeye udi mukelenge wa buloba bua Ejipitu Mutshima wandi wakahandika yeye kakitabusha di diabo
Bualu padibu bapia mikiya, badi mua kunyanga ntenta undi musombe munkatshi muabu, kupeta njiwu ya lulu
Bantu kukuluka ne muoyi mu kandondu ka bafue, pamue ne bintu biabu bionsu
Nudimuke, kanulekedi Muena Lewi tô matuku onso anudi nushala mu buloba buenu
Nuenu nuakadibisha mu miaba ya batatu benu bu bana ba bantu babi bakavulangana, bua kudiundisha bukole bua tshiji tshia Yehowa kudi Isalele
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Tshiena ne bualu bua kudimuka bua kuamba dî diakuteka Yehowa mukana muanyi, anyi
Mose wakambila Yehowa ne, Wewe wakenzela mundi webe bibi nunku bualu kai
Mêyi ne mikandu adi afila mishindu ya kulondeshilula mapa aa
Munudi nubapumbisha mua kuenzabu midimu yabu mbishi

Mona, mukuabo wa Bena Isalele wakalua kudi bana babo ne mukashi wa Bena Midiyana ku mesu kua Mose ne ku mesu kua tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele, hakadibo badila ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena
Elishama, muana mulume wa Amihuda, mukelenge wa bana ba Efelayima, wakafua bintu dituku dia muanda mutekete

Eu udi mudimu wa bana balume ba Kohata udibo benza ne bintu bia tshijila mu ntenta wa kusambakena, hayabo ku luendu Alona neabuelemu ne bana bandi balume nebatuhe tshilulu tshikudika, nebabituale hatshi mushete wa Nzambi, nebâteke tshibuikilu tshia biseba bia nkonge ha mutu hatshi, nebâteke tshilulu tshifike ha mutu hatshi kabidi, nebabueshemu mitshi ya mushete
Mose ne Alona bakenza bu muakamba Yehowa, Alona wakabisha mulangala, wakakuma mai akadi mu musulu, ku mesu kua Palô ne ku mesu kua bantu bandi, mai onso akadi mu musulu akakudimuka mashi
Yerede mumane kukumbaja bidimu lukama makumi asambombu ne bibidi, kulelaye Enoke
Dituku edi nedikale dituku dia lumingu dia kuikisha, ne nuenu nenujinge mu mitshima yenu, nuikishe bienu ku dilolo dia matuku tshitema a ngondo eu tô ne ku dilolo dia matuku dikumi
Nunku nuenze bualu, ebu bu tshilele tshienu mu ngondo watshi ku tshidimu ku tshidimu
Kabakepeshi mudimu wenu to
Muntu yonsu udi ulenga muena disama adi, neasukule bilamba biende, wowe mayi
Kadi kanudi mashi andi; nuahongolole hanshi ha buloba bu mai
Mona, nakuha Bena Lewi tshintu tshia dikumi tshionso tshia mu Isalele bu buhianyi buabo bua mudimu udibo benza mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Umuinyike Ismayele
Kadi nebapikule muanabute wa balume wa muntu, nebapikule kabidi muanabute wa nyama udi ne mikiya

Yisakâ udi bu nyama wa mpunda mukole, udi ulala hankatshi ha mpangu ya mikoko, wakatangila muaba wa kulala ne, Mmuimpe wakatangila buloba ne, Mbuimpe, wakahuekesha diaha diandi bua kumema bujitu, wakalua bu muhika wa mudimu mukole
Bu meme muolole tshianza tshianyi, mufume disama dikole kudi bantu bebe, wewe wakadi kujimina ha buloba
Nanku Moshe ne Arone kuya mu Ejipitu, kusangisha bakulu bonsu ba bena Izrayele
Isaka wakalua mu nshila wa ku Bê laha loi, bualu bua yeye wakadi ushikama ku buloba bua ku Sude
Reyu mumane kukumbaja bidimu makumi asatu ne bibidi, kulelaye Seruga

bitadi bia mbulamatadi pa makookeshi a bantu,bitadi bia mbulamatadi pa midimu ya bantu ne bitadi bia kufuta polovensa ne misoko bu mudi tshitadi tshia malaba, tshitadi tshia pa makasa a mushinga wa difutshisha ne tshitadi tshia pa tudiendelandela;
Abrahame kuamba kabidi ne: Ndi nkolesha muoyi bua kuakula ne Maweja Nangila wanyi, nansha bu mundi muikale muntu tshianana, tshintu tshia lupitapita
Bualu Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wenu, udi munkatshi muenu
Diulu dijima, buloba ne bionsu bidipu, mbintu bia Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Moshe kubafikila munda
Nzambi wakamba ne, Etshi tshidi tshimanymu tshia tshihungidi tshindi nteka hankatshi hetu ne bintu bionso bidi n enu to ne tshiendelele
Ke pandi nnupesha mukenji ewu mpindiewu

Mukalenga wa ditunga udi ukengesha bena Izrayele ne midimu mivule Anu dituku adi, Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kukandika bena Ejipitu ne bena Izrayele, bavua ne kulombola mudimu wa bantu ne: Kanuena mua kukebela kabidi bena Izrayele bisosa bia kuenza nabi madiotu, bu munuvua nubapesha kuonsu eku to
Genese Yakoba wakunvua mei a bana ba balume ba Labana bamba ne, Yakoba wakakongolola bintu bionso bia tatu wetu wakadiangatshila bubanji buakadi bua tatu wetu
Yeye wakalongolola dikalu diandi, wakaya ne bantu bandi
Kadi, Abrahame kuteka bana ba mikoku muanda mutekete pa nkayabu

Wewe neujidile tshidimu tshia makumi atanu, newele di bua bantu bonso bahete budishikaminyi, etshi ntshidimu tshia disanka dinene kunudi, neuhingishe buloba buonso kudi bena buloba, ne muntu yonso neahingane kudi bana babo
Bu muvua mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ubenga mua kutulekela, Maweja Nangila uvua mushipe bamuanabute bonsu ba mu ditunga dia Ejipitu, ba bantu ne ba bimuna
Nudie nupete bukole, numone mua kutungunuka ne luendu luenu

Nomba Buhianyi bua Bena Lewi Yehowa wakambila Mose mu mpata ya Moaba hehi ne Yadene mitangilangane ne Yeleko ne, Wele mukenji kudi Bena Isalele, bua bobo bahe Bena Lewi misoko ya kushikamamu bu buhianyi buabo, bobo bahe Bena Lewi kabidi tshituha tshia buloba budi bunyunguluka misoko ei
Umupeshe bintu binuikala bapeta kudi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu: mikoku, mbuji, ntete ya kuenza bukula
Mu Ejipitu, tuvua bimpe bitambe
Dîyi diônso didi dikeba mwa kufila dipangadika ku tshilumbu tshitshidi tubadi tulonga didi dia patupu ne kadieena ne tshididi dienza to
Palô wakatuma mundi, wakamona ne, Nansha tshintu tshimue tshia bimuna bia Bena Isalele tshiakafua
Mvidi Mukulu mmumanye ne: dituku dinuadia bimuma abi, mesu enu neatabale, mifuanangane nende, nujingulule malu mimpe ne mabi
Bualu ke dituku divua Maweja Nangila muleje bukole buende, munupatule ku bupika mu Ejipitu
Ehaba, muana mulume wa Helona, mukelenge wa bana ba Zebuluna, wakafua bintu dituku disatu
Maweja Nangila kuitaba dilomba adi
Mose wakadila kudi Yehowa ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Nzambi, umuondahe

Yeye neoshe mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, dianyi didi dibuikila bintu bia munda ne dianyi dionso dia ha mutu ha bintu bia munda, tumuma tubidi ne dianyi didi ha mutu hatu hehi ne bituntuku bia bibelu ne lukutu lua mutshima ne tumuma tubidi yeye neanumushe
Biasombesha muntu nansha nyama kai kudi mukuandi, ne biamutahabo mputa anyi biafueye ne muen andi kayiku, yeye nealamate bulelela
Pelabu mpungi ne bibingu musangu umue, ntshimanyinu tshia kutuadija luendu
Malonga onso a mu nsubu, adi kayi ne bibuikidi, neikale bu tshintu tshidi katshiyi tshiakane
Kukosabu ditamba dia mutshi wa mvinyo dikale ne tumuma
Kanuena bamanye ne muntu bu meme udi mua kutempa matempu, anyi
Yeye wakamukonka ne, Nenkuhe tshinyi
Bakalua ne Mose ne Alona kudi Palo, ne yeye wakabambila ne, Yai bienu nutendelele Yehowa Nzambi wenu kadi badi bamba kuya mbanganyi
Mpeshayi mukaji, mpingane kua mfumuanyi
Budikookeshi Dinyooka dia lukanu Dinyooka Teletwale Dibandila dia matunga ne bintu Mianda ya bia kwenza nabi mudimu Tshinyangu, tshimvundu Tshisabu Kabumwe, bobumwe Viza Dianyishibwa
Mutuangaji udi ulambula mulambu awu, audile amu muaba wa tshijila mu lubanza lua ntenta wa kusambakena
Budi bukosa nsambu pa tshipaapu tshijima tshia ditunga mu dîna dia bantu bônso
Tshituha tshidi tshishale netshikale tshia Alona ne bana bandi balume ntshintu tshidi tshitambe tshia tshijila tshia mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia
Meyuyayele kulela Metushayele
Kadi neikale mupie mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Nanku, bua bena Izrayele kuasa mitanda, nansha kumuka muaba uvuabu basombe, anu ku diyi dia Maweja Nangila
Mose wakamba ne, Bikala mpala webe kayi uya n anyi, kudimusha kunoko
Yeye wakaya, wakalua n ai kudi mamu andi, ne mamu andi wakalamba munyinyi muimpe wa dihembu bu muakasua tatu andi
Yakoba wakamukudimuna ne, Kambualu bua kumpa tshintu nansha, biwitabusha bualu ebu, meme nendishe bimuna biebe, nembilame kabidi
Mukoshi wa nsambu musomba mu nkwaasa kêna usambasamba to
Nunku wakatuma matabisha ku mpala kuandi, yeye wakalala butuku abu munkatshi mua tshitudilu
Bionsu kubutukabi
Bavua bantu balume binunu nkama isambombu, katuyi babale bakaji, bana ne bantu bakulakaje

Maweja Nangila kubambila ne: Nuenu bateleje diyi dianyi meme, Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wenu, bakumbaje bilenga bindi nnuambila, batumikile mikenji yanyi, tshiakunutumina dikenga nansha dimue, bu mumvua mutumine bena Ejipitu
Neavuluke ndondu uvuaye mutue ne bankambua benu
Tshibangidilu Ke muvua Mvidi Mukulu mujikije diulu, buloba ne bintu bionsu bidipu

Yeye wakabandisha mesu andi, wakatangila balume basatu bimane ku mpala kuandi, hakabatangileye, wakabika ku mbelu kuandi, wakaya lubilu bua kubakidila, wakabakukuila, wakamba ne, Mukelenge wanyi, biwikala ne luse kundi, ndi nkutendekena ne, Kuhitshi muntu webe
Bualu wewe uvua mubadimuje bua bimanyine anu pa bule kuinshi kua mukuna
Bûngi bwa lupetu ludi lubweela lwa ditunga dijima ludibo bapeesha polovensa badi babuteeka mu bia lukama
Maweja Nangila mmumunemeshe ne bintu bia bungi: ke mikoku, ngombe, mbuji, tumelu, mpunde, biamu bitoke bia mushinga mukole, biamu bia mpawungi, ne bapika balume ne bakaji

Mikenji Mishilangane Binuaya kuluangana nvita ne bantu badi n enu lukuna ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi ubafila mu bianza bienu, nuenu nudi nuya n abo mu buluka, ne umue wenu udi utangila mukashi udi ne mpala muimpe munkatshi muabo, ne yeye udi mumusue, udi musue kumubaka bu mukashi wandi; hashishe yeye nealue n andi ku nsubu kuandi; nebamubeye nsuki ya ku mutu, nebamukose nzadi; yeye neavule bilulu biandi bia buluka, neashale mu nsubu wa muntu eu: neadile tatu wandi ne mamu wandi tô ngondo mujima; ne ku nyima muntu eu neaye kudiye bu mulume wandi, ne yeye neikale mukashi wandi
Pashishe amiamine mashi awu pambidi pa muena nsudi misangu muanda mutekete bua kumukobolola, wamba ne: Muntu ewu kena ne mikiya
Utuangashe bilulu bitanu ha buabi, ne utuangashe bilulu bisambombo ha buabi, tshilulu tshisambombo netshikale tshihitakane ku mushiku wa tshitendelelu
Bitata abi nebishale tshivulukilu kudi bena Izrayele
Maweja Nangila mmumane kukuendesha diakalenga
Biahona bintu ebi mu tshivuadi tshia dima, netshikale ne bukoya, nebatshishihe
Kubangabu luendu
Bualu nenuenze bidi bimpe, bisankisha Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Mavuala onsu kukuatakana bu tshimana, mayi menza dibue munkatshi mua mayi manene
Bantu bonso bakabalabo ba mu tshitudilu tshia Dana bakadi binunu lukama ne makumi atanu ne muanda mutekete ne nkama isambombo
Halua dituku dia muanda mukulu, yeye neangatshile nansha nyunyu ya nkutshi ibidi nansha mputu nyunyu ibidi, nealue n ai kudi muakuidi ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena

Kadi mpindiewu wewe mubutule bena Izrayele bonsu musangu umue, bisamba bikuabu bivua bimane kumvua lumu lua bukole buebe, nebiambe ne: Maweja Nangila wapangi mua kufikisha bena Izrayele mu ditunga divuaye mubalaye

Noa wakindila matuku muanda mutekete makuabo, wakatuma nyunyu wa nkutshi kabidi, nyunyu wakahingana kudiye dilolo, ne monai, wakadi ne katamba ka mutshi wa olive kabishi ku muinu, nunku Noa wakamanya ne mai akadi makehe ha buloba
Ubisangishe bu manananshi adi atua dihembu kudi benyi ba manananshi, ubisangishe ne luehu lutambe buimpe ne lua tshijila
Muanabute kulela muana wa balume, kumuinyika dina ne: Mowabe
Bintu bidi bana balume ba Melali balama bidi mabaya a nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ne mitshi ne makunshi ne nkanu ne bintu biabi bionso; ne makunshi a ku luhangu ne nkanu yai ne mitanda yai ne nshinga yai
Mutuangaji munene oshe munyinyi onsu ewu pa tshilambuilu tshia milambu ya kuosha
Nanku, Mvidi Mukulu kunyungulula bena Izrayele
Mudimu wa Tshipwita wa ditunga udi utwadija padibo bitabuuja makookeshi enda kudi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita ne udi ufika ku ndekeelu padibo babanjija Tshibambalu tshipiatshipia
Kanungu ka Tshipwita munwamfwanka kêna mwa kwikala popamwe tshipwita mukulumpa nansha tshipwita mukulumpa popamwe tshipwita munwamfwanka to
Moshe kuela dikombu mulu
Balaka wakambila Belâma ne, Lua biebe, nenkuleshe muaba mukuabo, bumue Nzambi neitabushe bua wewe ubangelele mulau ku muaba au
Bualu meme Maweja Nangila tshiena ne kansungansunga to
Bakahaula biuma bionso bia mu Sodoma ne Amola ne bintu bia kudia, bakaya mu nshila
Udi umanyisha beena ditunga dipangadika edi mu muyuki wenda
Nunku nudi ne bualu bua kutumikila dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne bua kuenza mikenji yandi ne mei andi bindi nnuambila lelu
Nunku netufue bua tshinyi

Mukenji wa Kumusha Bena Amaleka Tshiendelele Nuvuluke bu muakanuenzela Amaleka mu nshila hanuakaluhuka mu Ejipitu; bu muakasangakeneye n enu mu nshila, wakashiha bantu bakashala ku nyima bakadi batekete, hanuakahanga, hanuakamba kufua mu nshila; yeye kakatshina Nzambi
Muakuidi neameme tshituha tshia mulambu wa bukula bu tshivulukidi, neatshioshile ha tshioshelu ne kahia bu tshintu tshidi tshi tua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Abalahama wakabela Abimeleke bualu bua dina dia mai diakanyengabo kudi bahika ba Abimeleke ku bukole
Pashishe ndi mbamanyisha meyi ne mikandu bia Mvidi Mukulu

Enza biebe tshilulu tshia kuteka ku mbelu kua tshitendelelu tshia buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzû ne bua lin mutambe buimpe, utshienzeshe kudi muntu udi ne lungenyi lule lua kulengesha
Nebabuikile tshiseba tshikole tshia nyama wa nkonga ku bionsu ebi
Nebakutuadile wewe anu bilumbu binene

Mikenji ya bena Levi BIDI NE MIKIYA NE BIDI KABIYI NE MIKIYA Nyama idi ne mikiya ne idi kayiyi ne mikiya Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne Arone bua bamanyisha bena Izrayele mikenji eyi: Ku nyama yonsu ya panu, nudie amu nyama eyi: Nudi mua kudia nyama idi ne mikonu mipanduluke, mikale ibiola bintu mukana, ibidia tshiakabidi
Labana wakambila Yakoba ne, Tangila mushiki eu ne dibue edi binakuimanyika hankatshi hetu
Ku mulambu onsu wa bia mu madimi udi mutuangaji ulambula Maweja Nangila, kena mua kudia kantu nansha kamue to
Kabalambi tshituha atshi ne luevene
Kadi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu uvua anu ne tshitunu
Nenutumikile meyi ne mikenji biende bimvua munumanyishe
Kanungu ka Bishimikidi bia tshidiidi bia tshisabu bidi bishala too ne pateekabu bishimikidi bikwabo bidi bilongolola kudi Dîyi dikulu ne bikwata mudimu bu mudibio mu Dîyi dikulu dia Tshisabu
Kadi tudi tupikula bamuanabute ba balume ba bantu
Nyoka wakambila mukashi ne, Kanuena nufua bulelela, bualu bua Nzambi udi mu manye ne, Hanuadia mamuma au, mesu enu neabuluke, nenuikale bu Nzambi, nenumanye malu mimpe ne malu mabi
Tshibangidilu Abrahame udi usumba lukita bua kujika Sara Sara mumane kukumbaja bidimu lukama makumi abidi ne muanda mutekete, kufuaye mu Kiriyate Arba, momumue ne Ebrone, mu ditunga dia Kenaane
Bakabisangisha buatshia buatshia, muntu ne muntu bu muakamanyeye mudiadieye, ne hakatema munya, bidia biakenguluka
Bana betu bakese ne bakashi betu ne mikoko ne ngombe yetu nebishale mu misoko ya Gilada, kadi bantu bebe, bena nvita bonso, nebasabuke ku nvita ku mesu kua Yehowa, bu muakuamba mukelenge
Kumuinyikabu ne: Esawu

Bakatuma dî kudi Yosefe ne, Tatu webe wakamba diambedi yeye kayi muanze kufua ne, Nuenu nuambile Yosefe ne, Ulekelele bana benu mibi yabo ne malu mabi akakuenzelabo Hashishe tuetu tudi tukusengelela ne, Utubuikidile matomboka a bena mudimu ba Nzambi wa tatu webe Yosefe wdkadila hakamuambilabo mei a

Hanuadia bana, ne bana ba bana benu, hanuashala mu buloba musangu mule, hanuona mitshima yenu bua kudisongela luhingu ne tshifuanyikishi tshia tshintu, hanuenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kumufuisha tshiji; ndi mbikila diulu ne buloba bu bamanyi ba bualu kunudi lelu ne, Nenujimine ha buloba bunudi nuhiana dishiya dia Yadene tshituha tshihi; kanuena nuvudishangana matuku enu ha buloba, kadi nebanujimishe bulelela
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kuandamuna ne: Wewe Moshe ne Arone, lekelayi kupumbisha bantu bua kuenzabu mudimu
Kuvudi mukashi wa muan ebe bilulu, yeye udi mukashi wa muana webe, kuvudi bilulu biandi
Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpe bidi, mu dienza dia dîyi, mwa kukosa, dîba diônso, mbulamatadi wa tshimpitshimpi anyi mbulamatadi wa bilwilu

Hakahita matuku asatu, ne bobo bakadi ne kusama, bana ba balume ba Yakoba babidi, Shimeona ne Lewi, bana babo ne Dina, bakangata muntu muele Wandi wa nvita muntu muele wandi wa nvita, bakalua ku musoko ne mitshima ya dikima, bakashiha balume bonso

Yeye neikale n ebe bu muena mudimu anyi bu muenyi, neakukuatshile mudimu tô ne halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, hashishe yeye neumuke kudi ne yeye ne bana bandi badi n andi, nebahingane kudi bana babo ne ku buhianyi bua batatu bandi
Dituku dia kumudilu nedikale dituku dia disangisha dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu
Mikenji ya Kunvuangana Biateya mulume mukashi utshidi kamama, udi kayi muanze kutangila kudi mulume, ne bialaleye n andi, yeye neafile biuma bia dibaka bulelela bua yeye kuikaleye mukashi wandi
Tshihiminu etshi tshidi bu tshia dikumi tshia épha

Ke mena a bamfumu abu badi ne bua kunuambuluisha: mu tshisamba tshia Rubene: Elishure, muana wa Shedeyure; mu tshia Shimeyone: Shelumiyele, muana wa Surishadayi; mu tshia Yuda: Nashone, muana wa Aminadabe; mu tshia Isakare: Netaneyele, muana wa Shuware; mu tshia Zebulone: Eliyabe, muana wa Elone; mu tshia Efrayime, muana wa Yozefe: Elishama, muana wa Amikude; mu tshia Menashe, muana wa Yozefe: Ngameliyele, muana wa Pedashure; mu tshia Binyamine: Abidane, muana wa Ngideyoni; mu tshia Dane: Akiyezere, muana wa Amishadayi; mu tshia Ashere: Pagiyele, muana wa Okrane; mu tshia Ngade: Eliyasafe, muana wa Deyuwele; mu tshia Naftali: Akira, muana wa Eyinane
Bavua batangila luseke lukuabu bua kabamonyi butaka bua tatuabu

Neafile tshimpanga tshidi katshiyi ne tshilema kudi muakuidi tshia mushinga ûdi witabusha bu mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, ne muakuidi neafile mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji buakenzeye ku mpukahuka, kayi mubumanye, ne bubi buandi nebuikale bubuikidibue

Mu mianda idi ku bukookeshi bupalakaja bwa Bukalenga bunene ne bwa polovensa, dîyi dia polovensa diônso didi kadiyi diumvwangana ne mêyi ne tuludiki twa ditunga twa ngenzelu didi tshianana anyi ndifwa kakuyi bwaalu to, bu mudiku kakuyi diumvwangana
Abrahame kuambila bena mudimu bende babidi ne: Nuenu nushale apa ne nyama wa mpunde ewu
Bualu, bamuanabute bonsu ba bena Izrayele too ne ku ba bimuna biabu mbanyi meme Maweja Nangila
Ke Moshe kulamuna mafuta onsu avua ku bia munda, lutandatanda lua ku mutshima, tuonyi tubidi ne mafuta onsu avua malamateku, kubioshila Maweja Nangila pa tshilambuilu
Muntu yonsu udi umulenga, udi upia mikiya, ushala nayi too ne ku dilolu

Muana mulume wa munkatshi muenu, hafikeye matuku muanda mukulu, neatengudibue, muana mulume yonso wa ku bikondo bienu bionso, yeye udi muledibue mu nsubu wenu, anyi yeye udibo basumba kudi ba bende ku argent, udi kayi kankanunuina kebe
Yehowa udi bukole buanyi ne musambu wanyi, yeye wakulua luhandu luanyi, Yeye udi Nzambi wanyi, nemmutumbishe, udi Nzambi wa tatu anyi, nemmunemeke

Mu bibangidilu bia ngondo yenu nenufile mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia kudi Yehowa bana balume ba ngombe babidi ne tshimpanga tshimue ne bana balume ba mikoko muanda mutekete ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne bintu bisatu bia dikumi bia tshihiminu tshia bukula bubotesha bu mulambu wa bukula busangisha ne manyi ku muana wa ngombe yonso, ne bintu bibidi bia dikumi bia tshihiminu tshia bukula bubotesha bu mulambu wa bukula busangisha ne manyi ku tshimpanga tshionso, ne tshintu tshia dikumi tshia bukula bubotesha bu mulambu wa bukula busangisha ne manyi ku muana wa mukoko yonso, mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia udi utua dihembu kudi Yehowa

Bualu bua mitshi yabo ya tumuma tukese idi bu mitshi ya mu Sodoma ne ya mu madimi a Amola: tumuma tuabo tudi bu nyongangandu, ne tshisumbu tshia tumuma tshidi ne bululu: nvinyo yabo idi bu lulengu lua nyoka, bu lulengu bikole lua nyoka wa ntoka
Yeye kubambila ne: Meme ndi muena mudimu wa Abrahame
Nanku kabena mua kufua kabidi to
Muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua mundi wakenza bualu ku mpukahuka ku mpala kua Yehowa, ne bubi buandi nebuikale bubuikidibue
Dielulula Bena Izrayele badi batshimuna mukalenga Oge Pashishe tuetu kubenda bua kupitshila mu ditunga dia Bashane
Tshiena ngambila bana benu to
Dituku dia dikumi: Akiyezere, muana wa Amishadayi, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Dane
Bantu kabayi banji kulala, bantu balume bonsu ba mu musoku, bakulumpe ne bansongalume kunyungulula nzubu wa Lote

Muntu yônso udiku pende mwa kwindila bwa se nzuji udi ne bukookeshi atangila tshilumbu tshiende mu tshipungu katshiyi tshipita bule Badi balongolola ne bajadika bukookeshi bwa kudisungila bwa muntu yônso
bukookeshi, bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa Njila mwitanu : Bidi bitangila Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu Kanungu ka Kudi Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu
Hakanumusha Yehowa ku Kadeshe bânea ne, Yai bienu, nuhiane buloba bunakanuha; hashishe nuakahidia dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, kanuakamuitabusha, kanuakunvua di diandi
Bimenga abi, bivua makumi asambombu, bivua mu buloba bua Argobe, mu ditunga dia Bashane, muaba uvua mukalenga Oge ne bumfumu
Nanku kabakuikala kabidi ne mikiya to
Mpa buloba mpa makenga eee Kwà nganyì wètù kutwaya eee Kudi kakuyi makenga eee Bwà kudia ka kwena
Tshiôtshi etshi tshidi tshianji kulekela ditangila dia tshilumbu etshi ne tshidi tshimanyisha Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu, mianda yônso mimanyika
Netubashihele bisumbu bia mikoko ne ngombe bua kubadisha, anyi
Misoko neyikale bu binyemenu kudi musombuedi, mushihi wa mundi kafu biandi tô ne himaneye ku mpala kua tshisumbu tshia bantu bua kumulumbuluishabo

Nenusanke ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne wewe ne muana webe mulume ne muana webe mukashi ne muntu webe mulume ne muntu webe mukashi ne Muena Lewi udi mu musoko webe ne muenyi ne bana ba nshiya ne bakashi ba mu lufuila badi munkatshi muenu, mu muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Usungula bua kujadikamu dina diandi
Udi mumane kutupatula mu Ejipitu muvua biakudia bia bungi, mabele ne buitshi, bua kutufuishila mu tshipela emu
Ulekele bantu banyi baye kuntendelela
Witabushe bua meme nsabuke, utangile buloba buimpe budi dishiya dia Yadene, mukuna au muimpe, ne Lebanona
Hakatantamaneye bikole nunku, muleleshi wakamuambila ne, Kutshinyi, bualu bua wewe neulele muana wa balume mukuabo
Bu muvua maboku a Moshe ashikila, Arone ne Ure kuteka dibue bua Moshe kusomba
Awu kuandamuna Moshe ne: Nganyi udi mukuteke bua kutubela ne kutulumbuluisha
Wakasumba tshituha tshia buloba kuakashimikeye ntenta yandi kudi bana ba Hamo tatu wa Shekeme, ku lukama lua kesita

Ebi mbintu binudi mua kuangata kudibo or ne argent ne tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne bilulu bia bleu ne bilulu bifikuluke ne bilulu bikunze kunzû ne bilulu bia lin ne miosa ya mbushi, ne biseba bia bimpanga bina mu mai makunze, ne biseba bia nkonge ne mutshi wa acacia, ne manyi a muinda, manananshi adibo bela mu manyi a kulaba ham bidi, ne manyi adi atua dihembu, mabue a mushinga mukole adibo bateka mu efoda ne mu tshiamu tshidibo baluata ha tshiadi
Bikala nyama kayi muakane, yeye neamuhikule bu mudi mushinga webe, neasakidile tshituha tshitanu ha mutu, bikaleye kayi umuhikula, wewe neumuhane bu mudi mushinga webe
Muntu yonsu udi ne disama dia nsudi, udi ne bua kuvuala bilamba bipandike
Nanku tuvua babenge kupitshila ku mikuna ya Seyire, muaba uvuabu basombe kudi bana betu, ndelanganyi ya Esawu
Bena tshisamba tshia Menashe kulonda, babalombola kudi Ngameliyele, muana wa Pedashure
Padibo banyisha mukanda wa didiombola dia mweena Bukalenga bunene kampanda, yêye ewu badi bamwangata bu mulekela mudimu
Wakaya biandi dituku dibidi, wakamona balume babidi ba Bena Ebelu baluangana, yeye wakakonka muntu
Kadi, nansha bia munyi, kuena mua kuya ne muananyi kuaka to

Dutelonone Misoko ya Kunyemena Hashiha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bisamba abi bia mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, hanuabihata, hanuaslukama mu misoko yabo ne mu nsubu yabo, nenuditahuluile misoko isatu mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana
Bana ba balume ba Kola: Asi ne Elekana ne Abiasafa, â mmeku a Bena Kola
Nanku, bantu bonsu basanga ntete, nansha nuenu, nansha benyi badi munkatshi muenu, nulonde anu mikenji eyi, ku ndelanganyi ne ku ndelanganyi
Yeye wakamba ne, Wakukuteka mukelenge wetu ne mulumbuluishi wetu nganyi
Muena mudimu awu kufika pabuipi ne tshiina tshivua ku mpenga kua tshimenga dilolu, diba didi bakaji baya bua kusuna mayi
Yakoba wakatabala ku tulu tuandi, wakamba ne Bulelela, Yehowa udi kunoko ne meme tshiakamanva bualu ebu
Kena mumone muntu mukuabu to
Vulukai, kanuhu muoyo bu munuakafuisha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshiji mu tshihela; ku dituku dinuakahatuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu tô ne hanuakafika ku muaba eu, nuakahidia Yehowa
Kadi bonsu badi bakutshipa, nembatshipe
Pashishe kudielabu mpala panshi

Kadi bikala muana mukashi wa muakuidi mukashi wa mu lufuila, anyi mukashi wakahidiabo kudi mulume wandi, ne bikaleye kayi ne muana, bikaleye nuhingane ku nsubu wa tatu andi muakadiye diambedi, yeye neadie bidia bia tatu andi, kadi muenyi kena mua kudia bintu ebi
Maweja Nangila kuandamuna ne: Meme musangane bantu bakane makumi atanu mu Sodome, nemfuile musoku mujima luse bualu buabu
Abrame umbuka aku, kuyaye ku mikuna ivua ku dia balume dia tshimenga tshia Betele
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kuambila mukaji ne: Pawimita difu nenkuvudijile makenga
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Bika, uye biebe ku mpala kua bantu, nebabuelemu, nebahiane buloba bunakalaya batatu babo bua kubahabu
Kanuluhuki ku tshibi tshia ntenta wa kusangakena matuku muanda mutekete tô ne hanuashikisha matuku a kujidila kuenu, bualu bua Yehowa neanujidile matuku muanda mutekete
Kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu nkama muanda mukulu ne makumi asatu
Kanubueshakanyi bimuna bienu, kanukunyi ntete ya mishindu ibidi mu budimi bumue, kanuluatshi bilulu bikuma ne munda mashilangane
Bualu bakaji abu, badi mua kumufikisha ku ditombokela Maweja Nangila
Dituku dionsu mfumu umue afile milambu yende bua kujidila tshilambuilu
Eu udi mukenji wa mulambu wa bukula bana balume ba Alona nebaufile ku mesu kua Yehowa ku mpala kua tshioshelu
Tuetu kutshimuna mukalenga Oge, ne bantu bende bonsu
Kehate uvua mulele bana ba balume banayi: Amrame, Ishare, Ebrone ne Uziyele
Kanungu ka Butontolodi bwa beena tshidiidi budi bwanyishibwa mu Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata
Nennupatule ku bupika budibu banukuate

Neufunde bifuanyikishi bia tumuma tua grenade ne buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunzekunzû kuinshi kua tshikowelu tshionso, neuteke ndibu ya or hankatshi ha tumuma, neuteke kadibu ka or ne kamuma, ne kadibu ka or ne kamuma to ne kuinshi kua tshikowelu tshionso
Munyinyi wa mafuta onsu udi mushale, mutuangaji awoshe pa tshilambuilu, bu mudibu benza bua mulambu wa bobumue
Bua kujikija mikiya ya mu nzubu awu, mutuangaji angate nyunyi ibidi, mitshi ya sedre, bilamba bienza ne miosa ya nyama bilaba kakula, ne mabeji a mutshi wa isope
Yakoba wakangata mitshi mibishi ya peuplier ne ya amande ne ya platane, wakubula bihusu bibaka bitoke, wakamuenesha bibaka bitoke bia mitshi
Pa mutu patshi nundambuilepu milambu ya kuosha ne ya ditua ndondu, nusungula munkatshi mua ngombe, mbuji ne mikoku yenu
Sila, mukaji muibidi wa Lemeke, uvua mulele Tubale Kayine
Wenze kabidi ne bionsu bidi bikengela bua kukobolola bantu, bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambe
Kadi ndi musungule bena Levi, bua bapingane pa muaba wa bamuanabute bonsu ba bena Izrayele
Kadi alambule nangananga bivuaye mumane kulaya bua kudijidila bu muena nazire

Ekesode Kakamanya bantu ne, Mose wakashala ku mukuna musangu mule, bakadisangisha kudi Alona, bakamuambila ne, Bika biebe, utuenzele nzambi idi mua kuya ku mpala kuetu, bua muntu au Mose, wakalua n etu mu Ejipitu, katuena bamanye bualu buakumukuata
Yeye wakamba ne, Mulangala
Bakamba ne, Nzambi wa Bena Ebelu wakasangakena hetu, witabushe ne tuetu tuye luendu lua matuku asatu mu tshihela bua kushihela

Dilomba diônso ku dimwe ku dimwe badi badifila ku Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpa tshidi tshilondesha bulongama bwa dilomba, bwa tshingenyingenyi anyi bwa difwanyikija
