Wangate Alona ne Eleaza, muan andi mulume, ulue n abo ku mukuna wa Hô, uvule Alona bilulu biandi, ubiluatshishe Eleazâ, muan andi mulume, Alona neasangakene ne bankambua bandi, neafue biandi

Eleazâ muakuidi wakangata malonga a tshiamu tshia mitaku akatuabo, bakâtula bu tshibuikilu tshia tshioshelu, bua kuikalau tshivulukidi kudi Bena Isalele ne kubamanyisha ne, Muntu udi kayi muana wa Alona, kalu ha buihi bua kuosheye musenga wa manananshi ku mpala kua Yehowa, kenji bu Kola ne bantu bandi, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Kashintu kaadi kadi Franc Congolais Mwakulu waadi wa mbulamatadi udi fwalanse
Nakamuambila ne, Binahanga kuhingana n andi kûdi, hashishe nendituadile bujitu bua bualu ebu tshiendelele
Yehowa wakamueneka kudi Abalama, wakamba ne, Nempe tunkanunuina biebe buloba ebu Abalama wakenzela Yehowa, wakamueneka kudiye, tshioshelu
Mose wakabambila ne, Nuakushiya bakashi bonso ne muoyo, anyi
Nebabaleje midimu idibu mua kuenza ne bintu bidibu mua kuambula
Panudi nusombesha muenyi makuta, udi mua kunupingajila

Nenufile milambu ya buatshia buatshia nunku, milambu ya kuosha ha kahia tô matuku muanda mutekete, idi itua dihembu kudi Yehowa, nenufile milambu ei ku mutu kua milambu mudi nuosha buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua
Wewe udi bu mai adi asaba ha kalua, atutukila muiku, wewe kuena wikala ne bukokeshi ku mutu kua bantu, bualu bua wewe wakabanda ha bulalu bua tatu ebe, wakenzahu bualu bubi wakabanda ha bulalu buanyi
Tshidi ku bukokeshi bwa Bukalenga bunene
Hakadi Isalele ushikama mu muaba eu, Lubena wakalala ne Bileha, mukashi mukuabo wa tatu wandi, Isalele wakunvua lumu elu

Nuenu nutumikile mei anyi ne mikenji yanyi, kanuenji bilele ebi bidi bitambe bubi, nansha bana baledibue mu nsubu yenu nansha benyi badi munkatshi muenu bualu bua bena buloba bakadi ku mpala kuenu bakenza malu mabi â onso, ne buloba buakoneka , buloba kabunuluki kabidi hanuabuona, bu muakadi buloba buluka tshisamba tshiakadi ku mpala
Musulu wa mayi kupatuka mu Edene bua kufila tshitalela mu lupangu
Muan abo mukashi wakimana kule, bualu bua kumanya muenzelabo muakuny andi
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ndi musungule bena Levi munkatshi mua bena Izrayele bakuabu bonsu, bua bangenzele mudimu
Nanku anu bana babidi ba Arone, Elazare ne Itamare, ke bavua bashale bua kuenza mudimu wa butuangaji pamue ne tatuabu
Musulu wa mai wakaluhuka mu Edene bua kumiamina midioko mai, wakahanduluka maboko anai
Nanku panumuka mu Ejipitu, kanuakuikala bianza bitupu to
Kanungu ka Mikanda ya mêyi ne tuludiki idi yumvwangana ne Dîyi dikulu edi, idi ishala ne bwenzeji too ne pikalabo mwa kuyikupula anyi kuyishintulula
Bena mudimu bende bakaji bavua bendakana ku muelelu wa mayi aku
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kuandamuna ne: Nuambi bimpe, ndi nnutekela, nuye kulambula Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu milambu mu tshipela

Binuahidia kutumikila mei onso a mikenji idi mifunda mu mukanda eu, bua nuenu nutshine dina edi dia butumbi ne ditshina ne, YEHOWA, NZAMBI WENU; hashishe Yehowa neanuenzele masama a kukema ne bana badi banulonda; masama makole neashale kunudi musangu mule ne makenga manene neashale kunudi musangu mule kabidi
Yeye wakamba ne Lua n au kundi nendie munyinyi wa ntole wa muan anyi bua mutshima wanyi ukuvudishile disanka
Wakaya kuakenzeye tshioshelu diambedi, ne Abalama wakahitaku dina dia Yehowa
Bantu bakadi babi ku mesu kua Nzambi ne buloba buakadi bûle tente ne malu mabi
Muaba wa Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu awu, nenusanke bonsu, nuenu, bana benu ne bena mudimu benu
Ebi mbintu bionso bia mu mai binudi mua kudia: bintu bionso bidi ne mialala ne mabamba nudi mua kudia; kanuena mua kudia bintu bidi kabiyi ne mialala ne mabamba; kabiena biakane kunudi

Nebalue ne tshibelu tshidibo bakuha ne tshiadi tshidibo banyukula hohamue ne dianyi dia milambu ya kuosha ha kahia ku mesu kua Yehowa etshi ntshintu tshiebe ne tshia bana bebe balume tshiendelele, bu muakamba Yehowa
Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu kadi kafikisha dimanyisha edi ku buludiki bwa bitadi
Nenkuambuluishe bua wakule bimpe
Ke mudi bena Levi mua kungenzela mudimu nanku
Muanabute mulume wa ngombe, kanuena mua kumuenzeja mudimu to
Etshi ke tshimanyinu tshia kashidi tshia pambidi penu, tshidi tshijadika ndondu udi pankatshi panyi nenu
Padibio kabiyi mu midimu badi babweja midimu ya pa bwayi mudibio mu kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu adi
Alona ne bana bandi balume nebadie munyinyi wa tshimpanga ne bidia bidi mu tshisaka ku tshibi tshia ntenta wa kusangakena

Lemeke wakikala ne muoyo bidimu lukama ne makumi muanda mukulu ne bibidi, wakalela muana mulume, wakamuidika dina ne, Noa, wakamba ne, Yeye neatusambe mu mudimu wa bianza bietu, bualu bua buloba buakedibua mulau kudi Yehowa
Mukaji awu kumulelela bana basambombu: Zimrane, Yokshane, Medane, Madiyane, Ishebake ne Shuwa
Katataka wewe neutangile ne bualu bunakukuambila nebuenjibue anyi kabuena buenjibua
Wewe udi mumanye miaba ya mu tshipela itudi mua kuasa mitanda
Pashishe ndelanganyi ya bena Izrayele kutanta, kuvulangana kupita bungi mu Ejipitu
Bakadi basangisha bisumbu bia mikoko bionso kunoko, bakumusha dibue diakadi ku mushiku wa dina, bakanuisha mikoko mai, bakahingasha dibue dia ku mushiku wa ku muaba wadi

BIDI BITANGILA DIAKAJILULA DIA DIYI DIKULU Bwa kwepula ngenyi miludiki ya mungalata idi mu Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadio edi ku mpukapuka ya tshidiidi ne ku diyitangilula kadiyi dikengedibwa, diakajilula dia Dîyi dikulu nansha dimwe kadieena mwa kulenga bulongolodi budi butangila Mbulamatadi wa Bukalenga bwabanyangana, lungenyi luludiki lwa disungudibwa kudi bantu bônso, bweena mpala bwa Bukalenga bunene, bûngi ne bule bwa matuku a butumibwa bwa Mulombodi wa ditunga, budikadidi bwa bukalenga bwa bandumbulula, tshibûngi tshia bisumbu bia tshidiidi ne bia bakwidi ba beena mudimu

Biwahidia kulekela bantu hanyi, makelela nentumine mikumbi mu buloba buebe, neyikale ha mutu ha buloba buonso, kabena mua kutangila buloba, yoyo neyidie bintu biakushala ku mabue a nvula, nenudie mitshi yenu yonso idi idiunda mu budimi
Nanku ndi nkutuma kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, bua uye kupatula bantu banyi bena Izrayele badi mukalenga awu mukuate ku bupika
Yeye wakambila Efelona ku mpala kua bena buloba ne, Biwitabusha, ndi nkutendekena ne, Ungunvuile, nenkuhe mushinga wa budimi uwangate ne meme nenjikemu tshitalu etshi
Tuetu bakamukudimuna anu bu muakatukonkeye, tuakadianjila kumanya ne, Yeye wakadi mua kutuambila ne, Luai ne muan enu wa balume kunoko, anyi
Bena Izrayele mbapite bungi
Kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu nkama muanda mutekete makumi muanda mukulu ne bibidi
Kudimusha kua Bena Isalele bua Mpingu ya Bena Kanâna Dut

Dilondangana Mulombodi wa Ditunga Ndumbulwilu wa ku tubadi Tshidiidi a manyooka Mweena tshimwangi Didila Ndudiki Dibadika dia bantu Dieebeja dia dianyisha dia beena ditunga Ditunga Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpa Disungudibwa kudi bantu bonso
Tshilejilu: muntu udi utendelela mvidie ya bisamba bikuabu, nansha diba, ngondu, nansha bintu bivule bidi mu tshibuashibuashi
Padiye muenza nanku, bintu bionsu bivua mu nzubu nebishale kabiyi bipie mikiya to
Eleyasafa muana mulume wa Laele neikale mukelenge wa nsubu wa batatu ba Bena Gêshona
Bena Isalele Bafile Bintu kudi Yehowa Ek
Mutuangaji umuke ne muntu awu mu mitanda, aye kujadika mushindu udi disama
Lulengu elu kaluena lusokoma kundi, luteka mu tshibutshilu tshianyi, anyi

Muakuidi muela manyi ha mutu neangate mashi makuabo a muana wa ngombe, nealue n au mu ntenta wa kusangakena, muakuidi neafue munu wandi mu mashi, neamiamine mashi misangu muanda mutekete ku mpala kua tshilulu tshikudika tshidi hankatshi ha nsubu wa tshitendelelu ku mesu kua Yehowa
Diumvwangana edi didi mwa kwangata lwidi lwa diambulwisha
Abimeleke kumukonka ne: Wenji nanku bua tshinyi
Kadi nebashale bua kuambuluisha bana babu batshidi ku mudimu
Kanusongi lupingu, kanuzodi tshimfuanyi tshidi tshileja tshintu tshidi mu diulu, pa buloba, nansha mu mayi adi muinshi mua buloba
Bajadiki ba bualu abu ke badi badianjila kumuasa mabue
Mose wakambila Yehowa ne, Yehowa, meme tshiena mua kuakula bimpe, nansha diambedi, nansha katshia wabanga kuakula ne muntu webe, bualu bua meme ndi muena tshikukumina
Panuafika mu ditunga dia Kenaane dinukuata, nukumbaje meyi ne mikenji bimvua munulongeshe, bu muvua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wanyi mungambile
Kubafukaye mulume ne mukaji
Nuvuluke luendu lule luvua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu munuendeshe mu tshipela bidimu makumi anayi
Nunku nakadikuma hanshi ku mpala kua Yehowa matuku makumi anai, bualu bua Yehowa wakamba ne, Nembashihe
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wewe wambila Bena Isalele ne, Nuenu nkayenu nuakumona bu munakusomba n enu mufume mu diulu
Mala ne Noa ne Hogela ne Mileka ne Tîsa
Palô wakatuma di, wakabikila Mose ne Alona, wakabambila ne, Nakuenza bualu bubi musangu eu, Yehowa udi muakane ne meme ne bantu banyi tudi bantu babi

Benyi badi basombe munkatshi muenu matuku makese, nansha benyi bamane kusombamu bidimu bia bungi, balelangane, bapete bikulu mu ditunga dienu, padibu basue kundambula milambu ya mupuya muimpe, balonde bonsu anu mikenji eyi
Mulubu ewu badi baupatula mu Tshibejibeji tshia mbulamatadi
Nzambi wakambila Noa ne bana bandi balume ne, Meme bianyi ndi njadika tshihungidi tshianyi n enu ne bana benu badi banulonda
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Benyamina, Abidana muana mulume wa Gideom
Bûngi bwa batshipwita bakulumpa pamwe ne mushindu wa kubasungula ne kusungudibwa badi babuleeja kudi dîyi didi ditangila masungulangana
Katataka, Yehowa, tuakulua ne bintu biakaboba diambedi mu buloba buwakutuha
Hawela mpungi bikole, bantu ba mu bitudilu bia ku esete nebaye ku luendu luabo
Abalahama wakasemena ha buihi, wakamukonka ne, Neushihe bantu bakane ne bantu babi hohamue, anyi

kwikala anyi bwa bangabanga, anyi bupeta Udi mweena Kongu, mmuntu yônso mweena bisamba bieena bantu ne maloba avwa mênza tshidi tshilwa Kongu mpindiewu Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata mu tshikondo tshiakapeteka budikadidi
Tukanda badi batweela padibo babiikila dîna dîyi dikola, anyi tshianza muulu, anyi pa disomba ne dijuuka kulu ,anyi pa kabeji ka muntu pa nkayenda,anyi ku mushindu wa biamwa bia nzembu
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu mumane kuipata bantu aba, kumpala kuenu, kanuditambishi ne: Maweja Nangila mmutupe ditunga edi, bualu tudi bantu ba nsongu
Levi wakushala ne muoyi bidimu lukama ne makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete

Tuakanyenga buloba ebu ku tshikondo atshi, ku Aloê mu tshibanda tshia Ânona, ne tshituha tshia mikuna ya Gilada ne misoko idimu, nakaha Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada: ne tshituha tshikuabo tshia Gilada ne misoko ya bukelenge bua Oga wa mu Bashana nakaha tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Manashe: luseke luonso lua Âgoba, misoko yonso ya mu Bashana
Dikumbajanga dia Bukalenga bunene didi ne tshia kuleeja mpala ya bitupa bishilashilangana bia beena ditunga

Masanka a tatu webe akuhita masanka a batatu anyi bunene tô ne ku mukalu wa mikuna minene idiku tshiendelele, masanka au neikale ha mutu ha Yosefe ne ha lubombo lua mutu wa yeye wakadi muhandulula kudi bana babo
Kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu nkama ibidi ne muanda mutekete
Irade kulela Meyuyayele
Mmusue kuikala amu Mvidi Mukulu nkayende
Pashishe mutuangaji udi ulambula nyunyi umue bua mulambu wa kukobolola nawu bantu, ne nyunyi mukuabu bua mulambu wa kuosha
Kena uyukila kabidi netu anyi
Moshe kubikila Elazare ne Itamare, bana ba balume ba Arone, pamue ne Arone mene
Kumonaye bena Izrayele, kujadikaye dikenga divuabu nadi
Yeye wakaya ha bule buludiludi buakadi muana bu mudi muntu wamba kuela mikete, bualu bua wakamba ne, Tshitangidi lufu lua muana Yeye wakashikama buludiludi buakadi muana, wakaula muadi, wakadila
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Tangila, wewe udi ne difu, neulele muana mulume, neumuidike dina ne, Yishemaele, bualu bua Yehowa wakunvua dikenga diebe
Kadi kabakabala Bena Lewi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Nanku Maweja Nangila kumuka muaba uvua Moshe, Sefora uvua muambe ne: Bayanyi wa mu mashi bua dimuteka panshi
Yeye mupole tshimuma, mutshidie neashale ne muoyi kashidi
Kadi Yehowa wa kakolesha mutshima wa Palo, yeye kakabalekela
Ke Sarayi kuambila Abrame ne: Badi bampenda bipendu bionsu ebi bualu buebe
Nuvuluke Dituku dia Dikisha, nudinemeke, bualu ndia tshijila, bu mumvua munuambile
Efrone, muena Iti, uvua musombe munkatshi mua bana babu amu
Genese Badi Bahetela Isaka Mukashi Abalahama wakadi muntu mununu mukoke, ne Yehowa wakasankisha Abalahama mu malu andi onso

Kanudi mampa anyi manvua akoshabo mu kahia, anyi manvua mabishi dituku edi diambedi kanuyi banze kufila milambu yenu kudi Nzambi eu udi mukenji wa tshiendelele mu bikondo bienu bionso mu nsubu yenu yonso
Nuamushiyi bua tshinyi
Bantu bakadila kudi Mose, ne Mose wakalomba Yehowa, kahia kakajima
Pashishe Abrahame kupingana kuvua bena mudimu bende bashale, kuya nabu bonsu mu Bersheba mu ditunga divuaye usomba
Yehowa wakakonka Abalahama ne, Sala wakaseka bua tshinyi, wamba ne, Meme nendele muana, hankadi mukoke aha, anyi
Ngershone uvua ne bana balume babidi: Libni ne Shimeyi
Kutuadilabu muena mudimu, ne bantu bavuaye nabu, mayi a kuowa ku makasa
Musulu wa Amone ke mukalu wa kuinshi wa ditunga adi
Mbualu bubi kaayi bundi mukuenzele bua wewe kutubueja ne bena ditunga dianyi mu tshilumbu bunene nunku

Yehowa neanutumme tshisamba tshia kule kuakua ku ditunga dikuabo bu nyunyu wa mukanku; kanuena bamanye muaku wa tshisamba atshi; badi ne luonji ku mpala kuabo, kabena banemeka bantu banunu, kabena ne luse kudi bana batekete; bobo nebadie kukumbana kua bimuna bienu, ne bintu biakadiunda mu buloba buenu tô ne hanuajimishibua; kabena banushila kabidi manvua anyi nvinyo mihia mihia anyi manyi anyi kukumbana kua bimuna bienu anyi bana ba mikoko yenu tô ne hanuajimishibua kudibo
Abrame ne Nahore kusela bakaji: dina dia mukaji wa Abrame divua Sarayi, dia mukaji wa Nahore divua Milka
Katuena tuhingana ku nsubu yetu diambedi Bena Isalele kabayi banze kuhiana buhianyi buabo kudi mundi ne muntu
Kanuvua basue kubanda ku mukuna to, bualu nuvua nutshina kapia aku
Ahila, muana mulume wa Enana, mukelenge wa bana ba Nafatale, wakafua bintu dituku dia dikumi ne abidi

Bikala muntu ne muana mulume udi ne tshitshu ne buhidia, katu watumikila dî dia tatu wandi anyi dia mamu wandi, ne yeye katu wabahvuila biamukengeshaho, hashishe tatu wandi ne mamu wandi nebamukuate, nebaluhuke n andi kudi bakulu ba mu musoko wabo ne ku tshibi tshia musoko; nebambile bakulu ba mu musoko wabo ne, Muana wetu eu udi ne tshitshu ne buhidia, kena utumikila mei etu; udi muena lumpukusu ne mukuatshiki wa maluvu
Mulume kuandamuna ne: Anu mukaji uuvua mumpeshe ke udi muntuadile tshimuma, meme panyi kutshidia
Ke pandi muvuluke ndondu umvua mutue nabu

Ka nudiangatshidi tshintu tshimue tshia mulau tshia musoko au mu tshianza tshienu; nunku Yehowa nealekele tshiji tshiandi tshikole, neanuleshe luse, neanusankishe, neanukumbashe bu muakalayeye batatu benu; hanunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kutumikila mikenji yandi yonso inakunuambila lelu ne bua kuenza malu adi makane ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Mpindiewu angata mukajebe, umuke nende
Kanulu ne tshintu tshidi tshitonda Yehowa mu nsubu muenu bua kufuanangana n atshi: nuhidie tshintu atshi, nuikale n atshi lukuna; atshi ntshintu tshibihe tshia tshijila
Bana ba Dana, Hushima
Ku tshilambuilu tshia tshiamu tshia mpawungi, nebabuikileku tshilamba tshifikuluke
Ke ditunga didibu basombe mpindiewu kudi bena Kenaane, bena Iti, bena Amore, bena Perizi, bena Ivi ne bena Yebusa
Kena ne kansungansunga to
Kanungu ka Kabeena mwa kumbusha anyi kutanakaja muntu, yêye kayi mudiswîle, ne nzuji udi mêyi ne mikandu imupeesha
Meme tshiena mumanye mua kukuha butumbi bulelela, anyi
Nanku asukule bilamba biende, wowe mayi a mpokolu bua mikiya kujikayi
Kadi bena Amone bavua babikila bena Refayime ne: mbena Zamzumi

Nebikale bintu biebe munkatshi mua bintu biakajidilabo ku kahia milambu yabo yonso, ne ya bukula, ne ya kubuikila n ai bubi buabo, ne ya kubuikila n ai kusambuka kuabo kua mikenji, milambu idibo bafila kundi neyikale bu tshintu tshia tshijila kûdi ne kudi bana bebe balume
Yeye wakumukaku, wakaya ku mukuna wakadi ku esete wa Betele, wakashimikaku ntenta wandi, Betele wakadi ku wesete ne Ai wakadi ku esete
Difutu Didi Dibuikila Tshitendelelu Nom
Bishi bionsu bidi ne masala, kanuena mua kubidia to, bualu bidi ne mikiya
Ke pandi mukukandike ne kulengi ewu mukaji, nansha ne tshianza mene; tshianana, udi untombokela

Yeye neimane ku mpala kua Eleazâ muakuidi, yeye neamukonkele kulumbulula kua Ulima ku mpala kua Yehowa, ku dî diandi bobo nebaluhuke, ne ku dî diandi bobo nebabuelemu, ne yeye ne Bena Isalele bonso badi n andi
Maweja Nangila kuambila kabidi Moshe ne: Pikala mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kayi ukuteleja, bidi amu bua mmone mua kuenza bishima bia bungi mu Ejipitu
Nuenu nenulame tshitendelelu ne tshioshelu, nunku mulau mukuabo kaukuatshi Bena Isalele
Nubilonge, nubikumbaje
Ke Maweja Nangila kungambila meme Moshe ne: Kutshinyi mukalenga uvuavua awu to
Tshiji tshia Yehowa tshiakabakuata, yeye wakumuka
Hakalela Pelege Leu, yeye wakashala ne muoyo bidimu nkama ibidi ne tshitema, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Kutendelelaye Mvidi Mukulu, utela dina dia Maweja Nangila
Nanku nediandamuke nyoka, mukalenga awu mumone
Nanku, nuenu bonsu, malaba nenupingane kunudi bafume

Muntu wakadi ne mutshima mulengele ne kalolo neikale ne disu dibi kudi muan abo ne kudi mukashi udiye munange ne kudi bana bandi bakashala; nunku yeye kena ubabanyinaku munyinyi wa bana bandi hadiye udia, bualu bua yeye kena ne tshintu tshishala kudiye mu ditshintshimika ne mu ditata didi bena lukuna banutatshisha n adi ku misoko yenu yonso

Nomba Badi Babala Bungi bua Bena Isalele ku Sinai Yehowa wakambila Mose mu tshihela tshia Sinai, mu ntenta wa kusambakena, ku dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo muibidi mu tshidimu tshibidi tshia kuluhuka kuabo mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne, Ubale bungi bua Bena Isalele bonso, ku meku abo ne ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena a balume, muntu ne mundi, wewe ne Alona nubange kudi balume bonso ba mu Isalele bakahita bidimu makumi abidi to ne ha mutu, nubale buonso buabo ku tshisumbu ne ku tshisumbu badi bamanye mua kuya mu nvita
Bualu muntu musemene pabuipi ne mukuna nebamushipe
diteeka dia difutu dia muntu wa kwinshi mu polovensa bilondeshila mêyi ne mikandu ya ditunga;
Elazare, muana wa balume wa mutuangaji Arone, ke uvua mfumu mukulu wa bena Levi bonsu
Mukuna mujima kunyunga bikole
Hatemesha Alona minda dilolo, yeye neoshe musenga wa manananshi bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu kudi Yehowa ku bikondo bienu bionso
Padibu basukula tshintu atshi, dikeji dijika, batshisukulule musangu muibidi, bua tshishale katshiyi ne mikiya
Mukaji kuandamuna ne: Nyoka mmundinge, meme panyi kudia tshimuma
Ndi musue kumuenzela mukuende wa bu yeye udi mua kumuambuluisha
Mutuangaji mumane kukenketa tshintu tshidi ne makeji, neatshiteke pa nkayatshi matuku muanda mutekete
Nganyi wakubangila mukashi kayi muanze kumubaka
Nebashale pabu mu dikenga bua dintombokela dienu, too ne panuabutuka bonsu, nuenu baledi babu
Mai akabanda to coudées díkumi ne itanu ha mikuna mile
Wakenza mbote ya or makumi atanu, wakatuangasha bilulu ne mbote ai, nunku nsubu wa tshitendelelu wakadi bu nsubu umue
Neasambakaje ne buloba buboya panshi muaba wa tshijila
Kanujadiki dibue dia kutendelela didi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ukina
Mashi neikale bu tshimanymu tshia mu nsubu munudi, ne hanamona mashi, nempite ha mutu henu, ne mulau kawena unukuata hanashiha bantu ba mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Nealuate tshikowelu tshia ku ne mihanu ya lin, nêle mukaba wa lin ku tshimono tshiandi, nease tshifufu tshia lin ku mutu ebi mbilulu bia tshijila, yeye neowe mai, neabiluate
Bobo bakafofomesha mesu a balume bakadi bimane ku tshibi tshia nsubu, bakese ne banene, bakateketa, kabakamona tshibi
Mabue a mvula awu kushipa bantu ne bimuna bia mu ditunga dia Ejipitu
Upatuke kabidi ne nyama yonsu iuvua nayi, nyunyi, bimuna ne nyama minene ne mikese, bua ivulangane imuangalaka pa buloba bujima
Yeye wakungambila ne, Ubanduluke, utangile ne mbushi ya bimpanga yonso idi iya kudi mashina a mbushi idi ne mihola mihola ne matoba matoba bualu bua nakutangila malu onso akukuenzela Labana
Nanku, misangu yonsu nenuikale bena diakalenga, nuenu ne ndelanganyi yenu
Bakumuka mu Kadesha, bakashikama ku mukuna wa Hô, ku butshika bua buloba bua Edome
Ditumibwa diônso dia ku makanda didi tshianana
Yuda wakamba ne, Balue n andi kunoko, bamuoshe mu kalua
Moshe ne Arone kuya kumpala kua ntenta wa kusambakena
Kuambilanganabu ne: Tusungulayi mfumu mukuabu, tupingane mu Ejipitu
Nanku, uditshipe mpindiewu kumpala kua Mvidi Mukulu ne: tshiakuenzela Abimeleke, bana bende ne ndelanganyi yende bibi to

Bialekela muntu ngombe wandi mu budimi bua muntu mukuabo, ne biadieye mitshi yandi ya tumuma tukese, yeye neamuhingashile bintu bidi bitamba buimpe bia mu budimi buandi ne bia mu budimi buandi bua nvinyo
Butuku abu kumushabu tatuabu maluvu tshiakabidi
Diba adi nenshishe kuya
Kubengaye diyi dia Moshe ne dia Arone, bu muvua Maweja Nangila mumane kuamba
Neumuinyike ne Izake
Nuenu bena Izrayele, nukadi pa kusabuka musulu wa Yardene, bua kubuela mu ditunga edi, didi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu unupa

Nomba Milambu Yakafilabo bua Kujidila Tshioshelu Hakalua dituku diakashikisha Mose kushimika nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ne hakeleye manyi ha mutu hatshi, wakatshijidila, ne bintu bionso biakadimu ne tshioshelu ne malonga atshi onso, ne hakeleye manyi ha mutu habi, wakabijidila
Nanku kusanganaye muntu awu ne tumelu tuende ku tshiina tshia mayi
Nennusungidile mu bianza bia baluishi benu
Wewe kubananga, kubalombola ne bukole
Agare kulela muana wa balume
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakamueneka kudiye mu ludimi lua kahia, luakadi luluhuka mu katshi, wakamona talala, kahia kakadi kosha katshi, katshi kakakahia
Enza mukeluba umue ku butshika bumue ne mukeluba mukuabo ku butshika bukuabo enza bakeluba ne tshibuikilu tshia mushete ne tshituha tshijima tshia or
Nuatendelelaku bualu buanyi
